GSP29nysvbh_u:6: pramāṇena khalvayaṃ jñātārthamupalabhya tamīpsati va jihāsati vā|
GSP29nysvbh_u:9: samīhamānasvamarthamabhīpsan jihāsan vā tamarthamāpnāti jahāti vā|
GSP29nysvbh_u:12: arthavati ca pramāṇe pramātā prameyaṃ pramitirityarthavanti bhavanti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:22: yathā darśakena pradīpena dṛśye guhyamāṇe tadiva yanna gṛhyate tatrāsti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:32: tatvasya jñānaṃ niḥśreyasasyādhigama iti ca karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhyau|
GSP29nysvbh_u:38: heyaṃ tasya nirvartakaṃ hānamātyantikaṃ tasyopāyo 'dhigantavya ityetāni khalu catvāryarthapadāni samyagbuddhvā niḥśreyasamadhigacchati/
GSP29nysvbh_u:39: tatra saśayādīnāṃ pṛthagvacanamarthakame saṃśayādayo hi yathāsambhavaṃ pramāṇeṣu prameyeṣu cāntarbhavanto na vyatiraccinta iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:52: sa cāyaṃ kiṅkhiditi vastuvimarśamātramanavadhāraṇaṃ jñānaṃ saṃśayaḥ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:54: artha prayojanam, yena prayuktaḥ pravartate tat prayojanam,
GSP29nysvbh_u:56: tenānena sarve prāṇinaḥsarvāṇi karmāṇi sarvāśca vidyā vyāptāḥ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:64: tatra vādajalpau saprayojanau, vitaṇḍā tu parikṣyate|
GSP29nysvbh_u:66: sa prayojanamanuyukto yadi pratipadyate, so 'sya pakṣāḥ so 'sya siddhānta iti vaitaṇḍikatvaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:67: atha na pratipadyate nāyaṃ laukiko na parīkṣaka ityāpadyate/
GSP29nysvbh_u:68: athāpi parapakṣapratiṣedhajñāpanaṃ prayojanaṃ bravīti, etadapi tādṛgeva|
GSP29nysvbh_u:69: yo jñāpayati, yo jānāti, yena jñāpayate, yacca jñāpyate-etacca
GSP29nysvbh_u:71: atha na pratipadyate, parapakṣapratiṣedhajñāpanaṃ prayojanamityetadasya vākyamanarthakaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:73: tasya yadyabhidheyaṃ pratipadhate so 'sya pakṣāḥ sthāpanīyo bhavati|
GSP29nysvbh_u:74: atha na pratipadyate pralāpamātramanarthakaṃ bhavati, vitaṇḍatvaṃ nivartata iti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:76: pratyakṣaviṣayo 'rtho dṛṣṭāntaḥ, catra laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ darśanaṃ na
GSP29nysvbh_u:81: tasmin sati syātāmanumānāgamau, asati ca na syātām|
GSP29nysvbh_u:92: tasya pṛthagvacanam, satsu siddhāntabhedeṣu vādajalpavitaṇḍāḥ pravartante,
GSP29nysvbh_u:94: sādhanīyasyārthasya yāvati śabdasamūhe siddhiḥ parisamāpyate, tasya pañcāvayavāḥ pratijñādayaḥ samūhamapekṣyāvayavā ucyante|
GSP29nysvbh_u:96: āgamaḥ pratijñā, heturanumānam, udāharaṇaṃ pratyakṣame upamānamupanayaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh_u:100: śabdaviśeṣāḥ santaḥ prameye 'ntamūtā evamartha puthagracyanta iti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:103: tasyodāharam, kimidaṃ janma kṛtakena hetunā nirvartyate, āhosvidakṛtakena,
GSP29nysvbh_u:104: athākasmikamiti ? evamavijñātatatve 'rthe kāraṇopapatyā uhaḥ pravatāte-yadi kṛtakena hetunā nirvartyate, hetūcchedādupapanno 'yaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:107: athākāsmikam, ato 'kasmānnirvartyamānaṃ na punarnirvartsyatīti nivṛttikāraṇaṃ nopapadyate|
GSP29nysvbh_u:111: tanvajñānaviṣayasya ca vibhāgāt tatvajñānāya kalpate tarka iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:118: so 'yaṃ nirṇayaḥ prameyāntarbhūta evamartha pṛthaguddiṣṭa iti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:123: nigrahasthānabhyaḥ pṛthaguddiṣṭa hetvābhāsāḥ, vāde caudanīyā bhaviṣyantīti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:126: upalakṣitānāṃ svāvakye parivarjanaṃ chalajātinigrahasthānānāṃ paravākye paryanuyogaḥ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:127: jātestu pareṇapra yujyamāṇāyāḥ sulabhaḥ samādhiḥ, svayaṃ ca sukaraḥ
GSP29nysvbh_u:134: tat khalu vai niḥśreyasaṃ kiṃ tattvajñānānantarameva bhavati? netyucyate kiṃ tarhi? tattvajñānād--
GSP29nysvbh_u:137: ātmani tāvannāstīti, anātmanyātmeti, duḥkhe sukhamiti, anitye nityamiti,
GSP29nysvbh_u:138: atrāṇe trāṇamiti, sabhaye nirbhayamiti, jugupsite 'bhimatamiti, hātavye
GSP29nysvbh_u:139: apratihātavyamiti, pravṛttau nāsti karma, nāsti karmaphalamiti, doṣeṣu nāyaṃ doṣanimittaḥ saṃsāra iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:140: pretyabhāve nāsti janturjīvo vā sattva ātmā vā yaḥ preyāt pretya ca bhavediti, anamittaṃ janma, animitto janmoparama iti, ādimān pretyabhāvo 'nantaśceti, naimittikaḥ sannakarmaṃnimittaḥ pretyabhāva iti,
GSP29nysvbh_u:142: apavarge bhīṣmaḥ khalvayaṃ sarvakāryoparamaḥ, sarvaviprayoge 'pavarge bahu bhadrakaṃ lupyataṃ iti kathaṃ buddhimān
GSP29nysvbh_u:151: atha śubhā, śarīreṇa dānaṃ paritrāṇaṃ paraciraṇaṃ ca|
GSP29nysvbh_u:152: vācā satyaṃ hitaṃ priyaṃ svādhyāyaṃ ceti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:156: prāṇāḥ, annaṃ vai prāṇinaḥ prāṇāḥ iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:157: seyaṃ pravṛttiḥ kutsitasyābhipūjitasya ca janmanaḥ kāraṇam|
GSP29nysvbh_u:159: tasmin sati duḥkham, tatpunaḥ pratikūlavedanīyaṃ bādhanā pīḍā tāpa iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:160: ta hame mithyājñānādayo duḥkhāntā dharmā avicchedena pravartamānāḥ saṃsāra iti//
GSP29nysvbh_u:161: yadā tu tattvajñānānmithyājñānamapaiti, tadā mithyājñānāye doṣā apayanti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:168: evaṃ duḥkhe 'nitye 'trāṇe sabhaye jugupsite hātavye ca yathāviṣayaṃ veditavyam|
GSP29nysvbh_u:171: pretyabhāve khalu, asti janturjovaḥ sattva ātmā vā yaḥ preyāt pretya ca
GSP29nysvbh_u:173: nimittavajjanma nimittavān janmoparama iti, anādiḥ pretyabhāvo 'pavargānta
GSP29nysvbh_u:177: apavarge, śāntaḥ khalvayaṃ sarvaviprayogaḥ sarvoparamo 'pavargaḥ, bahu ca kṛcchraṃ ghora pāpakaṃ lupyata iti kathaṃ buddhimān sarvaduḥkhocchedaṃ sarvaduḥkhāsaṃvidamapavargaṃ na rocayediti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:180: trividhā cāsya śāstrasya pravṛttirūddeśo lakṣaṇaṃ parīkṣā ceti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:183: lakṣitasya yathālakṣaṇamupapadyate na veti pramāṇairavadhāraṇaṃ parīkṣā|
GSP29nysvbh_u:184: tatroddiṣṭasya pravibhaktasya lakṣaṇamucyate, yathā pramāṇānāṃ prameyasya
GSP29nysvbh_u:186: uddiṣṭasya lakṣitasya ca vibhāgavacanam, yathā chalasya---
GSP29nysvbh_u:194: yadā sannikarṣastadā jñānaṃ pramitiḥ, yadā jñānaṃ tadā
GSP29nysvbh_u:197: upamānaṃ sāmīpyamānam, yathā gaurevaṃ gavaya iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:203: kiṃ punaretāni pramāṇāni prameyamabhisaṃplavante, atha pratiprameyaṃ vyavatiṣṭhanta iti? ubhayathā darśanam/
GSP29nysvbh_u:217: laukikasya svarge na liṅgadarśanam, na pratyakṣam|
GSP29nysvbh_u:220: pāṇau ca pratyakṣata upalabhyamāne nānumānaṃ nāgama iti//
GSP29nysvbh_u:226: pramātuḥ pramātavye 'rthe pramāṇānāṃ saṃkaro 'bhisaṃplavaḥ, asakaro vyavastheti //3//
GSP29nysvbh_u:230: na tarhi idānīmidaṃ bhavati ātmā manasā saṃyujyate, mana indriyeṇa,
GSP29nysvbh_u:231: indriyamartheneti? nedaṃ kāraṇāvadhāraṇam--etāvatpratyakṣe kāraṇamiti, kiṃ tu viśiṣṭakāraṇavacanamiti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:232: yatpratyakṣajñānasya viśiṣṭakāraṇaṃ taducyate, yattu samānam anumānādijñānasya, na tannivartyata
GSP29nysvbh_u:233: manasastarhīndriyeṇa saṃyogo vaktavyaḥ? bhidyamānasya pratyakṣaśrajñānasya nāyaṃ bhidyata iti samānatvānnokta iti//
GSP29nysvbh_u:236: tatredamindriyārthasannikarṣādutpannamarthajñāna rūpam iti vā, rasa ityeva vā bhavati, rūparasaśabdāśca viṣayanāmadheyam|
GSP29nysvbh_u:237: tena vyapadiśyate jñānam--rūpamiti jānīte, rasa iti jānīte|
GSP29nysvbh_u:240: yadidamanupayukte śabdārthasambandhe arthajñānam, na tat nāmadheyaśabdena
GSP29nysvbh_u:241: vyapadiśyate, gṛhīte 'pi ca śabdārthasambandhe asyārthasyāyaṃ śabdo
GSP29nysvbh_u:243: yadā tu so 'rtho gṛhyate, tadā tatpūrvasmādarthajñānāt
GSP29nysvbh_u:244: na viśiṣyate, tat arthavijñānaṃ tādṛgeva bhavati|
GSP29nysvbh_u:245: tasya tvarthajñānasyānyaḥ samākhyāśabdo nāsti, yena pratīyamānaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:250: tadevamarthajñānakāle sa na samākhyāśabdo vyāpriyate, vyavahārakāle tu vyāpriyate|
GSP29nysvbh_u:252: grīṣme marīcayo bhaumenoṣmaṇā saṃsṛṣṭāḥ spandamānā dūrasthasya cakṣuṣā
GSP29nysvbh_u:255: tacca pratyakṣaṃ prasajyate ityata āha avyabhicārīti yadetasmiṃstadati
GSP29nysvbh_u:257: dūrāccakṣuṣā hyayamarthaṃ paśyannāvadhārayati dhūma iti vā reṇuriti vā|
GSP29nysvbh_u:260: kiṃ tarhi? cakṣuṣā hyayamarthaṃ paśyannāvadhārayati, yathā cendriyeṇa upalabdhamartha manasopalabhate,
GSP29nysvbh_u:262: yacca tadindriyānavadhāraṇapūrvakaṃ manasānavadhāraṇaṃ tadviśeṣāpekṣaṃ vimarśemātraṃ saṃśayaḥ, na pūrvamiti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:267: indriyasya vai sato manasa indriyebhyaḥ pṛthagupadeśo dharmaṃbhedāt|
GSP29nysvbh_u:269: manastvabhautikaṃ sarvaviṣayaṃ ca, nāsya saguṇasyendriyabhāva iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:270: sati cendriyārthasannikarṣe sannidhimasannidhi cāsya yugapajjñānānutpattikāraṇaṃ vakṣyāmaḥ(1/1/16)
GSP29nysvbh_u:275: NyS_1,1.5: atha tatpūrvakaṃ trividham anumānaṃ pūrvavaccheṣavatsāmānyato dṛṣṭaṃ ca //
GSP29nysvbh_u:280: pūrvavaditi--yatra kāraṇena kāryamanumīyate, yathā medhonnatyā bhaviṣyati
GSP29nysvbh_u:282: śeṣavattat--yatra kāryeṇa kāraṇamanumīyate, pūrvodakaviparītamudakaṃ nādyāḥ pūrṇatvaṃ śīghratvaṃ dṛṣṭhvā strotaso 'numīyate bhūtā vṛṣṭiriti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:291: dravyaguṇakarmasaṃśaye, na dravyam, ekadravyatvāt, na karma,
GSP29nysvbh_u:292: śabdāntarahetutvāt, yastu śiṣyate so 'yamiti śabdasya guṇatvapratipattiḥ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:293: sāmānyatodṛṣṭaṃ nāma--yatrāpratyakṣe liṅgaliṅginoḥ sambandhe kenacidarthena liṅgasya sāmānyādapratyakṣo liṅgī gamyate,
GSP29nysvbh_u:294: yathecchādibhirātmā, icchādayoguṇāḥ, guṇāśca dravyasaṃsthānāḥ, tadyadeṣāṃ sthānaṃ sa ātmeti//
GSP29nysvbh_u:295: vibhāgavacanādeva trividhamiti siddhe trividhavacanaṃ mahato mahāviṣayasya nyāyasya laghīyasā sūtreṇopadeśāt paraṃ vākyalāghavaṃ manyamānasyānyasmin vākyalāghave 'nādaraḥ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:296: tathā cāyamasyetthambhūtena vākyavikalpena pravṛttaḥ siddhānte chale śabdādiṣu ca bahulaṃ samācāraḥ śāstra iti//
GSP29nysvbh_u:305: kiṃ punaratropamānena kriyate? yadā khalvayaṃ gavā samānadharmaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:308: yathā gaurevaṃ gavaya ityupamāne prayukte gavā samānadharmāṇam arthamindriyārthasaṃnikarṣādupalabhamāno 'sya gavayaśabdaḥ saṃjñeti saṃjñāsajñisambandhaṃ pratipadyata iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:309: yathā mudgastathā mūdgaparṇī yathā bhāṣastathā māṣapaṇītyupamāne prayukte upamānātsaṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhaṃ pratipadyamānastāmoṣadhī bhaiṣajyāya
GSP29nysvbh_u:314: āptaḥ khalu sākṣātkṛtadharmā yathādṛṣṭasyārthasya cikhyāpayiṣayā prayukta
GSP29nysvbh_u:319: tathā ca sarveṣāṃ vyavahārāḥ pravartanta iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:326: kimarthaṃ punaridamucyate? sa na manyeta dṛṣṭārthaṃ evāptopadeśaḥ pramāṇam, arthasyāvadhāraṇādita, adṛṣṭārtho 'pi
GSP29nysvbh_u:331: tatrātmā sarvasya draṣṭā sarvasya bhoktā sarvajñaḥ sarvānubhāvī|
GSP29nysvbh_u:343: kiṃ tarhi? janmana evedaṃ sasukhasādhanasya duḥkhānuṣaṅgāt duḥkhenāviprayogādvividhabādhanāyogād
GSP29nysvbh_u:350: asya tu tattvajñānādapavargo mithyājñānātsaṃsāra ityata etadupadiṣṭaṃ viśeṣeṇeti //9//
GSP29nysvbh_u:356: yajjātīyasyārthasya sannikarṣātsukhamātmāpalabdhavān, tajjātīyameva arthaṃ paśyannupādātumicchati, seyamādātumicchā ekasyānekārthadarśino darśanapratisandhānādbhavati liṅgamātmanaḥ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:357: niyataviṣaye hi buddhibhedamātre na saṃbhavati, dehāntaravaditi|
GSP29nysvbh_u:361: so 'yaṃ prayatna ekamanekārthadarśinaṃ darśanapratisandhātāram anteraṇa na syāt|
GSP29nysvbh_u:362: niyataviṣaye hi buddhibhedāmātre na saṃbhavati, dehāntaravaditi|
GSP29nysvbh_u:367: bubhutsamānaḥ khalvayaṃ vimṛśati kiṃ sviditi, vimṛśaṃśca jānīte idamiti,
GSP29nysvbh_u:372: yathā anātmavādino dehāntareṣu niyataviṣayā buddhibhedā na
GSP29nysvbh_u:373: pratisandhīyante, tathaikadehaviṣayā api na pratisandhīyeran, aviśeṣāt|
GSP29nysvbh_u:376: evaṃ khalu nānāsattvānāṃ samācāro 'nyadṛṣṭamanyo na smaratīti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:383: kathamindriyāśrayaḥ? yasyānugraheṇānugṛhītāni upaghāte na copahatāni svaviṣayeṣu sādhvasādhuṣu pravartante, sa eṣāmāśrayaḥ taccharīram|
GSP29nysvbh_u:384: kathamarthāśrayaḥ? yasminnāyatane indriyārthasannikarṣādutpannayoḥ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ pratisaṃvedanaṃ pravartate, sa eṣāmāśrayaḥ taccharīramiti
GSP29nysvbh_u:399: saṃjñāśabdaiḥ pṛthagupadeśo bhūtānāṃ vibhaktānāṃ suvacaṃ kāryaṃ bhaviṣyatīti //13//
GSP29nysvbh_u:402: pṛthivyādīnāṃ yathāviniyogaṃ guṇā indriyāṇāṃ yathākramamarthā viṣayā iti
GSP29nysvbh_u:403: acetanasya karaṇasya buddherjānaṃ vṛttiḥ, cetanasyākarturūpalabdhiriti yuktiviruddhamarthaṃ pratyācakṣāṇaka ivedamāha---
GSP29nysvbh_u:413: yugapacca khalu ghrāṇādīnāṃ gandhādīnāṃ ca sannikarṣeṣu satsu yugapajjñānāni notpadyante|
GSP29nysvbh_u:420: so 'yabhārambhaḥ śarīreṇa vācā manasā ca puṇyaḥ pāpaśca daśavidhaḥ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:423: pravartanā---pravṛttihetutvam, jñātāraṃ hi rāgādayaḥ pravartayanti puṇye pāpe vā|
GSP29nysvbh_u:425: pratyātmavedanīyā hīme doṣāḥ kasmāllakṣaṇato nidrdiśyanta iti?
GSP29nysvbh_u:426: karmalakṣaṇāḥ khalu raktadviṣṭamūḍhāḥ, rakto hi tatkarma kurute yena karmaṇā sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā labhate, tathā dviṣṭastathā mūḍha iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:427: doṣā rāgadveṣamohā ityucyamāne bahu noktaṃ bhavatīti //18//
GSP29nysvbh_u:429: utpannasya kvacitsattvanikāye mṛtvā yā punarūtpattiḥ sa pretyabhāvaḥ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:434: yatra kvacitprāṇabhṛnnikāye varttamānaḥ pūrvopāttān dehādīn jahāti
GSP29nysvbh_u:442: tatpunardehendriyaviṣayabuddhiṣu satīṣu bhavatīti saha dehādibhiḥ phalamabhipratam|
GSP29nysvbh_u:445: hānopādānayorniṣṭhā paryavasānaṃ vāsti, sa khalvayaṃ phalasya
GSP29nysvbh_u:451: so 'yaṃ sarvaṃ duḥkhenānubaddhamiti paśyan duḥkhaṃ jihāsurjanmani duḥkhadarśī nirvidyate nirviṇṇo virajyate virakto vimucyate //21//
GSP29nysvbh_u:452: yatra tu niṣṭhā yatra tu paryavasānaṃ so 'yam---
GSP29nysvbh_u:455: katham? upāttasya janmano hānam, anyasya cānupādānam|
GSP29nysvbh_u:458: nityaṃ sukhamātmano mahattvavat tattu mokṣe abhivyajyate,
GSP29nysvbh_u:459: tenābhivyaktenātyantaṃ vimuktaḥ sukhī bhavatīti kecit manyante|
GSP29nysvbh_u:461: na pratyakṣaṃ nānumānaṃ nāgamo vā vidyate, nityaṃ sukhamātmano mahattvavat
GSP29nysvbh_u:464: nityasya sukhasyābhivyaktiḥ saṃvedanam jñānamiti, tasya heturvācyo yatastadutpadyata iti//
GSP29nysvbh_u:466: yathā muktaḥ sukhena tatsaṃvedanena ca sannityenopapannastathā saṃsārastho 'pītyaviśeṣaḥ prasajyate, ubhayasya nityatvāt//
GSP29nysvbh_u:467: abhyunujñāne ca dharmādharmaphalena sāhacaryaṃ yaugapadyaṃ gṛhyate|
GSP29nysvbh_u:468: yadidam utpattisthāneṣu dharmādharmaphalaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca saṃvedyate
GSP29nysvbh_u:469: paryāyeṇa, tasya ca nityasaṃvedanasya ca sahabhāvo yaugapadyaṃ gṛhyeta, na sukhābhāvo nānabhivyaktirasti, ubhayasya nityatvāt/
GSP29nysvbh_u:471: atha mokṣe nityasya sukhasya savedanamanityam? yatastadutpadyate sa heturvācyaḥ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:474: ātmamanaḥsaṃyogo heturiti cet? evamapi tasya sahakāri nimittāntaraṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:477: yadi dharmo nimittāntaram? tasya heturvācyo yata utpadyata iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:479: yadi yogasamādhijo dharmo hetuḥ? tasya kāryāvasāyavipodhātprakṣaye saṃvedanam amatyantaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:481: yadi dharmakṣayātsaṃvedanoparamo nityaṃ sukhaṃ na saṃvedyate iti kiṃ vidyamānaṃ na saṃvedyate, athāvidyamānamiti nānumānaṃ viśiṣṭe 'satīti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:483: yogasamādhijo dharmo na kṣīyata iti nāstyanumānam|
GSP29nysvbh_u:485: yasya tu saṃvedanoparamo nāsti tena saṃvedanaheturnitya ityanujñeyam//
GSP29nysvbh_u:487: yathā muktasya nityaṃ sukhaṃ tatsaṃvedanahetuśca, saṃvedanasya tūparamo nāsti, kāraṇasya nityatvāt, tathā saṃsārasthasyāpīti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:488: evaṃ ca sati dharmādharmaphalena sukhaduḥkhasaṃvedanena sāhacaryaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:494: etaccāyuktam, śarīrādaya upabhogārthāste bhogapratibandhaṃ kariṣyantītya nupapannam |
GSP29nysvbh_u:497: idam anumānam, iṣṭādhigamārtho mokṣopadeśaḥ pravṛttiśca mumukṣūṇām,
GSP29nysvbh_u:501: iṣṭamapyaniṣṭasampadyate, aniṣṭahānāya ca ghaṭamāna iṣṭamapi jahāti,
GSP29nysvbh_u:504: yathā dṛṣṭamanityaṃ sukhaṃ parityajya nityaṃ sukhaṃ kāmayate, evaṃ dehendriya buddhīranityā dṛṣṭā anikramya muktasya nityā dehendriyabuddhayaḥ kalpayitavyāḥ, sādhīyaścaivaṃ muktasya caikātmyaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:510: yadyapi kaścidāgamaḥ syāt muktasyātyantikaṃ sukhamiti? sukhaśabda ātyantike duḥkhābhāve prayukta ityevamupapadyate, dṛṣṭo hi duḥkhābhāve
GSP29nysvbh_u:513: yadyayaṃ mokṣe nityaṃ sukhamabhivyajyata iti nityasukharāgeṇa mokṣāyaghaṭamānā na mokṣamadhigacchet,
GSP29nysvbh_u:515: na ca bandhane satyapi kaścinmukta ityupapadyata iti//
GSP29nysvbh_u:517: athāsya nityasukharāgaḥ prahīyate, tasminprahīṇe nāsya nityasukhārāgaḥ
GSP29nysvbh_u:518: pratikūlo bhavati? yadyevam, muktasya nityaṃ sukhaṃ bhavati, athāpi na bhavati, nāsyobhayoḥ pakṣayormokṣādhigamo vikalpyata iti // 22 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:519: sthānavata etarhi saṃśayasya lakṣaṇaṃ vācyamiti taducyate---
GSP29nysvbh_u:522: sthāṇupurūṣayoḥ samānaṃ dharmamārohapariṇāhau paśyan pūrvadṛṣṭaṃ ca tayoviśeṣaṃ bubhutsamānaḥ kisvidityanyataraṃ nāvadhārayati, yat tadanavadhāraṇajñānaṃ sa saṃśayaḥ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:523: samānamanayordharmamupalabhe viśeṣamanyatarasya nopalabha ityeṣā buddhiḥ apekṣā|
GSP29nysvbh_u:532: tasmin dravyaṃ guṇaḥ karma veti sandehaḥ, viśeṣasyobhayathā dṛṣṭatvāt|
GSP29nysvbh_u:533: kiṃ dravyasya sato guṇakamabhyo viśeṣaḥ, āhosvidaguṇasya sato dravyakarmabhyaḥ, atha karmaṇaḥ sato dravyaguṇebhya iti? viśeṣāpekṣā anyatamasya vyavasthāpakaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:542: saccodakamupalabhyate taḍāgādiṣu, marīciṣu cāvidyamānamudakamiti, ataḥ kkacidupasabhyamāne tattvavyavasthāpakasya pramāṇasyānupalabdheḥ kiṃ sadupalabhyate 'thāsaditi saṃśayo bhavati//
GSP29nysvbh_u:544: sacca nopalabhyate mūlakīlakodakādi, asaccānutpannaṃ nirūddhaṃ vā, tataḥ
GSP29nysvbh_u:545: kkacidanupalabhyamāne, kiṃ sannopalabhyate utāsaditi saṃśayo bhavati|
GSP29nysvbh_u:555: NyS_1,1.25: laukikaparīkṣadāṇāṃ yasminn arthe buddhisāmyaṃ sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh_u:559: yathā yamarthaṃ laukikā budhyatante, tathā parīkṣakā api, so 'rtho
GSP29nysvbh_u:562: dṛṣṭāntasamādhitā na svapakṣāḥ sthāpanīyā bhavantīti, avayaveṣu codāharaṇāya kalpata iti //25//
GSP29nysvbh_u:579: yathā ghrāṇādīnīndriyāṇi, gandhādaya indriyārthāḥ, pṛthivyādīni bhūtāni,
GSP29nysvbh_u:582: yathā nāsata atmalābhaḥ, na sata ātmahānam, niratiśayāścetanāḥ dehendriyamanaḥsaṃ viṣayeṣu tattatkāraṇeṣu ca viśeṣa iti sāṅkhcānām /
GSP29nysvbh_u:584: svaguṇaviśiṣṭāścetanāḥ, asadutpadyate utpannaṃ nirudhyata iti yogānām //29//
GSP29nysvbh_u:586: yasyārthasya siddhāvanye 'rthā anuṣajyante, na tairvinā so 'rthaḥ sidhyati te 'rthā yadadhiṣṭhānāḥ, so 'dhikaraṇasiddhāntaḥ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:595: yatra kiṃcidarthajātamaparīkṣitamabhyupagamyate, astu dravyaṃ śabdaḥ, sa tu nityo 'thānitya iti? dravyasya sato anityatā nityatā vā tadviśeṣaḥ
GSP29nysvbh_u:596: parīkṣyate, so 'bhyupagamasiddhāntaḥ svabuddhyatiśayacikhyāpayiṣayā parabuddhyavajñānāya ca pravartata iti //31//
GSP29nysvbh_u:599: daśāvayavāneke nauyayikā vākye sañcakṣate jijñāsā saṃśayaḥ śakyaprāptiḥ prayojanaṃ saṃśayavyudāsa
GSP29nysvbh_u:600: te kasmānnocyanta iti? tatrāpratīyamāne 'rthe pratyayārthasya pravartikā jijñāsā|
GSP29nysvbh_u:601: apratīyamānamarthaṃ kasmājjijñāsate? taṃ tattvato jñātaṃ hāsyāmi vopādāsya upekṣiṣye veti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:609: pramātuḥ pramāṇāni prameyādhigamārthāni, sā śakyaprāptirna sādhakasya
GSP29nysvbh_u:611: prayojanaṃ tattvāvadhāraṇamarthasādhakasya vākyasya phalaṃ naikadeśa iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:615: tattvārnthasādhakabhāvāttu pratijñādayaḥ sādhakavāṅkyasya bhāgā ekadeśā avayavā iti // 32
GSP29nysvbh_u:618: prajñāpanīyena dharmeṇa dharmiṇo viśiṣṭasya parigrahavacanaṃ pratijñā
GSP29nysvbh_u:622: udāharaṇena sāmānyātsādhyasya dharmasya sādhanaṃ prajñāpanaṃ hetuḥ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:623: sādhye pratisandhāya dharmamudāharaṇe ca pratisandhāya tasya sādhanatāvacanaṃ hetuḥ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:637: sādhyaṃ ca dvividham dharmiviśiṣṭo vā dharmaḥ śabdasyānityatvam,
GSP29nysvbh_u:638: dharmaviśiṣṭo vā dharmī anityaḥ śabda iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:643: sa yasmin dṛṣṭānte vartate sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ taddharmabhāvī|
GSP29nysvbh_u:644: yasmin dṛṣṭānte sādhyasādharmyādutpattidharmakatvāt sādhyasya dharmo 'nityatvaṃ bhavati sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:649: tacca bhūtvā na bhavati, ātmānaṃ jahāti nirudhyata ityanityam|
GSP29nysvbh_u:659: anityaḥ śabda utpattidharmakatvāt anutpattidharmakaṃ nityamātmādi, so
GSP29nysvbh_u:661: sādhyavaidharmyādanutpattidharmakatvādataddharmabhāvī-yo 'sau sādhyasya dharmo 'nityatvaṃ sa tasmin na bhavatīti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:662: atrātmādau dṛṣṭānta utpattidharmakatvasyābhāvādanityatvaṃ na bhavatīti upalabhamānaḥ śabde vapiryayamanuminoti, utpattidharmakatvasya bhāvādanityaḥ śabda iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:663: sādharmyoktasya hetoḥ sādhyasādharmyāt taddharmabhāvī dṛṣṭānta udāharaṇam|
GSP29nysvbh_u:666: pūrvasmin dṛṣṭānte yau tau dharmauṃ sādhyasādhanabhūtau paśyati sādhye 'pi
GSP29nysvbh_u:668: uttarasmin dṛṣṭānte yayordharmayorekasyābhāvāditarasyābhāvaṃ paśyati tayorekatarasya bhāvāditarasya bhāvaṃ sādhye 'numinotīti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:670: tadidaṃ hetūdāharaṇayoḥ sāmarthyaṃ paramasūkṣmaṃ duḥkhabodhaṃ paṇḍitarūpavedanīyamiti //37//
GSP29nysvbh_u:671: NyS_1,1.38: udāharaṇāpekṣaḥ tathā iti upasaṃhāraḥ na tathā iti vā sādhyasya upanayaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh_u:675: dṛṣṭam, tathā ca śabda utpattidharmaka iti sādhyasya
GSP29nysvbh_u:677: sādhyavaidharmyayuktaṃ punarudāharaṇe ātmādidravyamanutpattidharmakaṃ nityaṃ dṛṣṭam, na ca tathānutpattidharmakaḥ śabda iti,
GSP29nysvbh_u:684: sādharmyokte vā vaidharmyokte vā yathodāharaṇamupasaṃhriyate tasmādutpattidharmakatvādanityaḥ śabda iti nigamanam/
GSP29nysvbh_u:687: tatra sādharmyokte tāvadvetau vākyam, anityaḥ śabda iti pratijñā|
GSP29nysvbh_u:699: saṃbhavastāvat, śabdaviṣayā pratijñā, āptopadeśasya pratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ pratisandhānādanṛṣeśca
GSP29nysvbh_u:708: asati hetau kasya sādhanabhāvaḥ pradarśyeta? udāharaṇe sādhye ca
GSP29nysvbh_u:709: kasyopasaṃhaaraḥ syāt? kasya cāpadeśātpratijñāyāḥ punarvacanaṃ nigamanaṃ syāt iti? asatyudāharaṇe kena sādharmyaṃ vaidharmyaṃ vā sādhyasādhanamupādīyeta? kasya vā sādharmyavaśādupasaṃhaaraḥ pravarteta?
GSP29nysvbh_u:710: upanayaṃ cāntareṇa sādhye 'nupasaṃhṛtaḥ sādhako dharmo nārthaṃ sādhayet|
GSP29nysvbh_u:711: nigamanābhāve cānabhivyaktasaṃbandhānāṃ pratijñādīnāmekārthena pravartanaṃ tatheti pratipādanaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:714: udāharaṇena samānasya viparītasya vā sādhyasya dharmasya sādhakabhāvavacanaṃ hetvarthaḥ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:719: na caitasyāṃ hetūdāharaṇapariśuddhau satyāṃ sādharmyavaidharmyābhyāṃ pratyavasthānasya vikalpājjātinigrahasthānabahutvaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:720: avyavasthāpya khalu dharmayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvamudāharaṇe jātivādī pratyavatiṣṭhate|
GSP29nysvbh_u:721: vyavasthiteha khilu dharmayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāve dṛṣṭāntasthe gṛhyamāṇe sādhanabhūtasya dharmasya hetutvena upādānaṃ na sādharmyamātrasya, na vairdharmyamātrasya veti //39//
GSP29nysvbh_u:722: ata ūrdhvaṃ tarko lakṣaṇīya iti athedamucyate---
GSP29nysvbh_u:726: atha jijñāsitasya vastuno vyāhatau dharmauṃ vibhāgena vimṛśati, kiṃ svit ittthamāhosvinnetthamiti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:727: vimṛśyamānayordharmayorekataraṃ kāraṇopapattyā anujñānāti, sambhavatyasmin kāraṇaṃ pramāṇaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:729: tatra nidarśanam, yo 'yaṃ jñātā jñātavyamarthaṃ jānīte, taṃ tattvato jānīyeti jijñāsā|
GSP29nysvbh_u:733: yadyayamanutpattidharmakaḥ tataḥ svakṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phalamanubhavati jñātā|
GSP29nysvbh_u:735: kāraṇam, uttarottarāpāye ca tadanantarābhāvādapavarga iti syātāṃ saṃsārāpavargauṃ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:737: utpannaḥ khalu jñātā dehendriyaviṣayabuddhivedanābhiḥ saṃbadhyata iti nāsyedaṃ svakṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phalam|
GSP29nysvbh_u:738: utpannaśca bhūtvā na bhavatīti, tasyāvidyamānasya niruddhasya vā
GSP29nysvbh_u:739: svakṛtakarmaṇaḥ phalopabhogo nāsti, tadevamekasyānekaśarīrayogaḥ śarīraviyogaścātyantaṃ na syāditi, yatra kāraṇamanupapadyamānaṃ paśyati, tannānujānāti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:741: kathaṃ punarayaṃ tattvajñānārtho na tattvajñānameveti? anavadhāraṇāt|
GSP29nysvbh_u:742: anujānātyayamekataraṃ dharmaṃ kāraṇopapattyā, na tvavadhārayati na
GSP29nysvbh_u:744: kathaṃ tattvajñānārtha iti? tattvajñānaviṣayābhyanujñālakṣaṇādūhād bhāvitātprasannādanantaraṃ pramāṇasāmarthyāt tattvajñānam utpadyata ityevaṃ tattvajñānārtha iti//
GSP29nysvbh_u:745: so 'yaṃ tarkaḥ pramāṇāni pratisandadhānaḥ pramāṇābhyanujñānāt pramāṇasahito vāde 'padiṣṭa
GSP29nysvbh_u:746: avijñātatattve 'rthe iti yathā so 'rtho bhavati tasya tathābhāvastattvamaviparyayo yāthātathyam
GSP29nysvbh_u:750: tau sādhanopālambhau pakṣapratipakṣāśrayau vyatiṣaktāvanubandhena pravarttamānau pakṣapratipakṣāvityucyete|
GSP29nysvbh_u:753: nedaṃ pakṣapratipakṣābhyāmarthāvadhāraṇaṃ sambhavatīti eko hi pratijñātamarthaṃ taṃ hetutaḥ sthāpayati pratiṣiddhaṃ coddharati
GSP29nysvbh_u:761: tāvetau sambhavāsambhavau vimarśaṃ saha nivarttayata ubhayasambhave|
GSP29nysvbh_u:767: yatra tu dharmisāmānyagatau viruddhau dharmauṃ hetutaḥ sambhavataḥ tatra samuccayaḥ, hetuto 'rthasya tathābhāvopapatteḥ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:768: yathā kriyāvad dravyamiti lakṣaṇavacane yasya dravyasya kriyāyogo hetutaḥ saṃbhavati tat kriyāvat, yasya na saṃbhavati tadakriyamiti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:770: yathā tadeva dravyaṃ kriyāyuktaṃ kriyāvat, anutpannoparatakriyaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:772: na cāyaṃ nirṇaye niyamaḥ vimṛśyaiva pakṣapratipakṣābhyāmarthāvadhāraṇaṃ nirṇaya iti, kiṃ tarhi? bhavati khalvindriyārthasannikarṣādutpannapratyakṣe 'rthāvadhāraṇaṃ nirṇaya iti,
GSP29nysvbh_u:776: tisraḥ kathā bhavanti, vādo jalpo vitaṇḍā ceti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:778: NyS_1,2.1: pramāṇatarkasādhanopālambhaḥ siddhāntāviruddhaḥ pañcāvayavopapannaḥ pakṣapratipakṣaparigraho vādaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh_u:781: nānādhikaraṇasthau viruddhāvapi na pakṣapratipakṣau, yathā nitya ātmā,
GSP29nysvbh_u:790: tau sādhanopālambhau ubhayorapi pakṣayorvyatiṣaktāvanubaddhau ca tāvad yāvadeko nivṛtta ekataro vyavasthita iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:793: tatpratiṣedhe ca kasyacidabhyanujñānārthaṃ siddhāntāviruddha iti vacanam|
GSP29nysvbh_u:794: siddhāntamabhyupetya tadvirodhī viruddha iti viruddhasya hetvābhāsasya nigrahasthānasyābhyanujñā
GSP29nysvbh_u:795: pañcāvayavopapanna iti hīnamanyatamenāpyavayavena nyūnam hetudāharaṇādhikamadhikam iti caitayorabhyanujñānārthamiti//
GSP29nysvbh_u:798: anyathobhāvapi pakṣau sthāpanāhetunā pravṛttau vāda iti syāt|
GSP29nysvbh_u:799: antareṇāpi cāvayavasaṃbandhaṃ pramāṇānyarthaṃ sādhayantīti dṛṣṭam, tenāpi kalpena sādhanopālambhau vāde bhavata iti jñāpayati|
GSP29nysvbh_u:800: chalajātinigrahasthānasādhanopālambho jalpa iti vacanādvinigraho jalpa iti mā vijñāyi, chalajātinigrahasthānasādhanopālambha eva jalpaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh_u:801: pramāṇatarkasādhanopālambho vāda eveti sa mā vijñāyītyevamartha pṛthak pramāṇatarkagrahaṇamiti
GSP29nysvbh_u:804: chalajātinigrasthānasādhanopālambha iti, chalajātinigrahasthānaiḥ sādhanamupālambhaścāsmin kriyata iti evaṃviśeṣaṇo jalpaḥ//
GSP29nysvbh_u:805: na khalu vai chalajātinigrahasthānaiḥ sādhanaṃ kasyacidarthasya
GSP29nysvbh_u:806: sambhavati, pratiṣedhārthataivaiṣāṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇe viśeṣalakṣaṇe ca śrūyate vacanavighāto 'rthavikalpopattyā chalam iti,
GSP29nysvbh_u:815: tāni hi prayujyamānāni parapakṣavighāte svapakṣaṃ rakṣanti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:816: tathā coktaṃ tattvādhyavasāyasaṃrakṣaṇārthaṃ jalpavitaṇḍe bījaprarohasaṃharakṣaṇārthaṃ kaṇṭakaśākhāvaraṇavat
GSP29nysvbh_u:817: yaścāsau pramāṇaiḥ pratipakṣasyopālambhastasya caitāni prayujyamānāni pratiṣedhabighātātsahakārīṇi
GSP29nysvbh_u:818: tadevamaṅgībhūtānāṃ chalādīnāmupādānaṃ jalpe, na svatantraṇāṃ sādhanabhāvaḥ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:823: yau tau samānādhikaraṇau viruddhau dharmauṃ pakṣapratipakṣāvityuktau tayorekataraṃ vaitaṇḍiko na sthāpayatīti parapakṣapratiṣedhenaiva pravarttata iti//
GSP29nysvbh_u:824: astu tarhi sa pratipakṣahīno vitaṇḍā? yadvai khalu tatparapratiṣedhalakṣaṇaṃ vākyaṃ sa vaitaṇḍikasya pakṣaḥ, na tvasau sādhyaṃ kaṃcidarthaṃ pratijñāya sthāpayatīti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:837: dṛṣṭānte sparśavattvamanityatvaṃ ca dharmauṃ na sādhyasādhanabhūtau
GSP29nysvbh_u:839: ātmādau ca dṛṣṭānte udāharaṇasādharmyātsādhyasādhanaṃ hetuḥ iti asparśatvāditi heturnityatvaṃ vyabhicarati, asparśā ca buddhiranityā ceti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:840: evaṃ dvividhāpi dṛṣṭānte vyabhicārātsādhyasādhanabhāvo nāstīti lakṣaṇābhāvādaheturiti//
GSP29nysvbh_u:846: taṃ viruṇaddhīti tadvirodhī, abhyupetaṃ siddhāntaṃ vyāhantīti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:847: yathā so 'yaṃ vikāro vyakterapaiti nityatvapratiṣedhāt, na nityo vikāra
GSP29nysvbh_u:859: astitvaṃ cātmalābhāpracyutiriti ca viruddhāvetau dhamau na saha sambhavata iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:860: so 'yaṃ heturyaṃ siddhāntamāśritya pravarttate tameva vyāhantīti // 6//
GSP29nysvbh_u:861: NyS_1,2.7: yasmāt prakaraṇacintā saḥ nirṇayārthamapadiṣṭaḥ prakaraṇasamaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh_u:864: sā jijñāsā yatkṛtā sa nirṇayārthaṃ prayukta ubhayapakṣasāmyāt prakaraṇamanativartamānaḥ prakaraṇasamo nirṇayāya na prakalpate|
GSP29nysvbh_u:866: yantra samāno dharmaḥ saṃśayakāraṇaṃ hetutvenopādīyate, sa saṃśayasamaḥ savyabhicāra eva|
GSP29nysvbh_u:867: yā tu vimarśasya viśeṣāpekṣitā ubhayapakṣaviśeṣānupalabdhiśca sā prakaraṇaṃ pravartayati|
GSP29nysvbh_u:868: yathā śabde nityadharmo nopalabhyate evamanityadharmaḥ api|
GSP29nysvbh_u:871: yadi nityadharmaḥ śabde gṛhyeta, na syātprakaraṇam|
GSP29nysvbh_u:872: yadi vā anityadharmo gṛhyeta, evamapi nivartteta prakaraṇam|
GSP29nysvbh_u:873: so 'yaṃ heturubhau pakṣau pravartayannanyatarasya nirṇayāya na prakalpate
GSP29nysvbh_u:878: sādhyaṃ tāvadetat---kiṃ puruṣavacchāyāpi gacchati āho svidāvarakadravye saṃsarpati āvaraṇasantānādasannidhisantāno 'yaṃ tejaso gṛhyata iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:879: sarpatā khalu dravyeṇa yo yastejobhāga āvriyate tasya tasyāsannidhirevāvicchinno gṛhyata iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:882: kālātyayena yukto yasyārthaikadeśo 'padiśyamānasya sa kālātyayāpadiṣṭaḥ kālātīta ityucyate|
GSP29nysvbh_u:884: prāgūrddhaṃ ca vyakteravasthitaṃ rūpaṃ pradīpaghaṭasaṃyogena vyajyate,
GSP29nysvbh_u:888: vyañjakasya saṃyogasya kālaṃ na vyaṅgyasya rūpasya vyaktiratyeti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:889: sati pradīpasaṃyoge rūpasya grahaṇaṃ bhavati, na nivṛtte saṃyoge rūpaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:891: nivṛtte tu dāruparaśusaṃyoge dūrasthena śabdaḥ śrūyate vibhāgakāle|
GSP29nysvbh_u:900: ityetadvacanādviparyāsenokto heturudāharaṇasādharmyāttathā vaidharmyātsādhyasādhanaṃ hetulakṣaṇa na jahāti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:906: na sāmānyalakṣaṇe chalaṃ śakyamudāhartum, vibhāge tūdāharaṇāni // 10 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:908: NyS_1,2.11: tat trividhaṃ vākchalaṃ sāmānyacchalamupacāracchalaṃ ca //
GSP29nysvbh_u:914: tatrāyaṃ chalavādī vaktuḥ abhiprāyādavivakṣitamanyamarthaṃ nava kambalā asyeti tāvadabhihitaṃ bhavateti kalpayati|
GSP29nysvbh_u:915: kalpayitvā cāsambhavena pratiṣedhati, eko 'sya kambalaḥ kuto nava kambalā
GSP29nysvbh_u:917: tadidaṃ sāmānyaśabde vāci nimitte chalaṃ vākchalamiti//
GSP29nysvbh_u:920: navakambala ityanekārthābhidhānam, navaḥ kambalo 'syeti, nava kambalā asyeti ca|
GSP29nysvbh_u:921: etasminprayukte yeyaṃ kalpanā navakambalā asyetyetad bhavatābhihitam,
GSP29nysvbh_u:934: ajāṃ grāmaṃ naya, sarpirādara, brāhmaṇaṃ bhojayeti sāmānyaśabdāḥ santo
GSP29nysvbh_u:937: evamayaṃ sāmānyaśabdo navakambala iti yo 'rthaḥ sambhavati navaḥ kambalo
GSP29nysvbh_u:939: yasatu na sambhavati nava kambalā asyeti, tatra na pravartate|
GSP29nysvbh_u:942: aho khalavasau brāhmaṇo vidyācaraṇasampanna ityukte kaścidāha sambhavati brāhmaṇe vidyācaraṇasampaditi|
GSP29nysvbh_u:943: asya vacanasya vidhāto 'rthavikalpopapattyā asambhūtārthakalpanayā kriyate yadi brāhmaṇe vidyācaraṇasampat sambhavati nanu vrātye 'pi sambhavet,
GSP29nysvbh_u:948: asya ca pratyavasthānam---avivakṣitahetukasya viṣayānuvādaḥ praśaṃsārthatvād vākyasya|
GSP29nysvbh_u:953: so 'yaṃ kṣetrānuvādo, nāsmin śālayo vidhīyanta iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:955: evaṃ sambhavati brāhmaṇe vidyācaraṇasampaditi sampadviṣayo brāhmaṇatvaṃ na
GSP29nysvbh_u:958: viṣayānuvādastvayaṃ praśaṃsārthatvād vākyasya, sati brāhmaṇatve sampaddhetuḥ samartha iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:959: viṣayaṃ ca praśaṃsatā vākyena yathāhetutaḥ phalanirvṛttirna
GSP29nysvbh_u:966: yathā mañcāḥ krośantīti arthasadbhāvaneva pratiṣedhaḥ mañcasthāḥ puruṣāḥ
GSP29nysvbh_u:969: bhaktyā prayoge prādhānyena kalpanam upacāraviṣayaṃ chalamupacāracchalam|
GSP29nysvbh_u:970: upacāro nītārthaḥ sahacaraṇādinimittena, atadbhāve tadvadabhidhānamupacāra iti//
GSP29nysvbh_u:971: atra samādhiḥ---prasiddhe prayoge vakturyathābhiprāyaṃ śabdārthayorabhyanujñā pratiṣedho vā na cchandataḥ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:972: pradhānabhūtasya śabdasya bhāktasya ca guṇabhūtasya prayoga ubhayorloke
GSP29nysvbh_u:974: siddhe prayoge yathā vakturabhiprāyastathā śabdārthāvanujñeyau pratiṣedhyau vā na cchandataḥ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:975: yadi vaktā pradhānaśabdaṃ prayuṅkte, yathābhūtasyābhyanujñā pratiṣedho vā
GSP29nysvbh_u:978: yatra tu vaktā guṇabhūtaṃ śabdaṃ prayuṅkte pradhānabhūtamabhipretya paraḥ pratiṣedhati, svamanīṣayā pratiṣedho 'sau bhavati na paropālambha iti //
GSP29nysvbh_u:981: ihāpi sthānyartho guṇaśabdaḥ, pradhānaśabdaḥ sathānārtha iti kalpayitvā pratiṣidhyata iti NyS_1,2.16: na tadarthāntarabhāvāt //
GSP29nysvbh_u:987: yathā cāyaṃ hetustrittvaṃ pratiṣedhati tathā dvitvamapyabhyanujñātaṃ pratiṣedhati|
GSP29nysvbh_u:988: vidyate hi kiṃcitsādharmyānna nivartate, tritvamapi na nivartsyatīti //
GSP29nysvbh_u:991: prayukte hi hetau yaḥ prasaṅgo jāyate sā jātiḥ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:992: sa ca prasaṅgaḥ sādharmyavaidharmyābhyā pratyavasthānamupālambhaḥ pratiṣedha iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1003: pareṇa sthāpitaṃ vā na pratiṣedhati, pratiṣedhaṃ vā noddharati|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1014: ta ime pramāṇādayaḥ padārthā uddiṣṭā yathoddeśaṃ ca lakṣitā yathālakṣaṇaṃ ca parīkṣiṣyanta iti trividhā cāsya śāstrasya pravṛttirveditavyeti // 20 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1017: śrī śrīnivāsa svāmi, śrī vināyaka svāmi, śrī sarasvatī devī,
GSP29nysvbh_u:1018: oṃ atha saṭīke nyāyabhāṣye dvitīyādhyāyasya prathamamāhnikam
GSP29nysvbh_u:1022: samānasya dharmasyādhyavasāyāt saṃśayo na dharmamātrāt, atha vā 'samānamanayordharmamupalabhe' iti dharmadharmigrahaṇe saṃśayābhāva iti,
GSP29nysvbh_u:1023: atha vā samānadharmādhyavasāyādarthāntarabhūte dharmiṇi saṃśayo 'nupapannaḥ-- na jātu rūpāsayārthāntarabhūtasyādhyavasāyādarthāntarabhūte
GSP29nysvbh_u:1024: sparśe saṃśaya iti, atha vā nādhyavasāyāt = arthāvadhāraṇād anavadhāraṇajñānaṃ saṃśaya upapadyate--- kāryakāraṇayoḥ sārūpyābhavāditi|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1026: anyataradharmādhyavasāyācca saṃśayo na bhavati-- tato hyanyatarāvadhāraṇameveti // 1 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1030: atha vā 'astyātmā' ityeke 'nāstyātmā' ityapare manyante ityupalabdheḥ
GSP29nysvbh_u:1032: tathopalabdhiravyavasthitā anupalabdhiś cāvyavasthiteti vibhāgenādhyavasite saṃśayo nopapadyate iti // 2 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1034: yāṃ va vipratipattiṃ bhavān saṃśayahetuṃ manyate sā saṃpratipattiḥ-- sā hi dvayoḥ pratyanīkadharmaviṣayā, tatra yadi viprattipatteḥ saṃśayaḥ ?
GSP29nysvbh_u:1037: na saṃśayaḥ, yadi tāvadiyamavyavasthā ātmanyeva vyavasthitā ?
GSP29nysvbh_u:1039: athāvyavasthātmani na vyavasthitā ? evamatādātmyādavyavasthā na bhavatīti
GSP29nysvbh_u:1042: yena kalpena bhavān samānadharmopapatteḥ saṃśaya iti manyate tena khalv atyantasaṃśayaḥ prasajyate--
GSP29nysvbh_u:1043: saṃśayānucchedaḥ-- nāyamataddharmā dharmī vimṛśyamāno gṛhyate satataṃ tu
GSP29nysvbh_u:1046: NyS_2,1.6: yathoktādhyavasāyādeva tadviśeṣāpekṣāt saṃśaye nāsaṃśayo nātyantasaṃśayo vā //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1047: na saṃśayānutpattiḥ saṃśayānucchedaśca prasajyate, katham ?. yattāvat--
GSP29nysvbh_u:1050: viśeṣasyāpekṣā = ākāṅkṣā sā cānupalabhyamāne vaśeṣe simarthā|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1052: samāne ca dharme kathamākāṅkṣā na bhaved yadyayamapratyakṣaḥ myāt, etena sāmarthyena vajñāyite-- 'samānadharmādhyavasāyāt' iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1053: upapattivacanādvā. samānadharmopapatterityucyate. na cānyā sadbhāvasaṃvedanādṛte samānadharmopapattirasti, anupalabhyamānasadbhāvo hi samāno dharmo 'vadyimānavad bhavatīti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1054: vaṣiyaśabdena vā vaṣiyiṇaḥ pratyayasyābhidhānaṃ yathā loke
GSP29nysvbh_u:1056: katham ?. dṛṣṭvā hi dhūmamathāgnimanuminoti nādṛṣṭe. na caṃ vākye
GSP29nysvbh_u:1057: darśanaśabdaḥ śrūyate. anujānāti ca vākyasyārthapratyāyakatvaṃ tena
GSP29nysvbh_u:1060: yaduktam-- 'samānamanayodharmamupalabhe iti dharmadharmigrahaṇe saṃśayābhāvaḥ' iti, pūrvadṛṣṭaviṣayametatuyāvahamarthau pūrvamadrākṣaṃ tayoḥ samānaṃ dharmamupalabhe viśeṣaṃ nopalabhe iti. kathaṃ nu viśeṣaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:1063: yaccoktam-- nārthāntarādhyavasāyādanyatra saṃśaya iti. yo hyarthāntarādhyavasāyamātraṃ saṃśayahetumupādadīta sa evaṃ vācya iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1064: yatpunaretat-- kāryakāraṇayoḥ sārūpyābhāvāditi, kāraṇasya bhāvābhāvayoḥ kāryasya bhāvābhāvau kāryakāraṇayoḥ sārūpyamuyasyotpādāt yadutpadyate yasya cānutpādād yannotpadyate tat kāraṇaṃ kāryamitarad ityetsārūpyam asti ca saṃśayakāraṇe saṃśaye caitaditi|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1067: pṛthakpravādayorvyāhatamarthamupalabhe viśeṣaṃ ca na jānāmiunopalabhe yenānyataramavadhārayeyaṃ tatkotra viśeṣaḥ syād yenaikataramavadhārayeyamiti saṃśayo vipratipattijanitoyaṃ na śakyo vipratipattisaṃpratipattimātreṇa nivartayitumiti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1069: yatpunaretat--"vipratipattau ca saṃpratipatteḥ3"iti, vipratipattiśabdasya yorthaḥ tadadhyavasāyo viśeṣāpekṣaḥ saṃśayahetustasya ca samākhyāntareṇa na nivṛttiḥusamāne 'dhikaraṇe vyāhatārthau pravādau vipratipattiśabdasyārthaḥ tadadhyavasāyaśca viśeṣāpekṣaḥ saṃśayahetuḥ na cāsya saṃpratipattiśabde samākhyāntare yojyamāne saṃśayahetutvaṃ nivartate. tadidamakṛtabuddhisaṃmohanamiti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1071: saṃśayahetorarthasyāpratiṣedhāt avyavasthābhyanujñānācca nimittāntareṇa śabdāntarakalpanā vyarthā, śabdāntarakalpanā-- 'avyavasthā khalv avyavasthā na bhavati-- avyavasthātmani vyavasthitatvāditi' nānayorupalabdhyanupalabdhyoḥ sadasadviṣayatvaṃ viśeṣāpekṣaṃ saṃśayaheturna bhavatīti pratiṣidhyate|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1072: yāvatā cāvyavasthātmani vyavasthitā na tāvatātmānaṃ jahāti tāvatā hyanujñātā bhavatyavyavasthā, evamiyaṃ kriyamāṇāpi śabdāntarakalpanā
GSP29nysvbh_u:1075: kiṃ tarhi ?. tadviṣayādhyavasāyād viśeṣasmṛtisahitāt iti. ato nātyantasaṃśaya iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1076: "anyataradharmādhyavasāyādvā na saṃśayaḥ"iti. tanna yuktam-- viśeṣāpekṣo vimarśaḥ saṃśayaḥ itivacanāt. viśeṣaścānyataradharmo na tasminn
GSP29nysvbh_u:1079: yatra yatra saṃśayapūrvikā parīkṣā śāstre kathāyāṃ vā tatra tatraivaṃ saṃśaye pareṇa pratiṣiddhe samādhirvācya iti, ataḥ sarvaparīkṣāvyāpitvāt prathamaṃ saṃśayaḥ parīkṣita iti // 7 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1085: NyS_2,1.9: pūrvaṃ hi pramāṇasiddhau nendriyārthasaṃnikarṣāt pratyakṣotpattiḥ //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1086: gandhādiviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tad yadi pūrvaṃ paścād gandhādīnāṃ siddhiḥ ? nedaṃ gandhādi saṃnikarṣādutpadyate iti // 9 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1088: asati pramāṇe kena pramīyamāṇo 'rthaḥ prameyaḥ syāt ?, pramāṇena khalu pramīyamāṇo 'rthaḥ prameyam ityetat sidhyati //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1091: yadi pramāṇaṃ prameyaṃ ca yugapad bhavataḥ ? evamapi gandhādiṣvindriyārtheṣu jñānāni pratyarthaniyatāni yugapad saṃbhavantīti
GSP29nysvbh_u:1092: jñānānāṃ pratyarthaniyatatvāt kramavṛttitvābhāvaḥuyā imā buddhayaḥ krameṇārtheṣu vartante tāsāṃ kramavṛttitvaṃ na saṃbhavatīti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1093: vyāghātaśca-- "yugapad jñānānutpattirmanaso liṅgam 1-1-26"iti, etāvāṃśca pramāṇaprameyayoḥ sadbhāvaviṣayaḥ sa cānupapanna iti, tasmāt pratyakṣādīnāṃ pramāṇatvaṃ na saṃbhavatīti // 11 asya samādhiḥ--- upalabdhihetorupalabdhiviṣayasya cārthasya pūrvāparasahabhāvā- 'niyamād yathādarśanaṃ vibhāgavacanam2.
GSP29nysvbh_u:1099: yathārtho dṛśyate tathā vibhajya vacanīya iti, tatraikāntena
GSP29nysvbh_u:1100: pratiṣedhānupapattiḥ-- sāmānyena khalu vibhajya pratiṣedha ukta iti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:1102: 'paścātsiddhauuasati pramāṇe prameyaṃ na sidhyati-- pramāṇena pramīyamāṇo 'rthaḥ prameyamiti vijñāyate' iti, pramāṇamityetasyāḥ samākhyāyā upalabdhihetutvaṃ nimittaṃ tasya traikālyayogaḥ-- 'upalabdhimakārṣīt'
GSP29nysvbh_u:1103: 'upalabdhiṃ karoti' 'upalabdhiṃ kariṣyati' iti samākhyāhetoḥ traikālyayogāt samākhyā tathābhūtā, pramito 'nenārthaḥ pramīyate pramāsyate iti pramāṇam. pramitaṃ pramīyate pramāsyate iti ca prameyam,
GSP29nysvbh_u:1106: traikālyānabhyanujñāne ca vyavahārānupapa4ttiḥ. yaścaivaṃ nābhyanujānīyāt tasya 'pācakamānaya pakṣyati' 'lāvakamānaya laviṣyatītivyavahāro nopapadyate iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1108: pramāṇapratiṣedhaḥ. tatrāyaṃ praṣṭavyaḥ- athānena pratiṣedhena bhavatā kiṃ kriyate iti, kiṃ saṃbhavo nivartyate ? athāsaṃbhāvo jñāpyate ? iti, tad yadi saṃbhavo nivartyate ? sati saṃbhave pratyakṣādīnāṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:1109: pratiṣedhānupapattiḥ, athāsaṃbhavo jñāpyate ? pramāṇalakṣaṇaṃ prāptastarhi pratiṣedhaḥ-- pramāṇāsaṃbhavasyopalabdhihetutvāditi // 11 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1112: asya tu vibhāgaḥ-- pūrvaṃ hi pratiṣedhasiddhāvasati pratiṣedhye kimanena pratiṣidhyate ?, paścāt siddhau pratiṣedhāsiddhiḥ- pratiṣedhābhāvāditi,
GSP29nysvbh_u:1114: pratiṣedhalakṣaṇe ca vākye 'nupapadyamāne siddhaṃ pratyakṣādīnāṃ pramāṇatvamiti // 12 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1117: hetvarthasya sādhakatvaṃ dṛṣṭānte darśayitavyamiti. na ca tarhi
GSP29nysvbh_u:1119: upādīyamānamapyudāharaṇaṃ nārthaṃ sādhayiṣyatīti. soyaṃ sarvapramāṇairvyāhato heturahetuḥ-- "siddhāntamabhyupetya tadvirodhī viruddhaḥ 1-2-6"iti, vākyārtho hyasya siddhāntaḥ sa ca vākyārthaḥ--
GSP29nysvbh_u:1120: 'pratyakṣādīni nārthaṃ sādhayanti' iti. idaṃ cāvayavānāmupādānamarthasya sādhanāyeti/ atha nopādīyate? apradarśitahetvarthasya dṛṣṭānte na
GSP29nysvbh_u:1123: pratiṣedhalakṣaṇe svavākye teṣāmavayavāśritānāṃ pratyakṣādīnāṃ prāmāṇye 'bhyanujñāyamāne paravākyepyavayavāśritānāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ prasajyate--
GSP29nysvbh_u:1124: aviśeṣāditi. evaṃ ca na sarvāṇi pramāṇāni pratiṣidhyante
GSP29nysvbh_u:1129: 'upalabdhihetorupalabdhiviṣayasya cārthasya pūrvāparasahabhāvāniyamād yathādarśanaṃ vibhāgavacanam' iti taditaḥ samuttthānaṃ yathā vijñāyeta|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1132: tatraikāṃ vidhāmudāharati-- śabdādātodyasiddhivaditi, yathā paścāt siddhena śabdane pūrvasiddhamātodyamanumīyate. sādhyaṃ cātodyaṃ sādhanaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:1133: ca śabdaḥ. antarhite hyātodye svanato 'numānaṃ bhavatīti-- vīṇā vādyate veṇuḥ pūryate iti svanaviśeṣeṇātodyaviśeṣaṃ pratipadyate. tathā pūrvasiddhamupalabdhiviṣayaṃ paścātsiddhenopalabdhihetunā pratipadyate
GSP29nysvbh_u:1135: kasmāt punariha tannocyate pūrvoktamupapādyate ? iti, sarvathā tāvadayamarthaḥ prakāśayitavyaḥ sa iha vā prakāśyeta tatra vā na kaścidviśeṣa iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1136: pramāṇaṃ prameyamiti ca samākhyā samāveśena vartate--
GSP29nysvbh_u:1138: upalabdhiviṣayaśca prameyamiti. yadā copalabdhiviṣayaḥ kvacidupalabdhisādhanaṃ bhavati tadā pramāṇaṃ prameyamiti caiko 'rtho
GSP29nysvbh_u:1142: gurutvaparimāṇajñānasādhanaṃ tulā pramāṇam. jñānaviṣayo gurudravyaṃ suvarṇādi prameyam. yadā (ca) suvarṇādinā tulāntaraṃ vyavasthāpyate tadā tulāntarapratipattau suvarṇādi pramāṇaṃ tulāntaraṃ prameyamiti,
GSP29nysvbh_u:1143: evamanavayavena tantrārtha uddiṣṭo veditavyaḥ-- ātmā tāvadupalabidhaviṣayatvāt prameye paripaṭhitaḥ upalabdhau ca svātantryāt
GSP29nysvbh_u:1145: prameyam. ubhayābhāvāt pramitiḥ evamarthaviśeṣe samākhyāsamāveśo yojyaḥ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1146: tathā ca kārakaśabdā nimittavaśāt samāveśena vartante iti.
GSP29nysvbh_u:1148: paśyatītidarśanenāptumiṣyamāṇatvāt karma. 'vṛkṣeṇa candramasaṃ jñāpayatīti jñāpakasya sādhakatamatvāt karaṇam. 'vṛkṣāyodakamāsiñcatīti
GSP29nysvbh_u:1149: āsicyamānenodakena vṛkṣamabhipraitīti saṃpradānam. 'vṛkṣāt parṇaṃ patatīti "dhruvamapāye 'pādānam" ityapādānam. 'vṛkṣe vayāṃsi santīti "ādhāro
GSP29nysvbh_u:1150: 'dhikaraṇam" ityadhikaraṇam, evaṃ ca sati ca dravyamātraṃ kārakaṃ na vā kriyāmātram|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1151: kiṃ tarhi ? kriyāsādhanaṃ kriyāviśeṣayuktaṃ kārakam--- yat kriyāsādhanaṃ svatantraḥ sa kartā. na dravyamātraṃ na kriyāmātram, kriyayā vyāptumiṣyamāṇatamaṃ karma. na dravyamātraṃ na kriyāmātram, evaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:1152: sādhakatamādiṣvapi, evaṃ ca kārakānvākhyānaṃ yathaivopapattita evaṃ lakṣaṇataḥ kārakānvākhyānamapi na dravyamātreṇa na kriyayā vā|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1153: kiṃ tarhi ?. kriyāsādhane kriyāviśeṣayukta iti, kāparakaśabdaścāyaṃ pramāṇaṃ prameyamiti sa ca kārakadharmaṃ na hātumarhati. asti bho kārakaśabdānāṃ nimittavaśāt samāveśaḥ pratyakṣādīni ca pramāṇāni--
GSP29nysvbh_u:1154: upalabdhihetutvāt. prameyaṃ ca-- upalabdhiviṣayatvāt, saṃvedyāni pratyakṣādīni pramāṇāni ca-- 'pratyakṣeṇopalabhe anumānenopalabhe upamānenopalabhe āgamenopalabhe. pratyakṣaṃ me jñānam ānumānikaṃ me jñānam
GSP29nysvbh_u:1155: aupamānikaṃ me jñānam āgamikaṃ me jñānam' iti viśeṣā gṛhyante,
GSP29nysvbh_u:1158: seyamupalabdhiḥ pratyakṣādiviṣayā kiṃ pramāṇāntarataḥ ? athāntareṇa pramāṇam = asādhanā ? iti, kaścātra viśeṣaḥ ?,
GSP29nysvbh_u:1160: yadi pratyakṣādīni pramāṇenopalabhyante ? yena pramāṇenopalabhyante tat
GSP29nysvbh_u:1165: yadi pratyakṣādyupalabdhau pramāṇāntaraṃ nivartate ? ātmetyupalabdhāvapi pramāṇāntaraṃ nivartsyati-- aviśeṣāt. evaṃ ca sarvapramāṇavilopa iti // 18
GSP29nysvbh_u:1168: yathā pradīpaprakāśaḥ pratyakṣāṅgatvād dṛśyadarśane pramāṇaṃ sa ca pratyakṣāntareṇa cakṣuṣaḥ saṃnikarṣeṇa gṛhyate, pradīpabhāvābhāvayordarśanasya tathābhāvād darśanaheturanumīyate. 'tamasi pradīpamupādadīthāḥ' ityāptopadeśenāpi
GSP29nysvbh_u:1171: indriyāṇi tāvat svaviṣayagrahaṇenaivānumīyante. arthāḥ pratyakṣato gṛhyante. indriyārthasaṃnikarṣāstvāvaraṇena
GSP29nysvbh_u:1172: indriyārthasaṃnikarṣotpannaṃ jñānamātmamanasoḥ saṃyogaviśeṣādātmasamavāyācca sukhādivad gṛhyate. evaṃ pramāṇaviśeṣo vibhajya vacanīyaḥ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1173: yathā ca dṛśyaḥ san pradīpaprakāśo dṛśyāntarāṇāṃ darśanaheturiti dṛśyadarśanavyavasthāṃ labhate evaṃ prameyaṃ sat kiñcidarthajātamupalabdhihetutvāt pramāṇaprameyavyavasthāṃ labhate, seyaṃ pratayakṣādibhireva pratyakṣādīnāṃ yathādarśanamupalabdhirna pramāṇāntarato na ca pramāṇamanteraṇa niḥsādhaneti //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1174: tanaiva tasyāgrahaṇamiti cet ? na-- arthabhedasya lakṣaṇasāmānyāt5|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1175: pratyakṣādīnāṃ pratyakṣādibhireva grahaṇamityayuktam-- anyena hyanyasya grahaṇaṃ dṛṣṭamiti, na-- arthabhedasya lakṣaṇasāmānyātupratyakṣalakṣaṇenānekorthaḥ saṃgṛhītastatra kena cit kasyacid grahaṇamityadoṣaḥ, evamanumānādiṣvapīti,
GSP29nysvbh_u:1178: 'ahaṃ sukhī ahaṃ duḥkhī ca' iti tenaiva jñātrā tasyaiva grahaṇaṃ dṛśyate."
GSP29nysvbh_u:1180: iti ca tenaiva manasā tasyaivānumānaṃ dṛśyate, jñāturjñeyasya cābhedo grahaṇasya grāhyasya cābheda iti //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1182: na nimittāntareṇa vinā jñātātmānaṃ jānīte. na ca nimittāntareṇa vinā manasā mano gṛhyate iti, samānametat |
GSP29nysvbh_u:1183: pratyakṣādibhiḥ pratyakṣādīnāṃ grahaṇam ityatrāpyarthabhedo na gṛhyate iti
GSP29nysvbh_u:1185: yadi syāt kiñcidarthajātaṃ pratyakṣādīnāmaviṣayaḥ yat pratyakṣādibhirna śakyaṃ grahītuṃ tasya grahaṇāya pramāṇāntaramupādīyeta tattu na śakyaṃ kenacidupapādayatumiti, pratayakṣādīnāṃ yathādarśanamevedaṃ saccāsacca
GSP29nysvbh_u:1188: viśeṣahetumantareṇa sādhyasādhanāyopādadate yathā pradīpaprakāśaḥ pradīpāntaraprakāśamantareṇa gṛhyate tathā pramāṇāni pramāṇāntaramantareṇa gṛhyante iti. sa cāyam--- kva cinnivṛttidarśanādanivṛttidarśanācca kva
GSP29nysvbh_u:1189: yathāyaṃ prasaṅgo nivṛttidarśanāt pramāṇasādhanāyopādīyate evaṃ prameyasādhanāyāpyupādeyaḥ-- aviśeṣahetutvāt, yathā sthālyādirūpagrahaṇe pradīpaprakāśaḥ prameyasādhanāyopādīyate evaṃ pramāṇa
GSP29nysvbh_u:1190: sādhanāyāpyupādeyaḥ-- viśeṣahetvabhāvāt, soyaṃ viśeṣahetuparigrahamantareṇa dṛṣṭānta ekasmin pakṣe upādeyo na pratipakṣe ityanekāntaḥ |
GSP29nysvbh_u:1193: viśeṣahetuparigṛhītastu dṛṣṭānta ekasmin pakṣe upasaṃhiyamāṇo na śakyo
GSP29nysvbh_u:1194: 'nanujñātum evaṃ ca sati 'anekāntaḥ' ityayaṃ pratiṣedho na bhavati|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1197: pratyakṣeṇārthamupalabhe anumānenārthamupalabhe upamānenārthamupalabhe āgamenārthamupalabhe iti. pratyakṣaṃ me jñānam ānumānikaṃ me jñānam
GSP29nysvbh_u:1198: aupamānikaṃ me jñānam āgamikaṃ me jñānamiti saṃvidviṣayaṃ saṃvinnimittaṃ copalabhamānasya dharmārthasukhāpavargaprayojanaḥ tatpratyanīkaparivarjanaprayojananaśca vyavahāra upapadyate soyaṃ tāvatyaiva nirvartate. na cāsti vyavahārāntaramanavasthāsādhanīyaṃ yena prayukto 'navasthāmupādadīteti sāmānyena pramāṇāni parīkṣya viśeṣeṇa parīkṣyante, tatra---
GSP29nysvbh_u:1200: ātmamanaḥsaṃnikarṣo hi kāraṇāntaraṃ noktamiti, na cāsaṃyukte dravye
GSP29nysvbh_u:1203: manaḥsaṃnikarṣānapekṣasya cendrinayārthasaṃnikarṣasya jñānakāraṇatve yugapadutpadyeran buddhaya iti manaḥsaṃnikarṣopi kāraṇam // 20 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1207: indriyārthasaṃnikarṣābhāvavaditi, sati cendriyārthasaṃnikarṣe jñānotpattidarśanāt kāraṇabhāvaṃ bruvate // 21 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1209: digādiṣu satsu jñānabhāvāt tānyapi kāraṇānīti. akāraṇabhāvepi jñānotpatterdigādisaṃnidheravarjanīyatvāt
GSP29nysvbh_u:1210: yadāpyakāraṇaṃ digādīni jñānotpattau tadāpi satsu digādiṣu jñānena bhavitavyaṃ na hi digādīnāṃ saṃnidhiḥ śakyaḥ parivarjayitumiti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1211: tatra kāraṇabhāve hetuvacanam-- etasmād hetordigādīni jñānakāraṇānīti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1215: jñānamātmaliṅgam-- tadguṇatavāt. na cāsaṃyukte dravye saṃyogajasya guṇasyotpattirastīti // NyS_2,1.24: tadayaugapadyaliṅgatvācca na manasaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1221: pratyakṣānumānopamānaśabdānāṃ nimittamātmamanaḥsaṃnikarṣaḥ pratyakṣasyaivendriyārthasaṃnikarṣa ity asamāno 'samānatvāt tasya grahaṇam // 25 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1223: indriyārthasaṃnikarṣasya grahaṇaṃ nātmamanasoḥ saṃnikarṣasyeti, ekadā khalvayaṃ prabodhakālaṃ praṇidhāya suptaḥ praṇidhānavaśāt prabudhyate,
GSP29nysvbh_u:1224: yadā tu tīvrau dhvanisparśauṃ prabodhakāraṇaṃ bhavatastadāprasuptasyendriyārthasaṃnikarṣanimittaṃ prabodhajñānamutpadyate tatra na jñāturmanasaś ca saṃnikarṣasya prādhānyaṃ bhavati, kiṃ tarhi ?. indriyārthayoḥ saṃnikarṣasya--nahyatmā jijñāsamānaḥ prayatnena manastadā prerayatīti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1225: ekadā khalvayaṃ viṣāyāntarāvyāsaktamanāḥ saṃkalpavaśād viṣayāntaraṃ jijñāsamānaḥ prayatnapreritena manasā indriyaṃ saṃyojya yad viṣayāntaraṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:1226: jānīte, yadā tu khalvasya niḥsaṃkalpasya nirjijñāsasya ca vyāsaktamanaso bāhyaviṣayopanipātanād jñānamutpadyate tadendriyārthasaṃnikarṣasya
GSP29nysvbh_u:1227: prādhānyam-- na hyatrāsau jijñāsamānaḥ prayatnena manaḥ prerayatīti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1228: prādhānyāccendrinayārthasaṃnikarṣasya grahaṇaṃ kāryaṃ guṇatvānnātmamanasoḥ saṃnikarṣasyeti prādhānye ca hetvantaram---
GSP29nysvbh_u:1236: yaduktam-- 'indriyārthasaṃnikarṣagrahaṇaṃ kāryaṃ nātmamanasoḥ saṃnikarṣasyeti. kasyāt ?. suptavyāsaktamanasāmindriyārthayoḥ saṃnikarṣasya jñānanimittatvāt' iti. soyam---
GSP29nysvbh_u:1238: yadi tāvat kvacidātmamanasoḥ sanikarṣasya jñānakāraṇatvaṃ neṣyate ? tadā
GSP29nysvbh_u:1242: atha mā bhūd vyāghāta iti sarvavijñānānāmātmamanasoḥ saṃnikarṣaḥ kāraṇamiṣyate ? tadavasthamevedaṃ bhavati-- 'jñānakāraṇatvādātmamanasoḥ
GSP29nysvbh_u:1245: nāsti vyāghātaḥ- na hyātmamanaḥsaṃnikarṣasya jñānakāraṇatvaṃ vyabhicarati.
GSP29nysvbh_u:1246: indriyārthasaṃnikarṣasya prādhānyamupādīyate-- arthaviśeṣaprābalyāddhi suptavyāsaktamanasāṃ jñānotpattirekadā bhavati|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1249: asati praṇidhāne saṃkalpe cāsati suptavyāsaktamanasāṃ yad indriyārthasaṃnikarṣādutpadyate jñānaṃ tatra manaḥsaṃyogopi kāraṇamiti manasi kriyākāraṇaṃ vācyamiti, yathaiva jñātuḥ khalvayamicchājanitaḥ
GSP29nysvbh_u:1250: prayatno manasaḥ preraka ātmaguṇa evamātmani guṇāntaraṃ sarvasya sādhakaṃ pravṛttidoṣajanitamasti yena preritaṃ mana indriyeṇa saṃbadhyate. tena hy apreryamāṇe manasi saṃyogābhāvāt jñānātutpattau sarvārthatāsya nivartate.
GSP29nysvbh_u:1251: eṣitavyaṃ cāsaya guṇāntarasya dravyaguṇakarmakārakatvam anyathā hi caturvidhānāmaṇūnāṃ bhūtasūkṣmāṇāṃ manasāṃ ca tato 'nyasya
GSP29nysvbh_u:1256: arvāgbhāgamayaṃ gṛhītvā vṛkṣamupalabhate na caikadeśo vṛkṣaḥ, tatra yathā dhūmaṃ gṛhītvā vahnimanuminoti tādṛgeva tad bhavati|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1258: avayavasamūhapakṣe avayavāntarāṇi dravyotpattipakṣe tāni cāvayavī ceti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1259: avayavasamūhapakṣe tāvadekadeśagrahaṇād vṛkṣabuddherabhāvaḥ-- na hy agṛhyamāṇamekadeśāntaraṃ vṛkṣo gṛhyamāṇaikadeśavaditi|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1260: atha ekadeśagrahaṇādekadeśāntarānumāne samudāyapratisaṃdhānāt tatra vṛkṣabuddhiḥ ?, na tarhi vṛkṣabuddhiranumānamevaṃ sati bhavitumarhatīti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1261: dravyāntarotpattipakṣe nāvayavy anumeyaḥ-- asyaikadeśasaṃbaddhasyāgrahaṇād grahaṇe cāviśeṣādanamumeyatvābhāvaḥ, tasmād vṛkṣabuddhiranumānaṃ na
GSP29nysvbh_u:1266: yat tadekadeśagrahaṇamāśrīyate pratyakṣeṇāsāvupalambhaḥ, na copalambho nirviṣayosti yāvaccārthajātaṃ tasya viṣayastāvadabhyanujñāyamānaṃ pratyakṣavyavasthāpakaṃ bhavati|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1268: na caivadeśagrahaṇam anumānaṃ bhāvayituṃ śakyam-- hetvabhāvāditi //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1271: dhūmapratyakṣadarśanād agnāvanumānaṃ bhavati. yacca saṃbaddhayorliṅgaliṅganoḥ pratyakṣaṃ yacca liṅmātrapratyakṣagrahaṇaṃ naitadantareṇānumānasya pravṛttirasti na tvetadanumānam--
GSP29nysvbh_u:1281: nāvayavī kṛtsno gṛhyate iti-- nāyaṃ gṛhyamāṇeṣvavayaveṣu parisamāpta iti,
GSP29nysvbh_u:1283: kṛtsnamiti vai khalvaśeṣatayāṃ satyāṃ bhavati. akṛtsnamiti śeṣe sati.
GSP29nysvbh_u:1284: taccaitad avayaveṣu bahuṣvasti-- avyavadhāne grahaṇād vyavadhāne
GSP29nysvbh_u:1286: aṅgaṃ tu bhavān pṛṣṭo vyācaṣṭām-- gṛhyamāṇasyāvayavinaḥ kimagṛhītaṃ manyase ? yenaikadeśopalabdhiḥ syāditi, na hyasya kāraṇebhyo 'nye ekadeśā
GSP29nysvbh_u:1288: idaṃ tasya vṛttam-- yeṣāmindriyasaṃnikarṣād grahaṇamavayavānāṃ taiḥ saha gṛhyateyeṣāmavayavānāṃ vyavadhānādagrahaṇaṃ taiḥ saha na gṛhyate|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1290: samudāyopyaśeṣatā vā samudāyo vṛkṣaḥ syāt ? tatprāptirvā ? ubhayathā grahaṇābhāvaḥ |
GSP29nysvbh_u:1291: mūlaskandhaśākhāpalāśādīnāmaśeṣatā vā samudāyo vṛkṣa iti syāt ? prāptirvā samudānayināmiti ? ubhayathā (api) samudāyabhūtasya vṛkṣasya grahaṇaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:1294: seyamekadeśagrahaṇasahacaritā vṛkṣabuddhirdravyāntarotpattau kalpate na samudāyamātre iti NyS_2,1.33: sādhyatvādavayavini saṃdehaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1298: anupapāditametat, evaṃ ca sati vipratipattimātraṃ bhavati vipratipatteścāvayavini saṃśaya iti // 33 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1302: kathaṃ kṛtvā ?, paramāṇusamavasthānaṃ tāvad darśanaviṣayo na bhavati--
GSP29nysvbh_u:1304: darśanaviṣayāśceme dravyādayo gṛhyante te niradhiṣṭhānā na gṛhyeranu gṛhyante tu-- 'kumbhoyaṃ śyāma eko mahān saṃyuktaḥ spandate asti
GSP29nysvbh_u:1305: mṛnmayaśca' iti. santi ceme guṇādayo dharmā iti. tena sarvasya grahaṇāt
GSP29nysvbh_u:1308: avayavyarthāntarabhūta iti, saṃgrahakārite vai dhāraṇākarṣaṇe, saṃgraho nāma saṃyogasahacaritaṃ guṇāntaraṃ snehadravatvakāritam apāṃ saṃyogādāme kumbhe agnisaṃyogāt pakve|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1312: athāvayavinaṃ pratyācakṣāṇakaḥ 'mā bhūt pratyakṣalopaḥ' ityaṇusañcayaṃ darśanaviṣayaṃ pratijānānaḥ kimanuyoktavyaḥ ? iti, 'ekamidaṃ dravyam'
GSP29nysvbh_u:1317: anekasmin eka iti vyāhatā buddhirna dṛśyate iti // 35 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1322: yathāgṛhyamāṇapṛthaktvānāṃ senāvanāṅgānām ārāt kāraṇāntarataḥ pṛthaktvasyāgrahaṇaṃ yathāgṛhyamāṇajātīnāṃ palāśa iti vā khadira iti vā nārāj jātigrahaṇaṃ bhavati yathāgṛhyamāṇapraspandānāṃ nārāt spandagrahaṇam. gṛhyamāṇe cārthajāte pṛthaktvasyāgrahaṇāt 'ekam' iti bhāktaḥ pratyayo bhavati. na tvaṇūnāṃ gṛhyamāṇapṛthaktvānāṃ kāraṇataḥ pṛthaktvasyāgrahaṇād bhākta ekapratyayaḥ-- atīndriyatvādaṇṛnāmiti idameva parīkṣyate-- kimekapratyayo 'ṇusaṃcayaviṣayaḥ ? āho svinna ? iti,
GSP29nysvbh_u:1323: aṇusaṃcaya eva senāvanāṅgāni, na ca parīkṣyamāṇamudāharaṇamiti yuktam--
GSP29nysvbh_u:1327: 'ekam' itigrahaṇaṃ na ca dṛṣṭaṃ śakyaṃ pratyākhyātumiti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1329: darśanaviṣaya evāyaṃ parīkṣyate yoyamekamiti pratyayo dṛśyate sa
GSP29nysvbh_u:1330: parīkṣyate-- kiṃ dravyāntaraviṣayo vā ? athāṇusaṃcayaviṣayaḥ ? iti, atra darśanamanyatarasya sādhakaṃ na bhavati|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1331: nānābhāve cāṇūnāṃ pṛthaktvasyāgrahaṇādabhedena 'ekam' itigrahaṇam atasmiṃstaditipratyayo yathā sthāṇau puruṣa iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1333: sthāṇau puruṣa iti pratyayasya kiṃ pradhānam ?. yo 'sau puruṣe puruṣapratyayaḥ tasmin sati puruṣasāmānyagrahaṇāt sthāṇau puruṣoyamiti,
GSP29nysvbh_u:1334: evaṃ nānābhūteṣu 'ekam' iti sāmānyagrahaṇāt pradhāne sati bhavitumarhati pradhānaṃ ca sarvasyāgrahaṇād nopapadyate iti. tasmādabhinne
GSP29nysvbh_u:1338: śrotrādiviṣayeṣu śabdādiṣvabhinneṣu ekapratyayaḥ pradhānam anekasminn ekapratyayasyeti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1339: evaṃ ca sati dṛṣṭāntopādānaṃ na vyavatiṣṭhate-- viśeṣahetvabhāvāt, aṇuṣu saṃciteṣvekapratyayaḥ kimatasmiṃstaditipratyayaḥ sthāṇau puruṣapratyayavat ? athārthasya tathābhāvāt tasmiṃstaditipratyayo yathā śabdasyaikatvādekaḥ śabda iti ?, viśeṣahetuparigrahamantareṇa dṛṣṭāntau saṃśayamāpādayata iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1342: ekatvabuddhistasmiṃstaditipratyaya iti viśeṣahetuḥ-- mahaditi- pratyena sāmānādhikaraṇyāt
GSP29nysvbh_u:1345: aṇusamūhātiśayagrahaṇaṃ mahatpratyaya iticet ? so 'yam amahatsvaṇuṣu mahatpratyayo 'tasmiṃstaditipratyayo
GSP29nysvbh_u:1348: aṇuḥ śabdo mahāniti ca vyavasāyāt pradhānasiddhiriticet ? na--
GSP29nysvbh_u:1350: 'aṇuḥ śabdo 'lpo mandaḥ' ityetasya grahaṇam 'mahān śabdaḥ paṭustīvraḥ'
GSP29nysvbh_u:1351: ityetasya grahaṇam, kasmāt ? iyattānavadhāraṇātuna hyayam 'mahān śabdaḥ'
GSP29nysvbh_u:1355: koyaṃ samudāyaḥ ? prāptiranekasya ? anekā vā prāptirekasya samudāya iticet ? prāpteragrahaṇaṃ prāptyāśritāyā |
GSP29nysvbh_u:1356: 'saṃyukte ime vastunī' iti nātra dve prāptī saṃyukte gṛhyete //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1357: anekasamūhaḥ sudāya iticet ? na-- dvitvena sāmānādhikaraṇyasya grahaṇāt |
GSP29nysvbh_u:1358: 'dvāvimau saṃyuktāvarthauṃ' iti grahaṇe sati nānekasamūhāśrayaḥ saṃyogo gṛhyate na ca dvayoraṇvorgrahaṇamasti tasmānmahatī dvitvāśrayabhūte dravye saṃyogasya sthānamiti//
GSP29nysvbh_u:1361: śabdarūpādispandānāṃ hetuḥ saṃyogaḥ-- na ca dravyayorguṇāntaropajananamantareṇa śabde rūpādiṣu spande ca kāraṇatvaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:1364: 'kuṇḍalī guruḥ akuṇḍalaśchātraḥ' iti saṃyogabuddheśca yadyarthāntaraṃpa na viṣayaḥ ? arthāntarapratiṣedhastarhi
GSP29nysvbh_u:1366: 'saṃyukte dravye' iti yadarthāntaramanyatra dṛṣṭamiha pratiṣidhyate tad vaktavyamiti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1371: kimaprāpte aṇusamavasthāne tadāśrayo jātiviśeṣo gṛhyate ? atha prāpte ?
GSP29nysvbh_u:1379: tāvadasyādhikaraṇamiti prāptaṃ bhavati tatra--- ekasamudāye pratīyamāne 'rthabhede |
GSP29nysvbh_u:1380: evaṃ ca sati yo 'ṇusamudāyo vṛkṣa iti pratīyate tatra vṛkṣabahutvaṃ pratīyetauyatra yatra hyaṇusamudāyasya bhāge vṛkṣatvaṃ gṛhyate sa sa vṛkṣa
GSP29nysvbh_u:1381: iti, tasmāt samuditāṇusamavasthānasyārthāntarasya jātiviśeṣābhivyaktiviṣayatvād avayavyarthāntarabhūta iti // 36 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1386: rodhādapi nadī pūrṇā gṛhyate tadā ca 'upariṣṭhād vṛṣṭo devaḥ' iti
GSP29nysvbh_u:1387: mithyānumānam. nīḍopaghātādapi pipīlikāṇḍasaṃcāro bhavati tadā ca 'bhaviṣyati vṛṣṭiḥ' iti mithyānumānamiti, puruṣopi mayūravāśitamanukaroti tadāpi śabdasādṛśyād mithyānumānaṃ bhavati NyS_2,1.38: naikadeśatrāsasādṛśyebhyo 'rthāntarabhāvāt //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1389: katham ?. nāviśiṣṭo liṅgaṃ bhavitumarhati, pūrvodakaviśiṣṭaṃ khalu varṣodakaṃ śīghrataratvaṃ srotaso bahutaraphenaphalaparṇakāṣṭhādivahanaṃ copalabhamānaḥ pūrṇatvena nadyāḥ 'upari vṛṣṭo devaḥ' ityanuminoti
GSP29nysvbh_u:1394: mithyānumānamiti, yastu viśiṣṭācchabdād viśiṣṭamayūravāśitaṃ gṛhṇati tasya viśiṣṭo 'rtho gṛhyamāṇo liṅgaṃ yathā sarpādīnāmiti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1399: vṛntāt pracyutasya phalasya bhūmau pratyāsīdato yad ūrdhvaṃ sa patito
GSP29nysvbh_u:1401: tatsaṃyuktaḥ kālaḥ patitavyakālaḥ, nedānīṃ tṛtīyo 'dhvā vidyate yatra patatīti vartamānaḥ kālo gṛhyeta. tasmād vartamānaḥ kālo na vidyate iti //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1404: patatīti yadā patanakriyā vyuparatā bhavati sa kālaḥ patitakālaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh_u:1405: yadotpatsyate sa patitavyakālaḥ, yadā dravye vartamānā kriyā gṛhyate sa
GSP29nysvbh_u:1406: vartamānaḥ kālaḥ, yadi cāyaṃ dravye vartamānaṃ patanaṃ na gṛhṇāti kasya uparamam utpatsyamānatāṃ vā prativadyate ?|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1407: patitaḥ kāla iti bhūtā kriyā, patitavyaḥ kāla iti cotpatsyamānā kriyā,
GSP29nysvbh_u:1408: ubhayoḥ kālayoḥ kriyāhīnaṃ dravyam, adhaḥ pratatīti kriyāsaṃbaddham, soyaṃ kriyādravyayoḥ saṃbandhaṃ gṛhṇāti vartamānaḥ kālaḥ tadāśrayau cetarau kālau tadabhāve na syātāmiti // NyS_2,1.41: nātītānāgatayoritaretarāpekṣā siddhiḥ //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1412: kena kalpena atītaḥ. kathamatītāpekṣānāgatasiddhiḥ ? kena ca kalpenānāgataḥ ? iti. naitacchakyaṃ nirvaktum |
GSP29nysvbh_u:1416: viśeṣahetvabhāvāt. dṛṣṭāntavat pratidṛṣṭāntopi prasajyate-- yathā rūpasparśauṃ gandharasau netaretarāpekṣau sidhyataḥ evamatītānāgatāviti
GSP29nysvbh_u:1420: yadyanyatarasyaikāpekṣā siddhiḥ ? ekasyedānīṃ kimapekṣā ?, evamekasyābhāve anyataranna sidhyatīti ubhayābhāvaḥ prasajyate|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1426: asad indriyeṇa saṃnikṛṣyate, na cāyaṃ vidyamānam |
GSP29nysvbh_u:1427: sat kiñcidanujānātīti pratyakṣanimittaṃ pratyakṣaviṣayaḥ pratyakṣajñānaṃ sarvaṃ nopapadyate, pratyakṣānupapattau tatpūrvakatvād anumānāgamayoranupapattiḥ sarvapramāṇavilope sarvagrahaṇaṃ na bhavatīti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1428: ubhayathā ca vartamānaḥ kālo gṛhyate-- kvacidarthasadbhāvavyaṅgyo yathā 'asti dravyam' iti. kvacit kriyāsaṃtānavyaṅgyo yathā 'pacati chinattīti.
GSP29nysvbh_u:1429: nānāvidhā caikārthā kriyā kriyāsaṃtānaḥ kriyābhyāsaśca, nānāvidhā caikārthā kriyā 'pacatīti
GSP29nysvbh_u:1430: sthālyadhiśrayaṇam udakāsecanaṃ taṇḍulāvapanamedhopasarpaṇam agnyabhijvālanaṃ darvīghaṭṭanaṃ maṇḍasrāvaṇam adhovatāraṇamiti. chinattīti
GSP29nysvbh_u:1431: kriyābhyāsaḥ-- udyabhyodyamya paraśuṃ dāruṇi nipātayan chinattītyucyate //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1432: yaccedaṃ pacyamānaṃ chidyamānaṃ ca tat kriyamāṇaṃ tasmin kriyamāṇe---
GSP29nysvbh_u:1436: ārabdhakriyāsaṃtāno vartamānaḥ kālaḥ 'pacatīti, tatra yā uparatā sā kṛtatā yā cikīrṣitā sā kartavyatā yā vidyamānā sā kriyamāṇatā. tadevaṃ kriyāsaṃtānasthaḥ traikālyasamāhāraḥ 'pacati pacyate' iti vartamānagrahaṇena gṛhyate-- kriyāsaṃtānasya hyatrāvicchedo vidhīyate
GSP29nysvbh_u:1438: soyamubhayathā vartamānāṃ gṛhyate-- apavṛkto vyapavṛktaśca atītānāgatābhyām. sthitivyaṅgyaḥ-- 'vidyate dravyam' iti.
GSP29nysvbh_u:1440: anyaśca pratyāsattiprabhṛterrathasya vivakṣāyāṃ tadabhidhāyī bahuprakāro lokeṣūtprekṣitavyaḥ, tasmādasti vartamānaḥ kāla iti // 43 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1443: atyantasādharmyādupāmanaṃ na sidhyati-- na caivaṃ bhavati 'yathā gaurevaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:1444: gauḥ' iti, prāyaḥsādharmyādupamānaṃ na sidhyati-- na hi bhavati
GSP29nysvbh_u:1445: 'yathānaḍvānevaṃ mahiṣaḥ' iti, ekadeśasādharmyādupamānaṃ na sidhyati-- na hi sarveṇa sarvamupamīyate iti // 44 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1447: na sādharmyasya kṛtsnaprāyālpabhāvamāśrityopamānaṃ pravartate, kiṃ tarhi ?. prasiddhasādharmyāt sādhyasādhanabhāvamāśritya pravartate. yatra caitadasti na tatropamānaṃ pratiṣeddhuṃ śakyaṃ tasmād yathoktadoṣo nopapadyate iti// 45 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1450: yathā dhūmena pratyakṣeṇāpratyakṣasya vahnergrahaṇamanumānam evaṃ gavā pratyakṣeṇāpratyakṣasya gavayasya grahaṇamiti nedamanumānād viśiṣyate //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1452: NyS_2,1.47: nāpratyakṣe gavaye pramāṇārthamupamānasya paśyāma iti //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1453: yadā hyayamupayuktopamāno godarśī gavā samānamarthaṃ paśyati tadā ayaṃ gavaya ityasya saṃjñāśabdasya vyavasthāṃ pratipadyate na
GSP29nysvbh_u:1458: bhavati ca bhoḥ svayamadhyavasāyaḥ- yathā gaurevaṃ gavaya iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1459: nādhyavasāyaḥ pratiṣidhyate upamānaṃ tu tanna bhavati--"prasiddhasādharmyāt
GSP29nysvbh_u:1460: sādhyasādhanamupamānam 1-1-6"na ca yasyopameyaṃ prasiddhaṃ taṃ prati sādhyasādhanabhāvo vidyate iti // 47 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1463: tathetisamānadharmopasaṃhārādupamānaṃ sidhyati nānumānam-- ayaṃ cānayorviśeṣa iti // 48 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1467: kathamanumeyatvam ? pratyakṣato 'nupalabdheḥ, yathānupalabhyamāno liṅgī mitena liṅgena paścād mīyate ityanumānam evaṃ mitena śabdena paścād mīyate
GSP29nysvbh_u:1471: pramāṇāntarabhāve dvipravṛttirupalabdhiḥ = anyathā hyupalabdhiranumāne anyathopamāne tad vyākhyātam, śabdānumānayostūpalabdhiradvipravṛttiḥ yathānumāne pravartate tathā śabdepi, viśeṣābhāvādanumānaṃ śabda iti // 50
GSP29nysvbh_u:1474: śabdopalabdherarthagrahaṇaṃ yathā saṃbaddhayorliṅgaliṅginoḥ saṃbandhapratītau liṅgopalabdhau liṅgigrahaṇamiti // 51 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1477: 'svargaḥ apsarasaḥ uttarāḥ kuravaḥ sapta dvīpāḥ samudro lokasaṃniveśaḥ'
GSP29nysvbh_u:1478: ityevamāderapratyakṣasyārthasya na śabdamātrāt pratyayaḥ, kiṃ tarhi ?
GSP29nysvbh_u:1479: 'āptairayamuktaḥ śabdaḥ' ityataḥ saṃpratyayaḥ-- viparyayeṇa saṃpratyayābhāvāt na tvevamanumānamiti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1482: ayameva śabdānumānayorupalabdheḥ pravṛttibhedaḥ tatra viśeṣe satyahetuḥ--
GSP29nysvbh_u:1484: yat punaridam--"saṃbandhācca"iti, asti ca śabdārthayoḥ saṃbandho 'nujñātaḥ
GSP29nysvbh_u:1485: asti ca pratiṣiddhaḥu 'asyedam' itiṣaṣṭhīviśiṣṭasya vākyasyārthaviśeṣo 'nujñātaḥ prāptilakṣaṇastu śabdārthayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ pratiṣiddhaḥ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1487: śabdārthaprāpternopalabdhiḥ-- atīndriyatvātuyenendriyeṇa gṛhyate śabdastasya viṣayabhāvamativṛtto 'rtho na gṛhyate, asti
GSP29nysvbh_u:1490: prāptilakṣaṇe ca gṛhyamāṇe saṃbandhe śabdārthayoḥ śabdāntike vārthaḥ syāt arthāntike vā śabdaḥ syāt ubhayaṃ vobhayatra // 52 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1495: etasmin pakṣe 'py āsyasthānakaraṇoccāraṇīyaḥ śabdastadantike 'rtha iti annāgnyasiśabdoccāraṇe pūraṇapradāhapāṭanāni gṛhyeran. na ca gṛhyante,
GSP29nysvbh_u:1497: arthāntike śabdaṃ iti-- sthānakaraṇāsaṃbhavād anuccāraṇam, sthānaṃ kaṇṭhādayaḥ karaṇaṃ prayatnaviśeṣaḥ tasyārthāntike 'nupapattiriti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1501: śabdārthapratyayasya vyavasthādarśanād anumīyate-- asti śabdārthasaṃbandho vyavasthākāraṇam, asaṃbandhe hi śabdamātrādarthamātre pratyayaprasaṅgaḥ tasmādapratiṣedhaḥ saṃbandhasyeti // atra samādhiḥ---
GSP29nysvbh_u:1503: na saṃbandhakāritaṃ śabdārthavyavasthānam. kiṃ tarhi ?. samayakāritaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:1505: śabdārthayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ' iti samayaṃ tamavocāma iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1507: ityabhidhānābhidhaiyaniyamaniyogaḥ, tasminnupayukte śabdādarthasaṃpratyayo bhavati, viparyaye hi śabdaśravaṇepi pratyayābhāvaḥ, saṃbandhavādināpi cāyamavarjanīya iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1511: tadevaṃ prāptilakṣaṇasya śabdārthasaṃbandhasyārthajuṣo 'py anumānahetur na bhavatīti // NyS_2,1.56: jātiviśeṣe cāniyamāt //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1512: sāmayikaḥ śabdārthasaṃpratyayo na svābhāvikaḥ-- ṛṣyāryamlecchānāṃ yathākāmaṃ śabdaprayogo 'rthapratyāyanāya pravartate, svābhāvike hi śabdasyārthapratyāyakatve yathākāmaṃ na syāt, yathā taijasasya prakāśasya
GSP29nysvbh_u:1517: śabdasya pramāṇatvaṃ na saṃbhavati, kasmāt ?. anṛtadoṣāt--
GSP29nysvbh_u:1518: putrakāmeṣṭau--"putrakāmaḥ putreṣṭyā yajeta"iti. neṣṭau saṃsthitāyāṃ putrajanma dṛśyate, dṛṣṭārthasya vākyasyānṛtatvāt adṛṣṭārthamapi
GSP29nysvbh_u:1526: punaruktadoṣo bhavati. punarukta ca pramattavākyamiti. tasmādapramāṇaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:1529: nānṛtadoṣaḥ putrakāmeṣṭau, kasmāt ?, karmakartṛsādhanavaiguṇyāt, iṣṭyā pitarau saṃyujyamānau putraṃ janayata iti, iṣṭiḥ karaṇam sādhanaṃ. pitarau
GSP29nysvbh_u:1530: kartārau. saṃyogaḥ karma. trayāṇāṃ guṇayogāt putrajanma. vaiguṇyād
GSP29nysvbh_u:1531: viparyayaḥ, iṣṭyāśrayaṃ tāvat karmavaiguṇyaṃ samīhābhreṣaḥ, kartṛvaiguṇyam avidvān prayoktā kapūyācaraṇaśca, sādhanavaiguṇyaṃ havirasaṃskṛtam upahatamiti. mantrā nyūnādhikāḥ svaravarṇahīnā iti. dakṣiṇā durāgatā hīnā
GSP29nysvbh_u:1533: athopajanāśrayaṃ karmavaiguṇyaṃ mithyāsaṃprayogaḥ, kartṛvaiguṇyaṃ yonivyāpādo bījopaghātaśceti, sādhanavaiguṇyam iṣṭāvabhihitam|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1534: loke ca 'agnikāmo dāruṇī mathnīyāt' iti vidhivākyam tatra karmavaiguṇyaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:1536: sādhanavaiguṇyam ārdraṃ suṣiraṃ dāru iti. tatra phalaṃ na niṣpadyate iti nānṛtadoṣaḥ, guṇayogena phalaniṣpattidarśanāt, na cedaṃ laukikād
GSP29nysvbh_u:1539: 'na vyāghāto havane' ityanuvartate, yo 'bhyupagataṃ havanakālaṃ bhinatti tato 'nyatra juhoti tatrāyamabhyupagatakālabhedo doṣa ucyate--"śyāvo
GSP29nysvbh_u:1545: trirvacanena hi prathamottamayoḥ pañcadaśatvaṃ sāmadhenīnāṃ bhavati tathā ca mantrābhivādaḥ--"idamahaṃ bhrātṛvyaṃ pañcadaśāreṇa vāgvajreṇa bādhe yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ"iti pañcadaśasāmidhenīvajraṃ mantro 'bhivadati tadabhyāsamantareṇa na syāditi // 60 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1550: tridhā khalu brāhmaṇavākyāni viniyuktāni-- vidhivacanāni arthavādavacanāni anuvādavacanānīti tatra---
GSP29nysvbh_u:1553: codakaṃ sa vidhiḥ, vidhistu niyogo 'nujñā vā yathā --"agnihotraṃ juhuyāt
GSP29nysvbh_u:1556: vidheḥ phalavādalakṣaṇā yā praśaṃsā sā stutiḥ saṃpratyayārthā-- stūyamānaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:1558: sarvajito vai devāḥ sarvamajayan sarvasyāptyai sarvasya jityai sarvameva tenāpnoti sarvaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:1560: aniṣṭaphalavādo nindā varjanārthā-- ninditaṃ na samācarediti"
GSP29nysvbh_u:1561: sa eṣa vā va prathamo yajño yajñānāṃ yajjyotiṣṭomo ya etenāniṣṭvānyena yajate garte patati
GSP29nysvbh_u:1565: hutvā vapāmevāgre 'bhidhārayanti atha pṛṣadājyaṃ taduha carakādhvaryavaḥ pṛṣadājyamevāgre 'bhidhārayanti 'agneḥ prāṇāḥ pṛṣadājyaṃ stomam'
GSP29nysvbh_u:1569: tasmādvā etena brāhmaṇā bahiṣpavamānaṃ sāmastomamastauṣan-- yone yajñaṃ pratanavāmahe"
GSP29nysvbh_u:1571: kathaṃ parakṛtipurākalpau arthavādāviti ?, stutinindāvākyenābhisaṃbandhād vidhyāśrayasya kasyacidarthasya dyotanādarthavāda iti // 64 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1577: vihitamadhikṛtya stutirbodhyate nindā vā vidhiśeṣo vābhidhiyate,
GSP29nysvbh_u:1579: lokepi ca vidhirarthavādo 'nuvāda iti ca trividhaṃ vākyam-- 'odanaṃ pacet'
GSP29nysvbh_u:1580: iti vidhivākyam, arthavādavākyam-- 'āyurvarco balaṃ sukhaṃ pratibhānaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:1581: cānne pratiṣṭhitam', anuvādaḥ-- 'pacatu pacatu bhavān' ityabhyāsaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh_u:1582: 'kṣipraṃ pacyatām' iti vā 'aṅga pacyatām' iti (vā) adhyeṣaṇārtham,
GSP29nysvbh_u:1584: yathā laukike vākye vibhāgenārthagrahaṇāt pramāṇatvam evaṃ vedavākyānāmapi vibhāgenārthagrahaṇāt pramāṇatvaṃ bhavitumarhatīti // 65 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1587: kasmāt ?. ubhayatra hi pratītārthaḥ śabdo 'bhyastate. caritārthasya śabdasyābhyāsādubhayamasādhviti NyS_2,1.67: śīghrataragamanopadeśavadabhyāsānnāviśeṣaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1589: kasmāt ?, arthavato 'bhyāsasyānuvādabhāvāt, samāne 'bhyāse punaruktam anarthakam arthavānabhyāso 'nuvādaḥ-- śīghrataragamanopadeśavat 'śīghraṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:1590: śīghraṃ gamyatām' iti kriyātiśayo 'bhyāsenaivocyate. udāharaṇārthaṃ cedam,
GSP29nysvbh_u:1592: ramaṇīyaḥ' iti vyāptiḥ, 'pari pari trigartebhyo vṛṣṭo devaḥ' iti
GSP29nysvbh_u:1593: parivarjanam, 'adhyadhimaṇḍaṃ niṣaṇṇam, iti sāmīpyam, 'tiktaṃ tiktam' iti
GSP29nysvbh_u:1594: prakāraḥ, evamanuvādasya stutinindāśeṣavidhiṣu adhikārārthatāvihitānantarārthatā ceti // kiṃ punaḥ pratiṣedhahetūddhārādeva śabdasya pramāṇatvaṃ sidhyati ?. na,
GSP29nysvbh_u:1605: āptāḥ khalu sākṣātkṛtadharmāṇaḥ 'idaṃ hātavyam idamasya hānihetuḥ.
GSP29nysvbh_u:1606: idamasyādhigatavyam idamasyādhigamahetuḥ' iti bhūtānyanukampante, teṣāṃ khalu vai prāṇabhṛtāṃ svayamanavabuddhyamānānāṃ nānyadupadeśād
GSP29nysvbh_u:1607: avabodhakāraṇamasti, na cānavabodhe samīhā varjanaṃ vā, na cākṛtvā svastibhāvaḥ, nāpy asyānya upakārakopyasti, hanta vayamebhyo yathādarśanaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:1608: yathābhūtamupadiśāmaḥ te ime śrutvā pratipadyamānā heyaṃ hāsyanti adhigantavyamevādhigamiṣyantīti evamāptopadeśaḥ etena trividhenāptaprāmāṇyena parigṛhito 'nuṣṭhīyamāno 'rthasya sādhako bhavati.
GSP29nysvbh_u:1618: draṣṭṛpravaktṛsāmānyāccānumānam-- ye evāptā vedārthānāṃ draṣṭāraḥ pravaktāraścate evāyurvedaprabhṛtīnām
GSP29nysvbh_u:1621: śabdasya vācakatvādarthapratipattau pramāṇatvaṃ, nityatve hi sarvasya
GSP29nysvbh_u:1627: anāptopadeśo laikiko na nitya iti kāraṇaṃ vācyamiti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1628: yathāniyogaṃ cārthasya pratyāyanād nāmadheyaśabdānāṃ loke prāmāṇyam.
GSP29nysvbh_u:1630: yatrārthe nāmadheyaśabdo niyujyate loke tasya niyogasāmarthyāt pratyāyako bhavati na nityatvāt|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1631: manvantarayugāntareṣu cātītānāgateṣu saṃpradāyābhyāsaprayogāviccheda iti vedānāṃ nityatvam. āptaprāmāṇyācca prāmāṇyam, laukikeṣu śabdeṣu caitat
GSP29nysvbh_u:1638: kiṃ tarhi ?. aitihyamarthāpattiḥ saṃbhavo 'bhāva ityetānyapi pramāṇāni tāni kasmānnoktāni
GSP29nysvbh_u:1642: prasaṅgaḥ, yatrābhidhīyamāne 'rthe yo 'nyo 'rthaḥ prasajyate so 'rthāpattiḥ yathā-- 'megheṣv asatsu vṛṣṭirna bhavatīti, kimatra prasajyate ? 'tatsu bhavatīti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1643: saṃbhavo nāma avinābhāvino 'rthasya sattāgrahaṇādanyasya sattagrahaṇaṃ yathā-- droṇasya sattāgrahaṇā-- dāḍhakasya sattāgrahaṇam. āḍhakasya grahaṇāt prasthasyeti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1644: abhāvaḥ-- virodhī abhūtaṃ bhūtasya. avidyamānaṃ varṣakarma vidyamānasya
GSP29nysvbh_u:1647: satyam etāni pramāṇāni na tu pramāṇāntarāṇi. pramāṇāntaraṃ ca manyamānena
GSP29nysvbh_u:1652: katham?, 'āptopadeśaḥ śabdaḥ' iti. na ca śabdalakṣaṇam aitihyād
GSP29nysvbh_u:1653: vyāvartate. soyaṃ bhedaḥ sāmānyāt saṃgṛhyate iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1655: cārthāpattisaṃbhavābhāvāḥ, vākyārthasaṃpratyayenānabhihitasyārthasya pratyakanīkabhāvād grahaṇam arthāpattiranumānameva, avinābhāvavṛttyā ca saṃbaddhayoḥ samudāyasamudāyinoḥ samudāyenetarasya grahaṇaṃ saṃbhavaḥ tadapyanumānameva, 'asmin satīdaṃ nopapadyate' iti virodhitve prasiddhe
GSP29nysvbh_u:1657: soyaṃ yathārtha eva pramāṇoddeśa iti 'satyametāni pramāṇāni na tu
GSP29nysvbh_u:1661: asatsu megheṣu vṛṣṭirna bhavatīti satsu bhavati ityetadārthādāpadyate.
GSP29nysvbh_u:1666: kāraṇe kāryamutpadyate' ityarthādāpadyate. abhāvasya hi bhāvaḥ pratyanīka
GSP29nysvbh_u:1667: iti. soyaṃ kāryotpādaḥ sati kāraṇe 'rthādāpadyamāno na kāraṇasya sattāṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:1668: vyabhicarati-- na khalv asati kāraṇe kāryamutpadyate tasmād nānaikāntikī|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1669: yattu 'sati kāraṇe nimittapratibandhāt kāryaṃ notpadyate' iti ?.
GSP29nysvbh_u:1671: kiṃ tarhyasyāḥ prameyam ?, sati kāraṇe kāryamupadyate iti |
GSP29nysvbh_u:1672: yo 'sau kāryotpādaḥ kāraṇasattāṃ na vyabhicarati tadasyāḥ prameyam|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1673: evaṃ tu sati anarthāpattau arthāpattyabhimānaṃ kṛtvā pratiṣedha ucyate iti, dṛṣṭaśca kāraṇadharmo na śakyaḥ pratyākhyātumiti // 4 1/
GSP29nysvbh_u:1675: 'arthāpattir na pramāṇam-- anaikāntikatvāt' iti vākyaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ
GSP29nysvbh_u:1676: tenānena arthāpatteḥ pramāṇatvaṃ pratiṣidhyate na sadbhāvaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh_u:1679: artha manyase niyataviṣayeṣvartheṣu svaviṣaye vyabhicāro bhavati. na ca pratiṣedhasya sadbhāvo viṣayaḥ ?, evaṃ tarhi---
GSP29nysvbh_u:1681: athāṅpatterapi kāryotpādane kāraṇasattāyā avyabhicāro viṣayaḥ na ca kāraṇadharmo nimittapratibandhāt kāyāṅnutpādakatvamiti // 6 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1690: katham ?. lakṣiteṣu vāsaḥsu anupādeyeṣu, upādeyānāmalakṣitānām alakṣaṇalakṣitatvāt = lakṣaṇābhāvena lakṣitatvāditi, ubhayasaṃnidhau'
GSP29nysvbh_u:1691: alakṣitāni vāsāṃsyānaya' iti prayukto yeṣu vāsaḥsatu lakṣaṇāni na bhavanti tāni lakṣaṇābhāvena pratipadyate pratipadya cānayati pratipattihetuśca pramāṇamiti // 8 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1692: NyS_2,2.9: asatyarthe nābhāva iti cen nānyalakṣaṇopapatteḥ //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1693: yatra bhūtvā kiñcinna bhavati tatra tasyābhāva upapadyate. na cālakṣiteṣu vāsaḥsu lakṣaṇāni bhūtvā na bhavanti. tasmātteṣu lakṣaṇābhāvo 'nupapanna
GSP29nysvbh_u:1695: yathāyamanyeṣu vāsaḥsu lakṣaṇānāmupapattiṃ paśyati naivamalakṣiteṣu soyaṃ lakṣaṇābhāvaṃ paśyan abhāvenārthaṃ pratipadyate iti // 9 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1698: vidyamānatā yeṣāṃ bhavati na teṣāmabhāvo lakṣaṇānām |
GSP29nysvbh_u:1699: yāni ca lakṣiteṣu vidyante lakṣaṇāni teṣāmalakṣiteṣvabhāva ity ahetuḥ--
GSP29nysvbh_u:1700: yāni khalu bhavanti teṣāmabhāvo vyāhata iti // 10 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1702: na brūmo yāni lakṣaṇāni bhavanti teṣāmabhāva iti kiṃ tu keṣu
GSP29nysvbh_u:1703: cillakṣaṇānyavasthitāni, anavasthitāni keṣucit. apekṣamāṇo yeṣu lakṣaṇānāṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:1704: bhāvaṃ na paśyati tāni lakṣaṇābhāvena prapidyate iti // 11 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1706: abhāvadvaitaṃ khalu bhavati-- prāk cotpatteravidyamānatā. utpannasya cātmano hānādavidyamānatā. tatrālakṣiteṣu vāsaḥsu prāgutpatteravidyamānatālakṣaṇo lakṣaṇānāmabhāvo netara iti // 12 "āptopadeśaḥ śabdaḥ 1-1-7"
GSP29nysvbh_u:1707: iti pramāṇabhāve viśeṣaṇaṃ bruvatā 'nānāprakāraḥ śabdaḥ' iti jñāpyate.
GSP29nysvbh_u:1708: tasmin sāmānyena vicāraḥ-- kiṃ nityo 'thānityaḥ ? iti, vimarśahetvanuyoge ca vipratipatteḥ saṃśayaḥ, 'ākāśaguṇaḥ śabdo vibhurnityo 'bhivyaktidharmakaḥ' ityeke, gandhādisahavṛttirdravyeṣu saṃniviṣṭo gandhādivadavasthito 'bhivyaktidharmakaḥ' ityapare, 'ākāśaguṇaḥ śabda utpattinirodhadharmako buddhivat' ityapare, 'mahābhūtasaṃkṣobhajaḥ śabdo
GSP29nysvbh_u:1716: utpattidharmakattvādanityaḥ śabda iti = bhūtvā na bhavati = vināśadharmaka
GSP29nysvbh_u:1721: kimayaṃ vyañjakena samānadeśo 'bhivyajyate rūpādivat ? atha saṃyogajācchabdācchabdasaṃtāne sati śrotrapratyāsanno gṛhyate ? iti---
GSP29nysvbh_u:1723: dāruvraścane dāruparaśusaṃyoganivṛttau dūrasthena śabdo gṛhyate. na ca vyañjakābhāve vyaṅgyagrahaṇaṃ bhavati tasmānna vyañjakaḥ saṃyogaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh_u:1724: utpādake tu saṃyoge saṃyogajācchabdācchabdasantāne sati śrotrapratyāsannasya grahaṇamiti yuktaṃ saṃyoganivṛttau śabdasya grahaṇamiti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1726: iti kṛtakamupacaryate-- 'tīvraṃ sukhaṃ mandaṃ sukham. tīvraṃ duḥkhaṃ mandaṃ duḥkham' iti. upacaryate ca-- 'tīvraḥ śabdo mandaḥ śabdaḥ' iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1727: vyañjakasya tathābhāvād grahaṇasya tīvramandatā rūpavaditi cet ? na--
GSP29nysvbh_u:1729: saṃyogasya vyañjakasya tīvramandatayā śabdagrahaṇasya tīvramandatā bhavati na tu śabdo bhidyate yathā prakāśasya tīvramandatayā rūpagrahaṇasyeti,
GSP29nysvbh_u:1730: tacca naivam-- abhibhavopapatteḥu tīvro bherīśabdo mandaṃ tantrīśabdam abhibhavati na mandaḥ, na ca śabdagrahaṇamabhibhāvakaṃ śabdaśca na bhidyate (iti), śabde tu bhidyamāne yukto 'bhibhavaḥ tasmādutpadyate śabdo nābhivyajyate iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1733: 'bhibhavaḥ-- na hi bherīśabdena tantrīsvanaḥ prāpta iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1735: artha manyeta 'asatyāṃ prāptāvabhibhavo bhavatīti, evaṃ sati yathā
GSP29nysvbh_u:1736: bherīśabdaḥ kañcit tantrīsvanamabhibhavati evamantikasthopādānāniva davīyaḥsthopādānānapi tantrīsvanānabhibhavet-- aprāpteraviśeṣāt. tatra kvacideva bheryā praṇāditāyāṃ sarvalokeṣu samānakālāstantrīsvanā na śrūyeran iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1737: nānābhūteṣu śabdasantāneṣu satsu śrotrapratyāsattibhāvena kasyacicchabdasyautīvreṇa mandasyābhibhavo yukta iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1738: kaḥ punarayamabhibhavo nāma ?, grāhyasamānajātīyagrahaṇakṛtamagrahaṇam abhibhavaḥ yatholkāprakāśasya grahaṇārhasyādityaprakāśeneti // 13 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1741: kasmāt ?, vyabhicārāt = ādimataḥ khalu ghaṭābhāvasya dṛṣṭaṃ nityatvam|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1742: kathamādimān ?, kāraṇavibhāgebhyo hi ghaṭo na bhavati|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1743: kathamasya nityatvam ? yo 'sau kāraṇavibhāgebhyo na bhavati na tasyābhāvo bhāvena kadācid nirvartyate iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1744: yadapi aindriyakatvāt. (iti) tadapi vyabhicarati = aindriyakaṃ ca sāmānyaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:1747: dṛṣṭo yathā hi bhavati-- 'vṛkṣasya pradeśaḥ kambalasya pradeśaḥ' evam--
GSP29nysvbh_u:1751: arthāntarasyānutpattidharmakasyātmahānānupapattirnityatvaṃ taccābhāve nopapadyate, bhāktaṃ tu bhavati-- yattatrātmānamahāsītuyad bhūtvā na
GSP29nysvbh_u:1752: bhavati na jātu tat punarbhavati. tatra nitya iva nityo ghaṭābhāva ityayaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:1754: tatra yathājātīyakaḥ śabdo na tathājātīyakaṃ kāryaṃ kiñcid nityaṃ dṛśyate ity avyabhicāraḥ yadapi 'sāmānyanityatvāt' iti. indriyapratyāsattigrāhyam aindriyakam iti---
GSP29nysvbh_u:1762: 'evamākāśapradeśaḥ ātmapradeśaḥ' iti. nātrākāśātmanoḥ kāraṇadravyamabhidhīyate yathā kṛtakasya|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1764: kiṃ tarhi tatrābhidhīyate ?, saṃyogasyāvyāpyavṛttitvamuparicchinnena dravyeṇākāśasvaya saṃyogo nākāśaṃ vyāpnoti = avyāpya vartate iti. tadasya kṛtakena dravyeṇa sāmānyam, na hyāmalakayoḥ saṃyogāśrayaṃ vyāpnoti,
GSP29nysvbh_u:1765: sāmānyakṛtā ca bhaktiḥ-- 'ākāśasya pradeśaḥ' iti, anenātmapradeśo
GSP29nysvbh_u:1768: parīkṣitā ca tīvramandatā śabdatattvaṃ na bhaktikṛteti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1769: kasmāt punaḥ sūtrakārasyāsminnarthe sūtraṃ na śrūyate iti ?, śīlamidaṃ bhagavataḥ sūtrakārasya bahuṣvadhikaraṇeṣu dvau pakṣau na vyavasthāpayati,
GSP29nysvbh_u:1772: athāpi khalu 'idamasti idaṃ nāstīti kuta etat pratipattavyamiti ?,
GSP29nysvbh_u:1777: kasmāt ?. āvaraṇādīnāmanupalabdhikāraṇānāmagrahaṇāt = anenāvṛtaḥ śabdo nopalabhyate asaṃnikṛṣṭaścendriyavyavadhānād ityevamādi anupalabdhikāraṇaṃ na gṛhyate iti. so 'yamanuccārito nāstīti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1779: kimidamuccāraṇaṃ nāmeti ?, vivakṣājanitena prayatnena koṣṭhyasya vāyoḥ preritasya kaṇṭhatālvādipratighātād
GSP29nysvbh_u:1780: saṃyogaviśeṣo vai pratighātaḥ pratiṣiddhaṃ ca saṃyogasya vyañjakatvaṃ tasmānna vyañjakābhāvādagrahaṇam api tvabhāvādeveti. soyamuccāryamāṇaḥ śrūyate śrūyamāṇaścābhūtvā bhavati ityanumīyate. ūrdhvañcoccāraṇānna śrūyate sa bhūtvā na bhavati = abhāvānna śrūyate iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1789: 'nāvaraṇamupalabhe' iti, yathā kuḍyenāvṛtasyāvaraṇamupalabhamānaḥ pratyātmameva saṃvedayate, seyamāvaraṇopalabdhivad āvaraṇānupalabdhirapi saṃvedyaiveti, evaṃ ca satyapahṛtaviṣayamuttaravākyamastīti abhyanujñāvādeva tūcyate jātivādinā---
GSP29nysvbh_u:1798: asaditi vyavasthitam, upalabdhyabhāvaścānupalabdhiriti seyamabhāvatvānnopalabhyate sacaca khalvāvaraṇaṃ tasyopalabdhyā bhavitavyaṃ na nopalabhyate tasmānnāstīti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1800: atha śabdasya nityatvaṃ pratijānānaḥ kasmād hetoḥ pratijānīte ?---
GSP29nysvbh_u:1802: asparśamākāśaṃ nityaṃ dṛṣṭamiti tathā ca śabda iti // 22 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1803: so 'yamubhayataḥ savyabhicāraḥ-- sparśavāṃścāṇurnityaḥ. asparśaṃ ca karmānityaṃ dṛṣṭam|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1811: saṃpradīyamānamavasthitaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ saṃpradīyate ca śabda ācāryeṇāntevāsine tasmādavasthita iti NyS_2,2.26: tadantarālānupalabdherahetuḥ //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1812: yena saṃpradīyate yasmai ca tayorantarāle 'vasthānamasya kena liṅgenopalabhyate ?, sapradīyamāno hyavasthitaḥ saṃprādāturapaiti
GSP29nysvbh_u:1815: adhyāpanaṃ liṅgam-- asati saṃpradāne 'dhyāpanaṃ na syāditi // 27 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1817: samānamadhyāpanamubhayoḥ pakṣayoḥ-- saṃśayānivṛtteḥ-- kimācāryasthaḥ śabdo 'stevāsinamāpadyate tadadhyāpanam ? āho svit nṛtyopadeśavad
GSP29nysvbh_u:1822: abhyasyamānamavasthitaṃ dṛṣṭam-- 'pañcakṛtvaḥ paśyatīti rūpamavasthitaṃ punaḥ punardṛśyate, bhavati ca śabde 'bhyāsaḥ-- 'daśakṛtvo 'dhīto 'nuvākaḥ
GSP29nysvbh_u:1823: viṃśatikṛtvo 'dhītaḥ' iti, tasmādavasthitasya punaḥ punaruccāraṇam abhyāsa iti // 29 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1825: anavasthānepyabhyāsasyābhidhānaṃ bhavati-- 'dvirnṛtyatu bhavān trirnṛtyatu bhavān' iti 'dviranṛtyat triranṛtyat' 'dviragnihotraṃ juhoti'
GSP29nysvbh_u:1827: evaṃ vyabhicārāt pratiṣiddhahetau anyaśabdasya prayogaḥ pratiṣidhyate---
GSP29nysvbh_u:1829: yadidam 'anyat' iti manyase tat svātmano 'nanyatvādanyanna bhavati evamanyatāyā abhāvaḥ, tatra yaduktam-- 'anyatvepyabhyāsopacārāt' iti etadayuktamiti // 31 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1832: anyasmād anyatāmupapādayati bhavān upapādya ca anyat pratyācaṣṭe,
