GSP29nysvbh_u:1833: 'ananyat' iti ca śabdamanujānāti. prayuṅkte ca 'ananyat' iti etat samāsapadam. anyaśabdoyaṃ pratiṣedhena saha samasyate. yadi cātrottaraṃ padaṃ nāsti kasyāyaṃ pratiṣedhenana saha samāsaḥ ?, tasmāt tayoranyānanyaśabdayoritaro 'nanyaśabda itaramanyaśabdamapekṣamāṇaḥ sidhyatīti tatra yaduktam-- 'anyatāyā abhāvaḥ' iti etadayuktamiti // 32 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1836: yadanityaṃ tasya vināśaḥ kāraṇād bhavati yathā loṣṭasya
GSP29nysvbh_u:1837: kāraṇadravyavibhāgāt, śabdaścedanityastasya vināśo yasmātkāraṇād bhavati tadupalabhyeta na copalabhyate tasmānnitya iti // 33 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1841: atha vidyamānasya nirnimittam aśravaṇamiti ?. vidyamānasya nirnimitto vināśa iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1842: samānaśca dṛṣṭavirodho nimittamantareṇa vināśe cāśrivaṇe ceti // 34 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1847: saṃyogavibhāgajāt śabdācchabdāntaraṃ tatopyanyat tatopyanyaditi, tatra kāryaḥ śabdaḥ kāraṇaśabdaṃ viruṇaddhi. pratighātidravyasaṃyogastu antyasya śabdasya nirodhakaḥ, dṛṣṭaṃ hi tiraḥpratikuḍyamantikasthenāpyaśravaṇaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:1849: ghaṇṭāyāmabhihanyamānāyāṃ tārastārataro mando mandatara iti śrutibhedād nānāśabdasaṃtāno 'vicchedena śrūyate, tatra nitye śabde
GSP29nysvbh_u:1850: ghaṇṭāsthamanyagataṃ vāvasthitaṃ saṃtānavṛtti vā abhivyaktikāraṇaṃ vācyaṃ yena śrutisaṃtāno bhavatīti, śabdabhede cāsati śrutibheda upapādayitavya
GSP29nysvbh_u:1852: anitye tu śabde ghaṇṭāsthaṃ saṃtānavṛtti saṃyogasahakāri nimittāntaraṃ saṃskārabhūtaṃ paṭumandamanuvartate tasyānuvṛttyā śabdasaṃtānānuvṛttiḥ paṭumandabhāvācca tīvramandatā śabdasya. tatkṛtaśca śrutibheda iti // 35
GSP29nysvbh_u:1853: na vai nirnimittāntaraṃ saṃskāra upalabhyate anupalabdhernāstīti---
GSP29nysvbh_u:1855: pāṇikarmaṇā pāṇighaṇṭāpraśleṣo bhavati tasmiṃśca sati śabdasaṃtāno nopalabhyate ataḥ śravaṇānupapattiḥ, tatra pratighātidravyasaṃyogaḥ śabdasya nimittāntaraṃ saṃskārabhūtaṃ niruṇaddhītyanumīyate. tasya ca nirodhāt śabdasaṃtāno notpadyate anutpanne ca śrutivicchedaḥ, yathā pratighātidravyasaṃyogādiṣoḥ kriyāhetau saṃskāre niruddhe gamanābhāva iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1856: kampasaṃtānasya sparśanendriyagrāhyasya coparamaḥ kāṃsyapātrādiṣu pāṇisaṃśleṣo liṅgaṃ saṃskārasaṃtānasyeti, tasmānnimittāntarasya saṃskārabhūtasya nānupalabdhiriti // 36 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1858: yadi yasya vināśakāraṇaṃ nopalabhyate tadavatiṣṭhate avasthānācca tasya nityatvaṃ prasajyate ? evaṃ yāni khalpimāni śabdaśravaṇāni śabdābhivyaktaya iti mataṃ na teṣāṃ vināśakāraṇaṃ bhavatopapādyate anupapādanādavasthānam avasthānāt teṣāṃ nityatvaṃ prasajyate iti, atha naivam ?ḥ na tarhi vināśakāraṇānupalabdheḥ śabdasyāvasthānānnityatvamiti
GSP29nysvbh_u:1864: pratiṣedhaḥ-- asparśatvāt śabdāśrayasya, rūpādisamānadeśasyāgrahaṇe śabdasaṃtānopapatterasparśavyāpidravyāśrayaḥ śabdaḥ iti jñāyate na ca kampasamānāśraya iti // 38 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1865: pratidravyaṃ rūpādibhiḥ saha saṃniviṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ samānadeśo vyajyate iti nopapadyate|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1869: yadi rūpādayaḥ śabdaśca pratidravyaṃ samastāḥusamuditāstasmin samāsasamudāye yo yathājātīyakaḥ saṃniviṣṭastasya tathājātīyasyaiva grahaṇena bhavitavyaṃ śabdasya rūpādivat, tatra yo 'yaṃ vibhāgaḥ eka dravye nānārūpā bhinnaśrutayo vidharmāṇaḥ śabdaḥ abhivyajyamānāḥ yacca vibhāgāntaraṃ sarūpāḥ samānaśrutayaḥ sadharmāṇaḥ śabdāḥ
GSP29nysvbh_u:1872: asti cāyaṃ vibhāgo vibhāgāntaraṃ ca tena vibhāgopapattermanyāmahe-- na pratidravyaṃ rūpādibhiḥ saha śabdaḥ saṃniviṣṭo vyajyate iti // 39 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1873: dvividhaścāyaṃ śabdaḥ-- varṇātmako dhvanimātraśca tatra varṇātmani
GSP29nysvbh_u:1876: 'dadhyatra' iti kecid ikāraḥ itvaṃ hitvā yatvamāpadyate iti vikāraṃ manyante, kecid ikārasya prayoge viṣayakṛte yad ikāraḥ sthānaṃ jahāti tatra yakārasya prayogaṃ bruvate, saṃhitāyāṃ viṣaye ikāro na prayujyate tasya sthāne yakāraḥ prayujyate sa ādeśa iti, ubhayamidamupadiśyate tatra na jñāyate kiṃ tattvamiti //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1878: satyanvaye kiñcid nivartate kiñcidupajāyate iti śakyeta vikāro 'numātuṃ na cānvayo gṛhyate tasmād vikāro nāstīti//
GSP29nysvbh_u:1880: vivṛtakaraṇa ikāraḥ īṣatspṛṣṭakaraṇo yakāraḥ tāvimau pṛthak karaṇākhyena prayatnenoccāraṇīyau tayorekasyāprayoge 'nyasya prayoga upapanna iti//
GSP29nysvbh_u:1882: yatremau ikārayakārau na vikārabhūtau-- 'yatate. cachati. prāyaṃmta' iti.
GSP29nysvbh_u:1883: 'ikāraḥ idam' iti ca, yatra ca vikārabhūtau-- 'dṛṣṭyā' 'dadhyāhara' iti ubhayatra prayokturaviśeṣo yatnaḥ śrotuśca śrutiratyādeśopipattiḥ //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1884: na khalu ikāraḥ prayujyamāno yakāratāmāpadyamāno gṛhyate, kiṃ tarhi ?.
GSP29nysvbh_u:1885: ikārasya prayoge yakāraḥ prayujyate. tasmādavikāra iti //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1888: na caitasmin pakṣe śabdānvākhyānasyāsaṃbhavo yena varṇavikāraṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:1890: na khalu varṇasya varṇāntaraṃ kāryam-- na hi ikārād yakāra utpadyate yakārādvā ikāraḥ, pṛthaksthānaprayatnotpādyā hīme varṇāsteṣāmanyo 'nyasya
GSP29nysvbh_u:1892: etāvaccaitat paraṇāmo vikāraḥ syāt kāryakāraṇabhāvo vā, ubhayaṃ ca nāsti
GSP29nysvbh_u:1896: kvacidviṣaye varṇāntarasamudāyo na paraṇāmo ni kāryaṃ śabdāntarasya sthāne śabdāntaraṃ prayujyate tathā varṇasya varṇāntaramiti // 40 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1899: prakṛtyanuvidhānaṃ vikāreṣu dṛṣṭaṃ yakāre hasvadīrghānuvidhānaṃ nāsti yena vikāratvamanumīyata iti // 41 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1901: davyavikārā nyūnāḥ samā adhikāśca gṛhyante. tadvadayaṃ vikāro nyūnaḥ
GSP29nysvbh_u:1903: dvividhasyāpi hetor abhāvād asādhanaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ-- atra nodāharaṇasādharmyād heturasti na vaidharmyāt. anupasaṃhṛtaśca hetunā dṛṣṭānto na sādhaka iti //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1905: yathānaḍuhaḥ sthāne 'śvo voḍuṃ niyukto na tadvikāro bhavati. evamivarṇasya sthāne yakāraḥ prayukto na vikāra iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1906: na cātra niyamaheturasti-- dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhako na pratidṛṣṭānta iti // 42 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1909: atulyānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ prakṛtibhāvo vikalpane vikāraśca prakṛtīranuvidhīyate,
GSP29nysvbh_u:1912: yathā dravyabhāvena tulyāyāḥ prakṛtervikāravaiṣamyam evaṃ varṇabhāvena tulyāyāḥ prakṛtervikāravikalpa iti // 44 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1914: ayaṃ vikāradharmaḥ-- dravyasāmānye yadātmakaṃ dravyaṃ mṛdvā suvarṇaṃ vā
GSP29nysvbh_u:1915: tasyātmano 'nvaye pūrvo vyūho nivartate vyūhāntaraṃ copajāyate taṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:1916: vikāramācakṣate, na varṇasāmānye kaścid śabdātmānvayī ya itvaṃ jahāti yatvaṃ cāpadyate, tatra yathā sati dravyabhāve vikāravaiṣamye nānaḍuho
GSP29nysvbh_u:1917: 'śvo vikāraḥ-- vikāradharmānupapatteḥ, evamivarṇasya na yakāro vikāraḥ--
GSP29nysvbh_u:1924: na punarikāsya sthāne yakārasya prayoga ityatrānumānaṃ nāsti ? // 46 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1926: ananumānāditi na-- idaṃ hyanumānam-- suvarṇaṃ kuṇḍalatvaṃ hitvā
GSP29nysvbh_u:1927: rucakatvamāpadyate rucakatvaṃ hitvā punaḥ kuṇḍalatvamāpadyate, evamikāro yaṇi yakāratvamāpannaḥ punarikāro bhavatīti // 47 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1928: vyabhicārādananumānam-- yathā payo dadhibhāvamāpannaṃ punaḥ payo na
GSP29nysvbh_u:1929: bhavati-- kimevaṃ varṇānāṃ na punarāpattiḥ ?. atha suvarṇavat punarāpattiriti ?
GSP29nysvbh_u:1932: avasthitaṃ suvarṇaṃ hīyamānenopajāyamānena ca dharmeṇa dharmi bhavati naivaṃ kaścit śabdātmā hīyamānena itvena upajāyamānena yatvena ca dharmī gṛhyate tasmāt suvarṇodāharaṇaṃ nopapadyate iti // 48 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1934: varṇavikārā api varṇatvaṃ na vyabhicaranti yathā suvarṇavikāraḥ suvarṇatvamiti // 49 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1936: kuṇḍalarucakau suvarṇasya dharmauṃ na suvarṇatvasya. evamikārayakārau kasya varṇātmano dharmauṃ ? varṇatvaṃ sāmānyaṃ na tasyemau dharmauṃ bhavitumarhataḥ, na ca nivartamāno dharma upajāyamānasya prakṛtiḥutatra
GSP29nysvbh_u:1940: 'nityā varṇāḥ' ityetasminṛ pakṣe ikārayakārau varṇauṃ ityubhayornityatvād vikārānupapattiḥ, nityatve 'vināśitvāt kaḥ kasya vikāra iti ?|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1942: kimidamanavasthānaṃ varṇānām ?, utpadya nirodhaḥ, utpadya niruddhe ikāre
GSP29nysvbh_u:1943: yakāra utpadyate. yakāre cotpadya niruddhe ikāra utpadyate, kaḥ kasya vikāraḥ ?|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1944: tadetad avagṛhya saṃdhāne. saṃdhāya cāvagrahe veditavyamiti // 51 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1947: 'nityā varṇā na vikriyante' iti vipratiṣedhaḥ, yathā nityatve sati
GSP29nysvbh_u:1948: kiñcidatīndriyaṃ kiñcidinrdiyagrāhyam indriyagrāhyāśca varṇāḥ. evaṃ nityatve sati kiñcinana vikriyate varṇāstu vikriyante iti //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1958: yathānavasthāyināṃ varṇānāṃ śravaṇaṃ bhavatyevameṣāṃ vikāro bhavatīti //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1960: arthapratipādikā varṇopalabdhirna vikāreṇa saṃbandhādasamarthā yā gṛhyamāṇā varṇavikāramanumāpayediti,
GSP29nysvbh_u:1961: tatra yādṛgidam-- yathā gandhaguṇā pṛthivī evaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:1964: nirvartikā, yo 'yamivarṇanivṛttau yakārasya prayogaḥ yadyayamivarṇopalabdhyā nirvartate tadā tatropalabhyamāna ivarṇo yatvamāpadyate iti gṛhyeta ?, tasmādvarṇopalabdhiraheturvarṇavikārasyeti
GSP29nysvbh_u:1968: iti na yuktaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ-- na khalu vikāradharmakaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:1971: iti ( ca ) na yuktaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ-- avagrahe hi 'dadhi atra'
GSP29nysvbh_u:1972: iti prayujya ciraṃ sthitvā tataḥ saṃhitāyāṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:1973: prayuṅkte-- 'dadhyatra' iti. ciranivṛtte cāyamivarṇe yakāraḥ prayujyamānaḥ kasya vikāra iti pratīyate ? |
GSP29nysvbh_u:1977: ikārasthāne yakāraḥ śrūyate. yakārasthāne khalvikāro vidhīyate--
GSP29nysvbh_u:1978: vidhyati ( iti ), tad yadi syāt prakṛtivikārabhāvo varṇānām ? tasya prakṛtiniyamaḥ syāt-- dṛṣṭo vikāradharmitve prakṛtiniyama iti // 55 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1981: yathāviṣayaṃ vyavasthitaḥ-- niyatatvānniyama iti bhavati, evaṃ satyaniyamo nāsti. tatra
GSP29nysvbh_u:1986: niyama ityatrārthābhyanujñā. aniyama iti tasya pratiṣedhaḥ.
GSP29nysvbh_u:1989: nātrārthasya tathābhāvaḥ pratiṣidhyate, kiṃ tarhi ?. tathābhūtasyārthasya niyamaśabdenābhidhīyamānasya
GSP29nysvbh_u:1990: niyamaśabda evopapadyate, soyaṃ niyamādaniyame pratiṣedho na bhavatīti // 57 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1994: sthānyādeśabhāvādaprayoge prayogo vikāraśabdārthaḥ sa bhidyate-- guṇānatarāpattiḥ = udāttasyānudatta
GSP29nysvbh_u:1995: ityevamādiḥ, upamarde nāma ekarūpanivṛttau rūpāntaropajanaḥ, hrāsaḥ |
GSP29nysvbh_u:1999: āgamaḥ prakṛteḥ pratyayasya vā, ete eva viśeṣāḥ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2000: vikārā iti ete evādeśāḥ. ete cedvikārā upapadyante tarhi varṇavikārā iti // 58 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2002: yathādarśanaṃ vikṛtā varṇā vibhaktyantāḥ padasaṃjñā bhavanti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:2006: śiṣyate ca khalu nāmikyā vibhakteravyayāllopastayoḥ padasaṃjñārthamiti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2008: nāmapadaṃ cādhikṛtya parīkṣā-- gauriti ( nāma ) padaṃ khalu.
GSP29nysvbh_u:2012: avinābhāvavṛttiḥ saṃnidhiḥ, avinābhāvena vartamānāsu vyaktyākṛtijātiṣu gauriti prayujyate tatra na jñāyate-- kimanyatamaḥ padārthaḥ ? uta sarvaḥ ? iti //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2021: bhedāttu dravyābhidhāyakam, 'gavāṃ samūhaḥ' iti bhedād dravyābhidhānaṃ. na
GSP29nysvbh_u:2023: abhedāt, 'vaidyāya gāṃ dadātīti dravyasya tyāgo. na jāteḥ-- amūrtatvāt
GSP29nysvbh_u:2031: gauḥ' iti. niravayavā tu jātiriti, etenāpacayo
GSP29nysvbh_u:2034: samāsaḥ-- 'gohitaṃ gosukham' iti dravyasya sukhādiyogo na jāteriti, anubandhaḥ--
GSP29nysvbh_u:2035: sarūpaprajananasantānaḥ-- 'gaurgāṃ janayatīti tad utpattidharmatvād dravye yuktaṃ. na jātau--
GSP29nysvbh_u:2041: anavasthānāt, yāśabdaprabhṛtibhiryo viśeṣyate sa gośabdārthaḥ-- 'yā gaustiṣṭhati yā gaurniṣaṇṇā'
GSP29nysvbh_u:2043: kiṃ tarhi ?. jātiviśiṣṭaṃ. tasmānna vyaktiḥ padārthaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh_u:2045: yadi na vyaktiḥ padārthaḥ kathaṃ tarhi vyaktāvupacāra iti ?. nimittād atadbhāve 'pi
GSP29nysvbh_u:2051: 'yaṣṭikāṃ bhojaya' iti yaṣṭikāsahacarito brāhmaṇo 'bhidhīyate iti, sthānāt-- 'mañcāḥ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2053: tādarthyāt-- kaṭārtheṣu vīraṇeṣu vyūhyamāneṣu 'kaṭaṃ karotīti bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2055: iti tadvadvartate iti, mānāt-- āḍhakena mitāḥ saktavaḥ 'āḍhakaṃ saktavaḥ' iti, dhāraṇāt--
GSP29nysvbh_u:2061: tatrāyaṃ sahacaraṇād yogād vā jātiśabdo vyaktau prayujyate iti // 63 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2062: yadi 'gauḥ' ityasya padasya na vyaktirarthaḥ ? astu tarhi---
GSP29nysvbh_u:2065: sattvāvayavānāṃ tadavayavānāṃ ca niyato vyūha ākṛtiḥ tasyāṃ gṛhyamāṇāyāṃ sattvavyavasthānaṃ sidhyati-- 'ayaṃ gauḥ' 'ayamaśvaḥ' iti. nāgṛhyamāṇāyām.
GSP29nysvbh_u:2066: yasya grahaṇāt sattvavyavasthānaṃ sidhyati taṃ śabdo 'bhidhātumarhati |
GSP29nysvbh_u:2067: so 'syārtha iti // naitadupapadyate-- yasya jātyā yogastadatra
GSP29nysvbh_u:2068: jātiviśiṣṭamabhidhīyate-- 'gauḥ' iti. na cāvayavavyūhasya jātyā yogaḥ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2069: kasya tarhi ?. niyatāvayavavyūhasya dravyasya, tasmād nākṛtiḥ padārthaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2071: NyS_2,2.65: vyaktyākṛtiyukte 'py aprasaṃgāt prokṣaṇādīnāṃ mṛdgavake jātiḥ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2073: padārthaḥ, kasmāt ?. vyaktyākṛtiyuktepi mṛdgavake prokṣaṇādīnāmaprasaṅgāditi = 'gāṃ prokṣaya' 'gāmānaya' 'gāṃ dehīti naitāni mṛdgavake prayujyante, kasmāt ?
GSP29nysvbh_u:2075: ākṛtiḥ, yadabhāvāt tatrāsaṃpratyayaḥ sa padārtha iti // 65 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2078: nāgṛhyamāṇāyāmākṛtau vyaktau ( ca ) jātimātraṃ śuddhaṃ gṛhyate tasmānna jātiḥ padārtha iti na vai padārthena na bhavituṃ śakyam|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2082: padārthatvamiti. yadā hi bhedavivakṣā viśeṣagatiśca tadā vyaktiḥ pradhānamaṅgaṃ tu jātyākṛtī. yadā tu bhedo 'vivakṣitaḥ sāmānyagatiśca tadā jātiḥ pradhānamaṅgaṃ tu vyaktyākṛtī, tadetad bahulaṃ prayogeṣu|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2084: kathaṃ punarjñāyate nānā vyaktyākṛtijātaya iti ?. lakṣaṇabhedāt,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2088: indriyagrāhyeti. na sarvaṃ dravyaṃ vyaktiḥ, yo guṇaviśeṣāṇāṃ sparśāntānāṃ gurutvadhanatvadravatvasaṃskārāṇām avyāpinaḥ parimāṇasyāśrayo yathāsaṃbhavaṃ taddravyaṃ mūrtiḥ-- mūrchitāvayavatvāditi
GSP29nysvbh_u:2090: yayā jātirjātiliṅgāni ca prakhyāyante tāmākṛtiṃ vidyāt. sā ca nānyā sattvāvayavānāṃ tadavayavānāṃ ca niyatād vyūhāditi|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2091: niyatāvayavavyūhāḥ khalu sattvāvayavā jātiliṅgam-- śirasā pādena gāmanuminvanti |
GSP29nysvbh_u:2092: niyate ca sattvāvayavānāṃ vyūhe sati gotvaṃ prakhyāyate iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2098: yo 'rtho 'nekatra pratyayānuvṛttinimittaṃ tat sāmānyam, yacca keṣāṃ cidabhedaṃ keṣāñcid bhedaṃ karoti tat sāmānyaviśeṣo jātiriti
GSP29nysvbh_u:2099: // iti vātsyāyanīye nyāyabhāṣye dvitīyādhyāyasya dvitīyamāhnikaṃ samāptam
GSP29nysvbh_u:2101: atha saṭīke nyāyabhāṣye tṛtīyādhyāyasya prathamamāhnikam parīkṣitāni pramāṇāni prameyamidānīṃ parīkṣyate-- taccātmādīti ātmā vivicyate-- kiṃ dehendriyamanobuddhivedanāsaṃghātamātramātmā ? āho svit tavdyatiriktaḥ ? iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2102: kutaḥ saṃśayaḥ ?, vyapadeśasyobhayathā siddheḥ, kriyākaraṇayoḥ kartrā saṃbandhasyābhidhānaṃ vyapadeśaḥ sa dvividhaḥ-- avayavena samudāyasya--
GSP29nysvbh_u:2104: vyapadeśaḥ-- 'paraśunā vṛścati' 'pradīpena paśyati' (iti), asti cāyaṃ vyapadeśaḥ-- 'cakṣuṣā paśyati' 'manasā vijānāti' 'buddhyā vicārayati'
GSP29nysvbh_u:2110: darśanena yāvadartho gṛhītaḥ sparśanenāpi so 'rtho gṛhyate--
GSP29nysvbh_u:2111: 'yamahamadrākṣaṃ cakṣuṣā taṃ sparśanenāpi spṛśāmi, iti. 'yaṃ cāspārkṣaṃ sparśanena taṃ cakṣuṣā paśyāmīti ekaviṣayau cermā pratyayau ekakartṛkau
GSP29nysvbh_u:2112: pratisaṃdhīyete. na ca saṃghātakartṛkau. na (vā) indriyeṇaikakartṛkau, tad yo 'sau cakṣuṣā tvagindriyeṇa caikārthasya grahītā bhinnanimittau ananyakartṛkau pratyayau samānaviṣayau pratisaṃdadhāti so 'rthāntarabhūta
GSP29nysvbh_u:2114: kathaṃ punarnendriyeṇaikakartṛkau ?. indriyaṃ khalu svaṃ svaṃ viṣayagrahaṇam ananyakartṛkaṃ pratisaṃdhātumarhati nendriyāntarasya viṣayāntaragrahaṇamiti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2115: kathaṃ na saṃghātakartṛkau ?. ekaḥ khalvayaṃ bhinnanimittau svātmakartṛkau pratyayau pratisaṃhitau vedayate na saṃghātaḥ, kasmāt ?. anivṛttaṃ hi saṃghāte pratyekaṃ viṣayāntaragrahaṇasyāpratisaṃdhānam indriyāntareṇeveti
GSP29nysvbh_u:2118: vyavasthitaviṣayāṇīndriyāṇi-- cakṣuṣy asati rūpaṃ na gṛhyate sati ca
GSP29nysvbh_u:2119: gṛhyate. yacca yasminn asati na bhavati sati ( ca ) bhavati tasya taditi
GSP29nysvbh_u:2120: vijñāyate, tasmād rūpagrahaṇaṃ cakṣuṣaḥ cakṣū rūpaṃ paśyati, evaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2122: tānīndriyāṇīmāni svasvaviṣayagrahaṇāt cetanāni-- indriyāṇāṃ bhāvābhāvayorviṣayagrahaṇasya tathābhāvāt, evaṃ sati kimanyena cetanena
GSP29nysvbh_u:2124: yo 'yamindriyāṇāṃ bhāvābhāvayorviṣayagrahaṇasya tathāl̃āvaḥ sa kiṃ cetanatvāt ? āhosvit cetanopakaraṇānāṃ grahaṇanimittatvāt ? iti
GSP29nysvbh_u:2130: sarvaviṣayagrāhi cetanaṃ syāt kastato 'nyaṃ cetanamanumātuṃ śaknuyāt,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2133: sarvaviṣayagrāhī viṣayavyavasthitim atīto 'numīyate, tatredaṃ pratyabhijñānam apratyākhyeyaṃ cetanavṛttamudāhriyate-- rūpadarśī khalvayaṃ rasaṃ gandhaṃ vā pūrvagṛhītamanuminoti. gandhaprativedī ca rūparasāv anuminoti. evaṃ viṣayaśeṣepi vācyam|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2134: rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā gandhaṃ jighrati. ghrātvā ca gandha rūpaṃ paśyati.
GSP29nysvbh_u:2135: tadevamaniyataparyāyaṃ sarvaviṣayagrahaṇam ekacetanādhikaraṇam ananyakartṛkaṃ pratisaṃdhatte, pratyakṣānumānāgamasaṃśayān pratyayāṃśca nānāviṣayān svātmakartṛkān pratisaṃdadhāti pratisaṃdhāya vedayate,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2136: sarvārthaviṣayaṃ ca śāstraṃ pratipadyate. arthamaviṣayabhūtaṃ śrotrasya,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2137: kramabhāvino varṇān śrutvā padavākayabhāvaṃ pratisaṃdhāya śabdārthavyavasthāṃ ca budhyamāno
GSP29nysvbh_u:2138: 'nekaviṣayamarthajātamagrahaṇīyamekaikenendriyeṇa gṛhṇāti, seyaṃ sarvajñasya jñeyāvyavasthānupadaṃ na śakyā parikramitum|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2139: ākṛtimātraṃ tūhāhṛtam, tatra yaduktam-- 'indriyacaitanye sati kimanyena cetanena' ( iti ) tadayuktaṃ bhavati // 3 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2148: iti, evaṃ sati yo dehādisaṃghātaḥ prāṇibhūto hiṃsā karoti nāsau hiṃsāphalena saṃbadhyate. yaśca saṃbadhyate na tena hiṃsā kṛtā, tadevaṃ sattvabhede kṛtahānamakṛtābhyāgamaḥ prasajyate, sati ca sattvotpāde.
GSP29nysvbh_u:2149: sattvanirodhe cākarmanimittaḥ sattvasargaḥ prāpnoti tatra muktyartho brahmacaryavāso na syāt|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2150: tad yadi dehādisaṃghātamātraṃ sattvaṃ syāt śarīradāhe pātakaṃ na bhavet.
GSP29nysvbh_u:2151: aniṣṭaṃ caitat. tasmād dehādisaṃghātavyatirikta ātmā nitya iti // 4 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2153: yasyāpi nityenātmanā sātmakaṃ śarīraṃ dahyate tasyāpi śarīradāhe pātakaṃ na bhaved dagdhuḥ, kasmāt ?. nityatvādātmanaḥ, na jātu kaścit nityaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2154: hiṃsitumarhati, atha hiṃsyate ?. nityatvamasya na bhavati, seyamekasmin pakṣe hiṃsā niṣphalā. anyasmiṃstv anupapanneti // 5 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2156: na brūmaḥ-- nityasya sattvasya vadho hiṃsā api tvanucchitidharmakasya
GSP29nysvbh_u:2158: pīḍā vaikalyalakṣaṇaḥ prabandhocchedo vā pramāpaṇalakṣaṇo ca vadho hiṃseti, kāryaṃ tu sukhaduḥkhasaṃvedanaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2160: āśrayaḥ śārīram. kāryāśrayasya śarīrasya svaviṣayopalabdheśca kartṝṇāmindriyāṇāṃ vadho hiṃsā na nityasyātmanaḥ, tatra yaduktam---
GSP29nysvbh_u:2163: yasya sattvocchedo hiṃsā tasya kṛtahānamakṛtābhyāgamaśceti doṣaḥ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2164: etāvaccaitat syāt-- sattvocchedo vā hiṃsā anucchittidharmakasya sattvasya kāryāśrayakartṛvadho
GSP29nysvbh_u:2170: āśrayaḥ utadāyatanaṃ tad bhavati na tato 'nyaditi sa eva kartā-- tannimittā hi sukhaduḥkhasaṃvedanasya nirvṛttirna tamantareṇeti.
GSP29nysvbh_u:2172: pīḍā pramāpaṇaṃ vā hiṃsā na nityatvenātmocchedaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2182: indriyacaitanye tu nānyadṛṣṭamanyaḥ pratyabhijānātīti pratyabhijñānānupapattiḥ, asti tvidaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ tasmādindriyavyatiriktaścetanaḥ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2184: ekamidaṃ cakṣuḥ madhye nāsāsthivyavahitaṃ tasyāntau gṛhyamāṇau dvitvābhimānaṃ prayojayataḥ madhyavyavahitasya dīrghasyeva // 8 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2186: ekasminnupahate coddhṛte vā vakṣuṣi dvitīyamavatiṣṭhate cakṣurviṣayagrahaṇaliṅgaṃ tasmādekasya vyavadhānānupapattiḥ // 9 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2190: ityahetuḥ, kasmāt ?. vṛkṣasya hi kāsu cicchākhāsu cchinnāsūpalabhyate eva vṛkṣaḥ // 10 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2193: nityatvaprasaṅgāt, bahuṣvavayaviṣu yamya kāraṇāni vibhaktāni tasya vināśaḥ yeṣāṃ kāraṇāny avibhaktāni tāny avatiṣṭhante/
GSP29nysvbh_u:2195: mṛtasya hi śaraḥkapāle dvāv avaṭau nāsāsthivyavahitau cakṣuṣaḥ sthāne bhedena gṛhyete na caitad ekasmin nāsāsthivyavahite saṃbhavati, atha caikavināśasyāniyamād dvāvimāvārthau
GSP29nysvbh_u:2198: avapīḍanāccaikasya cakṣuṣo raśmiviṣayasaṃnikarṣasya bhedād dṛśyabheda ivava gṛhyate taccaikatve
GSP29nysvbh_u:2204: kasyacidamlaphalasya gṛhītatadrasasāhacarye rūpe gandhe vā kena cidindriyeṇa gṛhyamāṇe rasanasyendriyāntarasya vikāro rasānusmṛtau rasagardhipravartito dantodakasaṃplavabhūto gṛhyate tasyendriyacaitanye 'nupapattiḥ--
GSP29nysvbh_u:2207: smṛtirnāma dharmo nimittādutpadyate, tasyāḥ smartavyo viṣayaḥ tatkṛta indriyāntaravikāro nātmakṛta iti // 13 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2209: tasyā ātmaguṇatve sati sadbhāvādapratiṣedha ātmanaḥ = yadi smṛtirātmaguṇaḥ evaṃ sati smṛtirupapadyate--
GSP29nysvbh_u:2214: ekasyānekārthadarśino darśanapratisaṃdhānāt smṛterātmaguṇatve sati sadbhāvaḥ, viparyaye
GSP29nysvbh_u:2222: 1' iti etasyā jñātṛjñānaviśiṣṭaḥ pūrvajñātortho viṣayo nārthamātram. 'jñātavānahamamumartham2'
GSP29nysvbh_u:2223: 'asāvartho mayā jñātaḥ 3' 'asmiṃnnarthe mama jñānamabhūt 4' iti. caturvidhametadvākyaṃ smṛtiviṣayajñāpakaṃ samānārtham |
GSP29nysvbh_u:2224: sarvatra khalu jñātā jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ ca gṛhyate|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2225: atha pratyakṣe 'rthe yā smṛtistayā trīṇi jñānāni ekasminnarthe pratisaṃdhīyante samānakartṛkāṇi na nānākartṛkāṇi nākartṛkāṇi, kiṃ tarhi ?.
GSP29nysvbh_u:2230: paśyāmīti tṛtīyaṃ jñānam. evamekorthastribhirjñānairyujyamāno nākartṛko na nānākartṛkaḥ, kiṃ tarhi ?. ekakartṛka
GSP29nysvbh_u:2234: na cedaṃ smṛtimātraṃ smartavyamātraviṣayaṃ vā, idaṃ khalu jñānapratisaṃdhānavat smṛtipratisaṃdhānam/
GSP29nysvbh_u:2235: ekasya sarvaviṣayatvāt = eko 'yaṃ jñātā sarvaviṣayaḥ svāni jñānāni
GSP29nysvbh_u:2241: sa nāstyekopi saṃskāro yastrikālaviśiṣṭaṃ jñānaṃ smṛtiṃ cānubhavet. na cānubhavamantareṇa jñānasya smṛteśca pratisaṃdhānam ahaṃ mama iti cotpadyate dehāntaravat, ato 'numīyate--
GSP29nysvbh_u:2242: astyekaḥ sarvaviṣayaḥ ( yaḥ ) pratidehaṃ svajñānaprabandhaṃ smṛtiprabandhaṃ ca pratisaṃdhatte iti. yasya dehāntareṣu vṛtterabhāvānna pratisaṃdhānaṃ bhavatīti // 15 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2244: na dehādisaṃghātavyatirikta ātmā, kasmāt ?. ātmapratipattihetūnāṃ manasi saṃbhavāt = "darśanasparśanābhyāmekārthagrahaṇāt 1
GSP29nysvbh_u:2245: "ityevamādīnām ātmapratipādakānāṃ hetūnāṃ manasi saṃbhavacaḥ-- yato mano hi sarvaviṣayamiti, tasmānna śarīrendriyamanobuddhisaṃghātavyatirikta ātmeti // 16 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2249: spṛśati' evaṃ mantuḥ sarvaviṣayasya matisādhanam antaḥkaraṇabhūtaṃ sarvaviṣayaṃ vidyate yenāyaṃ manyate iti,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2250: evaṃ sati jñātaryātmasaṃjñā na mṛṣyate manaḥsaṃjñābhyanujñāyate.
GSP29nysvbh_u:2251: manasi ca manaḥsaṃjñā na mṛṣyate matisādhanasaṃjñā
GSP29nysvbh_u:2255: atha mantuḥ sarvaviṣayasya matisādhanaṃ sarvaviṣayaṃ pratyākhyāyate-- nāstīte ? evaṃ rūpādigrahaṇasādhanānyapi na santīti sarvendriyavilopaḥ prasajyate iti // 17 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2258: rūpādigrahaṇasādhanāny asya santi matisādhanaṃ sarvaviṣayaṃ nāstīti. ayaṃ niyamo niranumānaḥ--
GSP29nysvbh_u:2262: karaṇāntarasadbhāvaḥ, yathā cakṣuṣā gandho na gṛhyate iti karaṇāntaraṃ ghrāṇam evaṃ cakṣurghrāṇābhyāṃ raso na gṛhyate iti karaṇāntaraṃ rasanam evaṃ śeṣeṣvapi, tathā cakṣurādibhiḥ, sukhādayo na gṛhyante iti karaṇāntareṇa bhavitavyaṃ tacca
GSP29nysvbh_u:2263: jñānāyaugapadyaliṅgam, yacca sukhādyupalabdhau karaṇā tacca jñānāyaugapadyaliṅgam |
GSP29nysvbh_u:2264: tasyendriyamindriyaṃ prati saṃnidherasaṃnidherna yugapat jñānānyutpadyante iti, tatra yudaktam--
GSP29nysvbh_u:2275: jātaḥ khalvayaṃ kumāro 'smin janmany agṛhīteṣu harṣabhayaśokahetuṣu harṣabhayaśokān pratipadyate liṅgānumeyān, te ca smṛtyanubandhādutpadyante
GSP29nysvbh_u:2276: nānyathā. smṛtyanubandhaśca pūrvābhyāsamantareṇa na bhavati. pūrvābhyāsaśca pūrvajanmani
GSP29nysvbh_u:2280: yathā padmādiṣv anityeṣu prabodhaḥ saṃmīlanaṃ ( ca ) vikāro bhavati.
GSP29nysvbh_u:2283: anena hetunā padmādiṣu prabodhasaṃmīlanavikāravad anityasyātmano harṣādisaṃpratipattiriti nātrodāharaṇasādharmyāt sādhyasādhanaṃ heturna vaidharmyādasti, hetvabhāvāt--
GSP29nysvbh_u:2287: yā ceyamāseviteṣu viṣayeṣu harṣādisaṃpratipattiḥ smṛtyanubandhakṛtā pratyātmaṃ gṛhyate seyaṃ padmādisaṃmīlanadṛṣṭāntena na nivartate. yathā ceyaṃ na nivartate tathā jātamātrasyāpīti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2290: atha nirnimittaḥ padmādiṣu prabodhasaṃmīlanavikāra iti matam evamātmanopi harṣādisaṃpratipattiriti ? tacca---
GSP29nysvbh_u:2292: uṣṇādiṣu satsu bhāvād asatsvabhāvād tannimittāḥ pañcabhūtānugraheṇa nirvṛttānāṃ padmādīnāṃ prabodhasaṃmīlanavikārā iti narnimittāḥ, evaṃ harṣādayopi vikārā
GSP29nysvbh_u:2301: jātamātrasya vatsasya pravṛttiliṅgaḥ stanyābhilāṣo gṛhyate sa ca
GSP29nysvbh_u:2303: kayā yuktyā ?, dṛśyate hi śarīriṇāṃ kṣudhā pīḍyamānānāmāhārābhyāṃsakṛtāt smaraṇānubandhādāhārābhilāṣaḥ, na ca pūrvaśarīrābhyāsamantareṇāsau
GSP29nysvbh_u:2305: sa khalvayamātmā pūrvaśarīrāt pretya śarīrāntaramāpannaḥ kṣutpīḍitaḥ pūrvābhyastamāhāramanusmaran stanyamabhilaghati, tasmānna dehabhedādātmā bhidyate ubhavatyevordhvaṃ dehabhedāditi NyS_3,1.23: ayaso 'yaskāntābhigamanavattadupasarpaṇam //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2313: atha nimittāt ?. tat kenopalabhyate ? iti, kriyāliṅgaḥ kriyāhetuḥ kriyāniyamaliṅgaśca kriyāniyamahetuḥ tenānyatra pravṛttyabhāvaḥ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2314: bālasyāpi niyatamupasarpaṇaṃ kriyopalabhyate. na ca stanyābhilāṣaliṅgam
GSP29nysvbh_u:2322: kiṅkṛtosya niyamaḥ ? iti, yadi kāraṇaniyamāt sa ca
GSP29nysvbh_u:2324: kāraṇaniyamād bhavitumarhati, tacca kāraṇamabhyastasmaraṇam anyedveti dṛṣṭena viśiṣyate
GSP29nysvbh_u:2328: sarāgo jāyate ityarthādāpadyate, ayaṃ jāyamāno rāgānuviddho jāyate. rāgasya pūrvānubhūtaviṣayānucintanaṃ yoniḥ. pūrvānubhavaśca viṣayāṇāṃ pūrvasmin
GSP29nysvbh_u:2329: janmani śarīramantareṇa nopapadyate. soyamātmā pūrvaśarīrānubhūtān viṣayān anusmaran teṣu teṣu rajyate. tathā cāyaṃ dvayorjanmanoḥ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2331: pūrvataraśarīrasya pūrvatamena ityādinānādiścetanasya śarīrayogaḥ anādiśca rāgānubandha iti siddhaṃ nityatvamiti // 25 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2332: kathaṃ punarjñāyate-- pūrvaviṣayānucintanajanito jātasya rāgaḥ na punaḥ---
GSP29nysvbh_u:2334: yathotpattidharmakasya dravyasya guṇāḥ kāraṇata utpadyante tathotpattidharmakasyātmano rāgaḥ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2337: na khalu saguṇadravyotpattivad utpattirātmano rāgasya ca|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2339: ayaṃ khalu prāṇināṃ viṣayān āsevamānānāṃ saṃkalpajanito rogo gṛhyate. saṃkalpaśca pūrvānubhūtaviṣayānucintanayoniḥ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2341: ātmotpādādhikaraṇāttu rāgotpattirbhavantī saṃkalpādanyasmin rāgakāraṇe sati vācyā
GSP29nysvbh_u:2342: kāryadravyaguṇavat, na cātmotpādaḥ siddhaḥ nāpi saṃkalpādanyad rāgakāraṇamasti, tasmādayuktam--
GSP29nysvbh_u:2344: athāpi saṃkalpādanyad rāgakāraṇaṃ dharmādharmalakṣaṇamadṛṣṭamupādīyate tathāpi pūrvaśarīrayogo
GSP29nysvbh_u:2349: karma khalvidaṃ jātiviśeṣanirvartakaṃ tādātmyāt tācchabdyaṃ vijñāyate, tasmādanupapannam--
GSP29nysvbh_u:2351: anādiścetanasya śarīrayoga ityuktam. svakṛtakarmanimittaṃ cāsyaṃ śarīraṃ sukhaduḥkhādhiṣṭhāna tatṛ parīkṣyate--
GSP29nysvbh_u:2354: pṛthivyādīni bhūtāni saṃkhyāvikalpena śarīraprakṛtiriti pratijānata iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2358: guṇāntaropalabdheḥ = gandhavatī pṛthivī gandhavacca śarīram, abādīnām agandhatvāt tatprakṛti agandhaṃ syāt|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2359: na tvidamabādibhirasaṃpṛktayā pṛthivyārabdhaṃ ceṣṭendriyārthāśrayabhāvena kalpate ityataḥ pañcānāṃ bhūtānāṃ saṃyoge sati śarīraṃ bhavati, bhūtasaṃyogo hi mithaḥ pañcānāṃ na niṣiddha iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2360: āpyataijasavāyavyāni lokāntare śarīrāṇi teṣvapi bhūtasaṃyogaḥ pūruṣārthatantra iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2366: te ime saṃdigdhā hetava ityupekṣitavān sūtrakāraḥ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2368: bhūtānāṃ dharmopalabdhiḥ asati ca saṃyogāpratiṣedhāt saṃnihitānāmiti. yathā sthālyāmudakatejovāyvākāśānāmiti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:2369: tadidamanekabhūtaprakṛti ( sat ) śarīram agandham arasam arūpam asparśaṃ ca prakṛtyanuvidhānāt
GSP29nysvbh_u:2372: "sūryaṃ te cakṣurgacchatām" ityatra mantre "pṛthivīṃ te śarīram"
GSP29nysvbh_u:2373: iti śrūyate tadidaṃ prakṛtau vikārasya pralayābhidhānamiti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:2374: "sūryaṃ te cakṣuḥ spṛṇomi" ityatra mantrāntare "pṛthivīṃ te śarīraṃ spṛṇomi" iti śrūyate seyaṃ kāraṇād vikārasya spṛttirabhidhīyate iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2375: sthālyādiṣu ca tulyajātīyānāmekakāryārambhadarśanād bhinnajātīyānāmekakāryārambhānupapattiḥ athedānīmindriyāṇi prameyakrameṇa vicāryante-- kimāvyaktikāni ? āhosvid bhautikāni ? iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2378: kṛṣṇasāraṃ bhautikaṃ tasminn anupahate rūpopalabdhiḥ upahate
GSP29nysvbh_u:2389: nyagrodhadhānādi, tadubhayamupalabhyamānaṃ cakṣuṣo bhautikatvaṃ bādhate-- bhautikaṃ hi
GSP29nysvbh_u:2390: tāvadeva vyāpnoti abhautikaṃ tu vibhutvāt sarvavyāpakamiti // 31 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2391: na mahadaṇugrahaṇamātrādabhautikatvaṃ vibhutvaṃ cendriyāṇāṃ śakyaṃ pratipattam. idaṃ khalu--
GSP29nysvbh_u:2393: tayormahadaṇvorgrahaṇaṃ cakṣūraśmerarthasya ca saṃnikarṣaviśeṣād bhavati yathā pradīparaśmerarthasya ceti, raśmyarthasaṃnikarṣaśca āvaraṇaliṅgaḥ--
GSP29nysvbh_u:2394: cakṣuṣo hi raśmiḥ kuḍyādibhirāvṛtamarthaṃ na prakāśayati yathā pradīparaśmiriti // 32 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2397: rūpasparśavaddhi tejaḥ mahattvādanekadravyavattvād rūpavattvāccopalabdhiriti pradīpavat pratyakṣata upalabhyeta cākṣuṣo raśmiryadi syāditi // 33 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2403: mahadanekadravyavacca viṣaktāvayavamāpyaṃ dravyaṃ pratyakṣato nopalabhyate sparśastu śīto
GSP29nysvbh_u:2405: kalpete, tathāvidhameva ca taijasaṃ dravyamanudbhūtarūpaṃ saha rūpeṇa nopalabhyate sparśastv asyoṣṇa upalabhnapayate tasya dravyasyānubandhād grīṣmavasantau kalpete // 35 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2408: yatra rūpaṃ ca dravyaṃ ca tadāśrayaḥ pratyakṣata
GSP29nysvbh_u:2410: yadabhāvācca dravyasya kvacidanupalabdhiḥ sa rūpadharmoyamudbhavasamākhyāta iti, anudbhūtarūpaścāyaṃ nāyano raśmiḥ tasmāt pratyakṣato nopalabhyate
GSP29nysvbh_u:2412: dṛṣṭaśca tejaso dharmabhedaḥ-- udbhūtarūpasparśaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tejo yathādityaraśmayaḥ, udbhūtarūpamanudbhūtasparśaṃ ca pratyakṣam ( tejaḥ ) yathā pradīparaśmayaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2416: yathā cetanasyārtho viṣayopalabdhibhūtaḥ sukhaduḥkhopalabdhibhūtaśca kalpate tathendriyāṇi vyūḍhāni, viṣayaprāptyarthaśca raśmeścākṣuṣasya vyūhaḥ, rūpasparśānabhivyaktiśca
GSP29nysvbh_u:2418: sarvadravyāṇāṃ viśvarūpo vyūha indriyavat karmakāritaḥ puruṣārthatantraḥ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2421: yaścāvaraṇopalambhādindriyasya dravyaviśeṣe pratighātaḥ sa bhautikadharmaḥ-- na bhūtāni vyabhicarati.
GSP29nysvbh_u:2425: yadapi manyate-- pratighātād bhautikānīndriyāṇi apratighātādabhautikānīti prāptam. dṛṣṭaścāpratighātaḥ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2427: yuktam, kasmāt ?. yasmād bhautikamapi na pratihanyate-- kācābhrapaṭalasphaṭikāntaritaprakāśāt
GSP29nysvbh_u:2431: yathānekadravyeṇa samavāyādrūpaviśeṣāccopalabdhiriti satyupalabdhikāraṇe madhyandinolkāprakāśo nopalabhyate ādityaprakāśenābhibhūtaḥ, evaṃ mahadanekadravyavattvād rūpaviśeṣāccopalabdhiriti
GSP29nysvbh_u:2445: rūpasparśopalabdhau ca satyāṃ tadāśrayasya dravyasya cakṣuṣā grahaṇam, rūpasyānudbhūtatvāt seyaṃ rūpānabhivyaktito rūpāśrayasya dravyasyānupalabdhirdṛṣṭā,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2453: viparyaye 'bhibhavābhāvāt = anudbhūtarūpatvāccānupalabhyamānaṃ bāhyaprakāśānugrahāccopalabhyamānaṃ nābhibhūyate, iti evamupapannam-- asti cākṣuṣo raśmiriti // 42 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2455: dṛśyate hi naktaṃ nayanaraśmayo naktañcarāṇāṃ vṛṣadaṃśaprabhṛtīnāṃ tena śeṣasyānumānamiti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:2463: vyāhanyate vai prāptirvyavadhāneneti, yadi ca raśmyarthasaṃnikarṣo grahaṇahetuḥ syāt ? na vyavahitasya saṃnikarṣa ity agrahaṇaṃ syāt,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2464: asti ceyaṃ kācābhrapaṭalasphaṭikāntaritopalabdhaḥ sā jñāpiyati-- aprāpyakārīṇīndriyāṇi (iti). ata evābhautikāni--
GSP29nysvbh_u:2472: na ca kāco 'bhrapaṭalaṃ vā nāyanaraśmiṃ viṣṭabhnāti so 'pratihanyamānaḥ saṃnikṛṣyate iti yaśca manyate--
GSP29nysvbh_u:2478: iti. yathāvākyaṃ cārthabheda iti, ādityaraśmiḥ kumbhādiṣu na pratihanyate-- avighātāt kumbhasthamudakaṃ tapati, prāptau hi dravyāntaraguṇasya uṣṇasya sparśasya grahaṇaṃ tena ca śītasparśābhibhava
GSP29nysvbh_u:2480: sphaṭikāntaritepi prakāśanīye pradīparaśmīnāmapratighātaḥ apratighātāt prāptasya grahaṇamiti
GSP29nysvbh_u:2481: bharjanakapālādisthaṃ ca dravyamāgneyena tejasā dahyate tatrāvighātāt prāptiḥ prāptau tu dāhaḥ-- nāprāpyakāri teja iti 3/
GSP29nysvbh_u:2483: iti ca kevalaṃ padamupādīyate, koyamavighāto nāma ?, avyūhyamānāvayavena vyavadhāyakena dravyeṇa sarvato dravyasyāviṣṛmbhaḥ |
GSP29nysvbh_u:2486: bahiḥ śītasparśagrahaṇam. na cendrinayeṇāsaṃnikṛṣṭasya dravyasya sparśopalabdhiḥ, dṛṣṭau ca praspandaparisravau,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2490: kuḍyādivadvā kācābhrapaṭalādibhiḥ pratīghāta iti prasajyate, niyame kāraṇaṃ vācyamiti
GSP29nysvbh_u:2495: yathādarśapratihatasya parāvṛttasya nayanaraśmeḥ svena mukhena saṃnikarṣe sati svamukhopalambhanaṃ pratibimbagrahaṇākhyam ādarśarūpānugrahāt tannimittaṃ bhavati-- ādarśarūpopaghāte tadabhāvāt.
GSP29nysvbh_u:2499: pramāṇasya tattvaviṣayatvāt, na khalu bhoḥ parīkṣamāṇena dṛṣṭānumitā arthāḥ śakyā niyoktum--
GSP29nysvbh_u:2500: bhavata' iti. nāpi pratiṣeddhum-- 'evaṃ na bhavata'
GSP29nysvbh_u:2501: iti, na hīdamupapadyate-- 'rūpavad gandhopi cākṣuṣo bhavatu' iti. 'gandhavadvā rūpaṃ cākṣuṣaṃ mā bhūta' iti, 'agnipratipattivad dhūmenodakapratipattirapi
GSP29nysvbh_u:2502: bhavatu' iti, 'udakāpratipattivadvā dhūmenāgnipratipattirapi mā bhūt' iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2505: svo dharma iti tathābhūtāḥ pramāṇena pratipadyante
GSP29nysvbh_u:2508: kācābhrapaṭalādivadvā kuḍyādibhirapratighāto bhavatu. kuḍyādivadvā kācābhrapaṭalādibhirapratighāto mā bhūt. iti, na-- dṛṣṭānumitāḥ khalvime dravyadharmāḥ |
GSP29nysvbh_u:2517: nānāsthānaśca sanneko 'vayavī ceti. tenendriyeṣu bhinnasthāneṣu saṃśaya iti // 51 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2525: yayā sarvendriyasthānāni vyāptāni yasyāṃ ca satyāṃ viṣayagrahaṇaṃ bhavati sā tvagekamindriyamiti
GSP29nysvbh_u:2527: sparśopalabdhilakṣaṇāyāṃ satyāṃ tvaci gṛhyamāṇe ( ca ) tvagindriyeṇe sparśe indriyāntarārthā rūpādayo na gṛhyante
GSP29nysvbh_u:2529: sparśavad andhādibhirgṛhyeran rūpādayaḥ na ca gṛhyante tasmānnaikamindriyaṃ tvagiti //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2533: kaścit cakṣuṣi saṃnikṛṣṭo dhūmasparśaṃ gṛhṇāti nānya evaṃ tvaco 'vayavaviśeṣā rūpādigrāhakāsteṣāmupaghātādandhādibhirna gṛhyante rūpādaya iti //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2540: cābhāvāt. tathā ca pūrvo vāda uttareṇa vādena
GSP29nysvbh_u:2543: pṛthivyādibhirapi bhūtairindriyādhiṣṭhānāni vyāptāni. na ca teṣvasatsu viṣayagrahaṇaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2547: ātmā manasā saṃbadhyate mana indriyeṇa indriyaṃ sarvārthaiḥ saṃnikṛṣṭamiti ātmendriyamano
GSP29nysvbh_u:2548: yugapad grahaṇāni syuḥ na ca yugapad rūpādayo gṛhyante tasmānnaikamindriyaṃ sarvaviṣayamastīti
GSP29nysvbh_u:2553: tvacā rūpāṇy aprāptāni gṛhyante iti aprāpyakāritve sparśādiṣvapyevaṃ prasaṅgaḥ, sparśādīnāṃ ca prāptānāṃ grahaṇād rūpādīnām ( api ) prāptānāṃ grahaṇamiti prāptam|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2555: āvaraṇānupapatterviṣayamātrasya grahaṇam = athāpi manyeta-- prāptāḥ sparśādayastvacā gṛhyante rūpāṇi tv aprāptānīti, evaṃ sati nāstyāvaraṇam.
GSP29nysvbh_u:2556: āvaraṇānupapatteśca rūpamātrasya grahaṇaṃ vyavahitasya cāvyahitasya ceti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2558: aprāptaṃ tvacā gṛhyate rūpamiti dūre rūpasyāgrahaṇamantike ca grahaṇamityetad na syāditi // ekatvapratiṣedhācca nānātvasiddhau sthānāheturapyupādīyate---
GSP29nysvbh_u:2560: arthaḥ prayojanaṃ tat pañcavidhamindriyāṇām usparśanenendriyeṇa sparśagrahaṇe sati na tenaiva rūpaṃ gṛhyate iti rūpagrahaṇaprayojanaṃ cakṣuranumīyate, sparśarūpagrahaṇe ca tābhyāmeva
GSP29nysvbh_u:2561: na gandho gṛhyate iti gandhagrahaṇaprayojanaṃ ghrāṇamanumīyate,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2562: trayāṇāṃ grahaṇe na taireva raso gṛhyate iti rasagrahaṇaprayojanaṃ rasanamanumīyate,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2563: na caturṇāṃ grahaṇe taireva śabdaḥ śrūyate iti śabdagrahaṇaprayojanaṃ śrotramanumīyate,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2575: gandhatvādibhiḥ svasamānyaiḥ kṛtavyavasthānāṃ gandhādīnāṃ yāni gandhādigrahaṇāni tāny asamānasādhanasādhyatvād grāhakāntarāṇi na prayojayanti. arthasamūho 'numānamukto
GSP29nysvbh_u:2578: kathaṃ punargandhatvādibhiḥ svasāmānyaiḥ kṛtavyavasthā gandhādayaḥ ? iti, sparśaḥ khalvayaṃ trividhaḥ--- śīta uṣṇo 'nuṣṇāśītaśca sparśatvena svasāmānyena saṃgṛhītaḥ, gṛhyamāṇe ca śītasparśe
GSP29nysvbh_u:2579: noṣṇasyānuṣṇāśītasya vā sparśasya grahaṇaṃ grāhakāntaraṃ prayojayati-- sparśabhedānāmekasādhanasādhyatvāt uyenaiva śītasparśo gṛhyate tenaivetarāvapīti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:2585: viṣayatvena hi sāmānyena gandhādayaḥ saṃgṛhītā iti // 58 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2587: na khalu viṣayatvena sāmānyena kṛtavyavasthā viṣayā grāhakāntaranirapekṣāḥ |
GSP29nysvbh_u:2593: "indriyārthapañcatvāt 55" ityetasmin sūtre kṛtabhāṣyamiti, tasmād buddhilakṣaṇapañcatvāt pañcendriyāṇi|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2601: prāpnoti, sparśanādīni tvindriyāṇi viṣayā evāśrayopasarpaṇāt pratyāsīdanti,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2604: iyattā sā pañcadhā-- svasthānamātrāṇi ghrāṇarasanasparśanāni viṣayāvyāpinānumeyāni, cakṣuḥ kṛṣṇasārāśrayaṃ bahirniḥsṛtaṃ viṣayavyāpi, śrotraṃ nānyadākāśāt tacca vibhu śabdamātrānubhavānumeyaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2607: pañca khalvindrinayayonayaḥ pṛthivyādīni bhūtāni tasmāt prakṛtipañcatvādapi pañcendriyāṇāti siddham // 59 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2611: dṛṣṭo hi vāyvādīnāṃ bhūtānāṃ guṇaviśeṣābhivyaktiniyamaḥ uvāyuḥ sparśavyañjakaḥ āpo rasavyañjikāḥ.
GSP29nysvbh_u:2613: kasyacid dravyasya grandhavyañjakamadva asti cāyamindriyāṇāṃ bhūtaguṇaviśeṣopalabdhiniyamaḥ tena bhūtaguṇaviśeṣopalabdhermanyāmahebhūtaprakṛtīnīndriyāṇi nāvyaktaprakṛtīniti // 60 athārthavivecanam gandhādayaḥ pṛthivyādiguṇā ityuddiṣṭam |
GSP29nysvbh_u:2614: uddeśaśca pṛthivyādīnāmekaguṇatve cānekaguṇatve samāna ityata āha---
GSP29nysvbh_u:2619: kathaṃ tarhi tarapnirdeśaḥ ?. svatantraviniyogasāmarthyāt tenottaraśabdasya parārthābhidhānaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2620: uddeśasūtre hi sparśapayantebhyaḥ paraḥ śabda iti, tantraṃ vā-- sparśasya vivakṣitatvāt
GSP29nysvbh_u:2625: yasya bhūtasya ye guṇā na te tadātmakenendriyeṇa sarve upalabhyante |
GSP29nysvbh_u:2626: pārthivena hi ghrāṇena sparśaparyantā na gṛhyante gandha evaiko gṛhyate, evaṃ śeṣeṣvapīti kathaṃ tarhīme guṇā viniyoktavyāḥ ? iti---
GSP29nysvbh_u:2635: abādisaṃsargācca pṛthivyāṃ rasādayo gṛhyante evaṃ śeṣeṣvapīti // 65 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2641: pṛthivyādīnāṃ pūrvapūrvamuttareṇottareṇa viṣṭam ato na saṃsargāniyama iti. taccaitad bhūtasṛṣṭau veditavyaṃ naitarhīti // 66 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2643: neti trisūtrīṃ pratyācaṣṭe, kasmāt ?, pārthivasya dravyasyāpy asya ca pratyakṣatvāt|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2644: mahattvānekadravyatvādrūpāccopalabdhiriti taijasameva dravyaṃ pratyakṣaṃ syāt. na pārthivamāpyaṃ vā-- rūpābhāvāt|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2645: taijasavattu pārthivāpyayoḥ pratyakṣatvād na saṃsargādanekaguṇagrahaṇaṃ bhūtānāmiti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:2646: bhūtāntararūpakṛtaṃ ca pārthivāpyayoḥ pratyakṣatvaṃ bruvataḥ pratyakṣo vāyuḥ prasajyate.
GSP29nysvbh_u:2648: rasayorvā pārthivāpyayoḥ pratyakṣatvāt, pārthivo rasaḥ ṣaḍvidhaḥ āpyo madhura eva na caitat saṃsargād bhavitumarhati/
GSP29nysvbh_u:2650: taijasarūpānugṛhītayoḥ saṃsarge hi vyañjakameva rūpaṃ na vyaṅgyamastīti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2652: pārthivaṃ haritalohitapītādyanekavidhaṃ rūpam āpyaṃ tu śuklamaprakāśakaṃ na caitadekaguṇānāṃ saṃsarge satyupalabhyate iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2654: ataḥ paraṃ prapañcaḥ-- sparśayorvā pārthivataijasayoḥ pratyakṣatvāt. pārthivo 'nuṣṇāśītaḥ sparśaḥ uṣṇastaijasaḥ pratnayakṣaḥ. na caitadekaguṇānām anuṣṇāśītasparśena
GSP29nysvbh_u:2656: atha vā pārthivāpyayordravyayorvyavasthitaguṇayoḥ pratyakṣatvāt = caturguṇaṃ pārthivaṃ dravyaṃ triguṇamāpyaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tena tatkāraṇamanumīyate-- tathābhūtamiti.
GSP29nysvbh_u:2657: tasya kāryaṃ liṅm-- kāraṇabhāvāddhi kāryabhāva iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2658: evaṃ taijasavāyavyayordavyayoḥ pratyakṣatvād guṇavyavasthāyāstatkāraṇe dravye vyavasthānumānamiti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:2660: pārthivaṃ dravyamabādibhirviyuktaṃ pratyakṣato gṛhyate āpyaṃ ca parābhyāṃ taijasaṃ ca vāyunā,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2665: nātra liṅgamanumāpakaṃ gṛhyate iti yenaitadevaṃ pratipadyemahi|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2666: yaccoktam-- 'viṣṭaṃ hyaparaṃ pareṇeti bhūtasṛṣṭau veditavyaṃ na sāṃpratam'
GSP29nysvbh_u:2672: saṃyogaḥ saca dvayoḥ samānaḥ, vāyunā ca viṣṭatvāt sparśavat tejaḥ na tu tejasā
GSP29nysvbh_u:2675: dṛṣṭaṃ ca taijasena sparśena vāyavyasya sparśasyābhibhavādagrahaṇamiti na ca tenaiva tasyābhibhava iti // 67 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2683: yathā bāhyānāṃ pārthivāpyataijasānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ caturguṇatriguṇadviguṇānāṃ na sarvaguṇavyañjakatvaṃ gandharasarūpotkarṣāttu yathākramaṃ gandharasarūpavyañjakatvam evaṃ ghrāṇarasanacakṣuṣāṃ caturguṇatriguṇadviguṇānāṃ na sarvaguṇagrāhakatvaṃ gandharasarūpotkarṣāttu yathākramaṃ gandharasarūpagrāhakatvaṃ tasmāt ghrāṇādībhirna sarveṣāṃ guṇānāmupalabdhiriti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2685: gandhaguṇatvād ghrāṇaṃ gandhasya grāhakam evaṃ rasanādiṣvapīti, tasya yathāguṇayogaṃ ghrāṇādibhirguṇagrahaṇaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2687: kiṅkṛtaṃ punarvyavasthānaṃ kiñcit pārthivamindriyaṃ na sarvāṇi ?. kānicit āpyataijasavāyavyāni indriyāṇi na sarvāṇi ? iti---
GSP29nysvbh_u:2689: arthanirvṛttisamarthasya pravibhaktasya dravyasya saṃsargaḥ puruṣasaṃskārakārito bhūyastvam,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2692: yathā pṛthagarthakriyāsamarthāni puruṣasaṃskāravaśād viṣauṣadhimaṇiprabhṛtīni dravyāṇi nirvartyante na sarvaṃ sarvārtham evaṃ pṛthagviṣayagrahaṇasamarthāni ghrāṇādīni nirvartyante na sarvaviṣayagrahaṇasamarthānīti
GSP29nysvbh_u:2697: ghrāṇaṃ svena gandhena samānārthakāriṇā saha bāhyaṃ gandhaṃ gṛhṇāti tasya svagandhagrahaṇaṃ sahakārivaikalyānna bhavati. evaṃ śeṣāṇāmapi // 70 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2698: yadi punargandhaḥ sahakārī ca syād ghrāṇasya ?
GSP29nysvbh_u:2702: yo brūte-- yathā bāhyaṃ dravyaṃ cakṣuṣāṃ gṛhyate tathā tenaiva cakṣuṣā tadeva
GSP29nysvbh_u:2703: cakṣurgṛhyatāmiti tādṛgidam-- tulyo hyubhayatra pratipattihetvabhāva iti // 71 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2705: 'svaguṇān nopalabhante indriyāṇītyetanna bhavati-- upalabhyate hi svaguṇaḥ śabdaḥ śrotreṇeti NyS_3,1.73: tadupalabdhiritaretaradravyaguṇavaidharmyāt //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2708: na ca ghrāṇādīnāṃ svaguṇagrahaṇaṃ pratyakṣaṃ nāpyanumīyate, anumīyate tu śrotreṇākāśena
GSP29nysvbh_u:2710: pariśeṣaścānumānaṃ veditavyam-- ātmā tāvat śrotā na karaṇam, manasaḥ śrotratve badhiratvābhāvaḥ, pṛthivyādīnāṃ ghrāṇādibhāve sāmarthyaṃ śrotrabhāve
GSP29nysvbh_u:2711: cāsāmarthyam, asti cedaṃ śrotram ākāśaṃ ca śiṣyate pariśeṣādākāśaṃ śrotramiti // 73 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2714: parīkṣitānīndriyāṇi arthāśca, buddheridānīṃ parīkṣākramaḥ-- sā kimanityā nityā vā ? iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2717: asparśavattvaṃ tābhyāṃ samāno dharma upalabhyate buddhau.
GSP29nysvbh_u:2718: viśeṣaścopajanāpāyadharmavattvam, viparyayaśca yathāsvamanityanityayostasyāṃ buddhau nopalabhyate tena saṃśaya iti //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2719: anupapannaḥ khalvayaṃ saṃśayaḥ-- sarvaśarīriṇāṃ hi pratyātmavedanīyānityā
GSP29nysvbh_u:2722: 'anityā buddhiḥ' ityetat siddham, pramāṇasiddhaṃ cedaṃ śāstrepyuktam--
GSP29nysvbh_u:2726: dṛṣṭipravādopālambhārthaṃ tu prakaraṇam. evaṃ hi paśyantaḥ pravadanti
GSP29nysvbh_u:2730: kiṃ punaridaṃ pratyabhijñānam ? 'pūrvamajñāsiṣamarthaṃ tamimaṃ jānāmītijñānayoḥ samāne 'rthe pratisandhijñānaṃ pratyabhijñānam etaccāvasthitāyā buddherupapannam. nānātve tu buddhibhedeṣūtpannāpavargiṣu
GSP29nysvbh_u:2733: yathā khalu nityatvaṃ buddheḥ sādhyam evaṃ pratyabhijñānamapīti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2734: kiṃ kāraṇam ?. cetanadharmasya karaṇe 'nupapattiḥ-- puruṣadharmaḥ khalvayaṃ jñānaṃ darśanamupalabdhirbodhaḥ pratyayo 'dhyavasāya iti--
GSP29nysvbh_u:2735: cetano hi pūrvajñātamarthaṃ pratyabhijānāti tasyaitasmād hetornityatvaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2739: jñānaṃ ced buddherantaḥkaraṇasyābhyupagamyate cetanasyedānīṃ kiṃ svarūpaṃ ko dharmaḥ kiṃ tattvam, jñānena ca buddhau vartamānenāyaṃ cetanaḥ kiṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2742: puruṣaścetayate buddhirjānātīti. nedaṃ jñānādarthāntaramucyate-- yetayate jānīte paśyati upalabhate ityekoyamartha iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2743: buddhirjñāpayatīti cet ?. addhā jānīte puruṣo buddhirjñāpayatīti
GSP29nysvbh_u:2744: satyametat. evaṃ cābhyupagame 'jñānaṃ puruṣasya' iti siddhaṃ bhavati na buddherantaḥkaraṇasyeti
GSP29nysvbh_u:2746: yaśca pratijānīte-- kaścit puruṣaścetayate kaścid budhyate kaścidupalabhate kaścit paśyati iti puruṣānatarāṇi khalvimāni|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2747: cetano boddhā upalabdhā draṣṭeti naikasyeti dharmā iti, atra kaḥ pratiṣedhaheturiti //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2749: abhinnārthā ete śabdā iti tatra vyavasthānupapattirityevaṃ cet manyase ?.
GSP29nysvbh_u:2753: yadi punarbudhyate 'nayeti bodhanaṃ buddhirmana evocyate tacca nityam ?
GSP29nysvbh_u:2754: astvetadevaṃ na tu manaso viṣayapratyabhijñānād nityatvam. dṛṣṭaṃ hi karaṇabhede jñāturekatvāt pratyabhijñānam-- savyadṛṣṭasyetareṇa pratyabhijñānāditi cakṣurvat. pradīpavacca |
GSP29nysvbh_u:2755: pradīpāntaradṛṣṭasya pradīpāntareṇa pratyabhijñānamiti, tasmād jñāturayaṃ nityatve heturiti// yacca manyate-- buddher avasthitāyā yathāviṣayaṃ vṛttayaḥ |
GSP29nysvbh_u:2756: jñānāni niścaranti vṛttiśca vṛttimato nānyeti. tacca---
GSP29nysvbh_u:2758: vṛttivṛttimatorananyatve vṛttimato 'vasthānād vṛttīnāmavasthānamiti yānīmāni viṣayagrahaṇāni tānyavatiṣṭhante iti yugapad viṣayāṇāṃ grahaṇaṃ prasajyate iti // 4 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2760: atīte ca pratyabhijñāne vṛttimānapyatīta ityantaḥkaraṇasya vināśaḥ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2762: avibhu caikraṃ manaḥ paryāyeṇendriyaiḥ saṃyujyate iti---
GSP29nysvbh_u:2769: manasyupapadyate-- vṛttivṛttimatornānātvāt, ekatve hi anarthako vyāsaṅga iti // 7 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2773: kramavṛttitvābhāvādayugapadgrahaṇānupapattiriti, gatyabhāvācca pratiṣiddhaṃ vibhuno 'ntaḥkaraṇasyāyugapadgrahaṇaṃ na liṅgāntareṇānumīyate iti, yathā cakṣuṣo gatiḥ pratiṣiddhā--
GSP29nysvbh_u:2775: so 'yaṃ nāntaḥkaraṇe vivādo na ( ca ) tasya nityatve-- siddhaṃ hi mano
GSP29nysvbh_u:2777: kva tarhi vivādaḥ ?, tasya vibhutve. tacca pramāṇato 'nupalabdhaḥ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2779: ekaṃ cāntaḥkaraṇaṃ nānā caitā jñānātmikā vṛttayaḥ-- cakṣurvijñānaṃ ghrāṇavijñānam |
GSP29nysvbh_u:2781: puruṣo jānīte nāntaḥkaraṇamiti, etena viṣayāntaravyāsaṅgaḥ pratyuktaḥ |
GSP29nysvbh_u:2784: kena cidindriyeṇa saṃnidhiḥ kena cid asaṃnidhirityayaṃ tu vyāsaṅgo 'nujñāyate manasa iti ekamantaḥkaraṇaṃ nānā vṛttaya iti, satyabhede vṛtteridamucyate---
GSP29nysvbh_u:2786: tasyāṃ vṛttau nānātvābhimānāṃ yathā dravyāntaropahite sphaṭike
GSP29nysvbh_u:2789: sphaṭikānyatvābhimānavadayaṃ jñāneṣu nānātvābhimāno gauṇaḥ na punargandhādyanyatvābhimānavaditi heturnāsti hetvabhāvādanupapanna iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2790: samāno hetvabhāvaḥ iti cet ?. na-- jñānānāṃ krameṇopajanāpāyadarśanātu krameṇa hīndriyārtheṣu
GSP29nysvbh_u:2791: cāpayanti ceti dṛśyate tasmād gandhādyanyatvābhimānavadayaṃ jñāneṣu nānātvābhimāna iti // "sphaṭikānyatvābhimānavat"
GSP29nysvbh_u:2796: sphaṭikepyaparāparotpatteḥ usphaṭike 'py anyā vyaktaya utpadyante anyā nirudhyante iti, katham ? kṣaṇikatvād vyaktīnām, kṣaṇaścālpīyān kālaḥ kṣaṇasthitikāḥ kṣaṇikāḥ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2798: upacayāpacayaprabandhadarśanāt śarīrādiṣu upaktinirvṛttasyāhārarasasya śarīre rudhirādibhāvenopacayo 'pacayaśca prabandhena pravartate upacayād vyaktīnāmutpādaḥ apacayād vyaktinirodhaḥ evaṃ ca satyavayavapariṇāmabhedena vṛddhiḥ śarīrasya kālāntare gṛhyate iti
GSP29nysvbh_u:2801: sarvāsaṃ vyaktiṣu upacayāpacayaprabandhaḥ śarīravaditi nāyaṃ niyamaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2802: kasmāt ?, hetvabhāvāt = nātra pratyakṣamanumānaṃ vā pratipādakamastīti,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2804: yatra yatropacayāpacayaprabandho dṛśyate tatra tatra vyaktīnām aparāparotpattirupacayāpacayaprabandhadarśanenābhyanujñāyate yathā śarīrādiṣu. yatra yatra na dṛśyate tatra tatra pratyākhyāyate yathā grāvaprabhṛtiṣu,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2806: iti, yathā cārkasya kaṭukimnā sarvadravyāṇāṃ kaṭukimānamāpadayet tādṛgetaditi // 11 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2807: yaścāśeṣanirodhenāpūrvotpādaṃ niranvayaṃ dravyasaṃtāne kṣaṇikatāṃ manyate tasyaitat---
GSP29nysvbh_u:2812: yasya tv anapacitāvayavaṃ nirudhyate anupacitāvayavaṃ cotpadyate tasyāśeṣanirodhe niranvaye vāpūrvotpāde na kāraṇamubhayatrāpyupalabhyate iti // 12 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2814: yathānupalabhyamānaṃ kṣīravināśakāraṇaṃ dadhyutpattikāraṇaṃ cābhyanujñāyate tathā sphaṭike parāparāsu vyaktiṣu vināśakāraṇamutpattikāraṇaṃ cābhyanujñeyamiti // 13 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2816: kṣīravināśaliṅgaṃ kṣīravināśakāraṇaṃ dadhyutapattiliṅgaṃ dadhyutpattikāraṇaṃ ca gṛhyate ato
GSP29nysvbh_u:2817: viparyayastu sphaṭikādiṣu dravyeṣu aparāparotpattīnāṃ na liṅgamastītyanuvṛttireveti // 14
GSP29nysvbh_u:2829: saṃmūrchanalakṣaṇādavayavavyūhād dravyāntare dadhni utpanne gṛhyamāṇe pūrvaṃ payodravyam avayavavibhāgebhyo
GSP29nysvbh_u:2830: nivṛttamityanumīyate. yathā mṛdavayavānāṃ vyūhāntarād dravyāntare sthālyāmutpannāyāṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2831: pūrvaṃ mṛtpiṇḍadravyaṃ mṛdavayavavibhāgebhyo nivartate iti, mṛdvaccāvayavānvayaḥ payodadhnoḥ,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2833: abhyanujñāya na niṣkāraṇaṃ kṣīravināśaṃ dadhyutpādaṃ ca pratiṣedha ucyate iti---
GSP29nysvbh_u:2838: nātra heturasti-- akāraṇau vināśotpādau sphaṭikādivyaktīnāṃ kṣīradadhivat na punaryathā vināśakāraṇabhāvāt kumbhasya vināśa utpattikāraṇabhāvāccotpattirevaṃ sphaṭikādivyaktīnāṃ vināśotpattikāraṇabhāvādvināśotpattibhāva iti //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2842: tau tu na gṛhyete tasmānniradhiṣṭhānoyaṃ dṛṣṭānta iti //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2843: abhyanujñāya ca sphaṭikasyotpādavināśau yotra sādhakastasyābhyanujñānādapratiṣedhaḥ // kumbhavanna niṣkāraṇau vināśotpādau
GSP29nysvbh_u:2853: pravartayāmīti prakriyate, soyaṃ buddhau saṃnikarṣotpatteḥ saṃśayaḥ-- viśeṣasyāgrahaṇāditi/
GSP29nysvbh_u:2856: nendriyāṇāmarthānāṃ vā guṇo jñānam-- teṣāṃ vināśe (api) jñānasya
GSP29nysvbh_u:2857: bhāvāt, bhavati khalvidamindriye 'rthe ca vinaṣṭe jñānam 'adrākṣam' iti. na ca jñātari
GSP29nysvbh_u:2858: vinaṣṭe jñānaṃ bhavitumarhati, anyat khalu vai tad indriyārthasaṃnikarṣajaṃ jñānaṃ yad indriyārthavināśe na bhavati, idamanyadātmamanaḥsaṃnikarṣajaṃ tasya yukto bhāva iti usmṛtiḥ khalviyam 'adrākṣam' iti pūrvadṛṣṭaviṣayā na ca vijñātari naṣṭe pūrvopalabdheḥ smaraṇaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2859: yuktam-- na cānyadṛṣṭamanyaḥ smarati, na ca manasi
GSP29nysvbh_u:2865: kasya tarhi ?, jñasya-- vaśitvāt uvaśī jñātā vaśyaṃ karaṇam, jñānaguṇatve vā karaṇabhāvanivṛttiḥ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2866: ghrāṇādisādhanasya ca jñāturgandhādijñānabhāvādanumīyate-- antaḥkaraṇasādhanasya sukhādijñānaṃ smṛtiśceti, tatra yat jñānaguṇaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2867: manaḥ sa ātmā. yattu sukhādyupalabdhisādhanamantaḥkaraṇaṃ manastaditi saṃjñābhedamātraṃ nārthabheda iti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:2868: yugapajjñeyānupalabdheścāyogina iti cārthaḥ, yogī khalu ṛddhau prādurbhūtāyāṃ vikaraṇadharmā nirmāya sendriyāṇi śarīrāntarāṇi teṣu teṣu yugapaj jñeyānyupalabhate taccaitad vibhau jñātaryupapadyate nāṇau manasīti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:2870: vibhu ca manastadantaḥkaraṇabhūtamiti tasya sarvendriyairyugapat saṃyogāt yugapaj jñānānyutpadyeranniti
GSP29nysvbh_u:2872: vibhurātmā sarvendriyaiḥ saṃyukta iti yugapajjñānotpattiprasaṅga iti // 20 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2878: ātmendriyasaṃnikarṣamātrād gandhādijñānamutpadyate iti nātrotpattikāraṇamapadiśyate yenaitat pratipadyemahīti // 22 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2883: nityatvādātmano 'nupapannaḥ pūrvaḥ, virodhī ca buddherguṇo na gṛhyate. tasmādātmaguṇatve sati buddhernityatvaprasaṅgaḥ // 23 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2887: buddherbuddhyantaraṃ virodhī guṇa ityanumīyate yathā śabdasaṃtāne śabdaḥ śabdāntaravirodhīti asaṃkhyeyeṣu jñānakāriteṣu saṃskāreṣu smṛtihetuṣvātmasamaveteṣu ātmamanasośca saṃnikarṣe samāne smṛtihetau sati na kāraṇasyāyaugapadyamastīti yugapatsmṛtayaḥ prādurbhaveyuryadi buddhirātmaguṇaḥ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2890: jñānasādhanaḥ saṃskāro jñānamityucyate jñānasaṃskṛtairātmapradeśaiḥ paryāyeṇa manaḥ saṃnikṛṣyate. ātmamanaḥsaṃnikarṣāt smṛtayopi paryāyeṇa bhavantīti // 25 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2892: sadehasyātmano manasā saṃyogo vipacyamānakarmāśayasahito jīvanamiṣyate tatrāsya prāk prāyaṇādantaḥśarīre vartamānasya manasaḥ śarīrād bahirjñānasaṃskṛtairātmapradeśaiḥ saṃyogo nopapadyate iti // NyS_3,2.27: sādhyatvādahetuḥ //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2893: vipacyamānakarmāśayamātraṃ jīvanam evaṃ ca sati sādhyamantaḥśarīravṛttitvaṃ manasa iti // NyS_3,2.28: smarataḥ śarīradhāraṇopapatterapratiṣedhaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2894: susmūrṣayā khalvayaṃ manaḥ praṇidadhānaḥ cirādapi kaṃ cidarthaṃ smarati smarataśca śarīradhāraṇaṃ dṛśyate, ātmamanaḥsaṃnikarṣajaśca prayatno dvividhaḥ--
GSP29nysvbh_u:2896: dhārakasya prayatnasyābhāvād gurutvātpatanaṃ syāt śarīrasyātmavata iti // 28 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2898: āśugati manastasya bahiḥ śarīrādātmapradeśena jñānasaṃskṛtena saṃnikarṣaḥ pratyāgatasya ca prayatnotpādanam ubhayaṃ yujyate iti. utpādya vā dhārakaṃ prayatnaṃ śarīrānniḥsaraṇaṃ manaso 'tastatropapannaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2902: yadā cireṇa tadā susmūrṣayā manasi dhāryamāṇe cintāprabandhe sati kasya cidarthasya liṅgabhūtasya cintanamārādhitaṃ smṛtiheturbhavati tatraitat ciraniścarite manasi nopapadyate iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2903: śarīrasaṃyogānapekṣaścātmamanaḥsaṃyogo na smṛtihetuḥ-- śarīrasyopabhogāyatanatvāt = upabhogāyatanaṃ puruṣasya jñātuḥ śarīraṃ na tato niścaritasya manasa ātmasaṃyogamātraṃ jñānasukhādīnāmutpattau kalpate, kḷptau vā śarīra vaiyarthyamiti // 30 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2905: ātmapreraṇena vā manaso bahiḥ śarīrāt saṃyogaviśeṣaḥ syād yadṛcchayā vā |
GSP29nysvbh_u:2906: ākasmikatayā jñatayā vā manasaḥ, sarvathā cānupapattiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh_u:2908: yadi tāvadātmā-- 'amuṣyārthasya smṛtihetuḥ saṃskāro 'muṣminnātmapradeśe samavetastena manaḥ saṃyujyatām' iti manaḥ prerayati tadā smṛta evāsāvartho bhavati na smartavyaḥ, na cātmapratyakṣa ātmapradeśaḥ saṃskāro vā tatrānupapannātmapratyakṣeṇa
GSP29nysvbh_u:2910: susmūrṣayā cāyaṃ manaḥ praṇidadhānaścirādapi kañcidarthaṃ smarati nākasmāt|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2914: yadā khalvayaṃ vyāsaktamanāḥ kvacid deśe śarkarayā kaṇṭakena vā pādavyathanamāpnoti tadātmamanaḥsaṃyogaviśeṣa
GSP29nysvbh_u:2915: dṛṣṭaṃ hi duḥkhaṃ duḥkhavedanaṃ ceti. tatrāyaṃ samānaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ, yadṛcchayā tu na viśaiṣaḥ--
GSP29nysvbh_u:2918: karmādṛṣṭaṃ puruṣasthaṃ puruṣopabhogārthaṃ manasi kriyāhetuḥ evaṃ duḥkhaṃ duḥkhasaṃvedanaṃ na sidhyati cetyevaṃ cenmanyase ?, samānaṃ smṛtihetāvapi |
GSP29nysvbh_u:2927: yathā khalvātmamanasoḥ saṃnikarṣaḥ saṃskāraśca smṛtiheturevaṃ praṇidhānaṃ liṅgādijñānāni.
GSP29nysvbh_u:2928: tāni ca na yugapad bhavanti tatkṛtā smṛtīnāṃ yugapadanutpattiriti // 33 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2930: yat khalvidaṃ prātibhamiva jñānaṃ praṇidhānādyanapekṣaṃ smārtamutpadyate kadācit tasya yugapadutpattiprasaṅgaḥ--
GSP29nysvbh_u:2932: sataḥ smṛtihetorasaṃvedanāt prātibheda samānābhimānaḥ = bahvarthaviṣaye vai cintāprabandhe
GSP29nysvbh_u:2934: tasyānucintanāt tasya smṛtirbhavati, na cāyaṃ smartā sarvaṃ smṛtihetuṃ saṃvedayate = 'evaṃ me smṛtirutpanna'
GSP29nysvbh_u:2939: prātibhāmidānīṃ jñānaṃ yugapat kasmānnotpadyate ?. yathopabhogārthaṃ karma yugapadupabhogaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2940: na karoti evaṃ puruṣakarmaviśeṣaḥ pratibhāheturna yugapadanekaṃ prātibhaṃ jñānamutpādayati
GSP29nysvbh_u:2944: ityasti dṛṣṭānto heturnāstīti cenmanyase ? na-- karaṇasya pratyayaparyāye sāmarthyād
GSP29nysvbh_u:2945: naikasmin jñeye yugapadanekaṃ jñānamutpadyate na cānekasmin, tadidaṃ dṛṣṭena pratyayaparyāyeṇānumeyaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2948: ayaṃ ca dvitīyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ-- vyavasthitaśarīrasya cānekajñānasamavāyādekapradeśe yugapadanekārthasmaraṇaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2950: jñāturindriyārthaprabandhena jñānamekasminnātmapradeśe samavaiti taina yadā manaḥ saṃyujyate tadā jñātapūrvasyānekasya yugapat smaraṇaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2954: śabdasaṃtāne tu śrotrādhiṣṭhānapratyāsattyā śabdaśravaṇavat saṃskārapratyāsattyā manasaḥ smṛtyutpatterna
GSP29nysvbh_u:2963: ayaṃ khalu jānīte tāvat-- 'idaṃ me sukhasādhanam idaṃ me duḥkhasādhanam' iti. jñātaṃ svasya sukhasādhanamāptumicchati duḥkhasādhanaṃ hātumicchati. prāptumicchāyuktasyāsya sukhasādhanāvāptaye samīhāviśeṣa ārambhaḥ jihāsāprayuktasya duḥkhasādhanaparivarjanaṃ nivṛttiḥ evaṃ jñānecchāprayatnadveṣasukhaduḥkhānāmekenābhisaṃbandhaḥ ekakartṛtvaṃ jñānecchāpravṛttīnāṃ samānaśrayatvaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2965: nācetanasyeti, ārambhanivṛttyośca pratyagātmani dṛṣṭatvāt paratrānumānaṃ veditavyamiti
GSP29nysvbh_u:2969: yasyārambhanivṛttī tasyecchādveṣau tasya jñānamiti prāptam-- pārthivāpyataijasavāyavīnāṃ śarīrāṇāmārambhanivṛttidarśanādicchādveṣajñānairyoga iti caitanyam // 36 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2974: atha śarīrasyecchādibhiryogaḥ paraśvādestu karaṇasyārambhanivṛttī vyabhicarataḥ ?, na tarhyayaṃ hetuḥ-- 'pārthivāpyataijasavāyavīnāṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2984: kumbhādimṛdavayavānāṃ vyūhaliṅgaḥ pravṛttiviśeṣa ārambhaḥ sikatādiṣu pravṛttiviśeṣābhāvo
GSP29nysvbh_u:2992: bhedakau, jñasyecchādveṣanimitte pravṛttinivṛttī na svāśraye, kiṃ tarhi ?. prayojyāśraye. tatra prayujyamāneṣu bhūteṣu pravṛttinivṛttī staḥ na sarveṣvity aniyamopapattiḥ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:2993: yasya tu jñatvād bhūtānāmicchādveṣanimitte ārambhanivṛttī svāśraye tasya niyamaḥna syāt |
GSP29nysvbh_u:2994: yathā bhūtānāṃ guṇāntaranimittā pravṛttiḥ guṇapratibandhācca nivṛttirbhūtamātre bhavati niyamena eva bhūtamātre jñānecchādveṣanimitte pravṛttinivṛttī svāśraye syātāṃ na tu bhavataḥ tasmāt prayojakāśritā jñānecchādveṣiprayatnāḥ prayojyāśraye tu pravṛttinivṛttī
GSP29nysvbh_u:2997: bhūtacaitanikasya ekaśarīre bahūni bhūtāni jñānecchādveṣaprayatnaguṇānīti jñātṛbahutvaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2998: prāptam, omiti bruvataḥ pramāṇaṃ nāsti, yathā nānāśarīreṣu nānājñātāro pratyayavyavasthānād evamekaśarīrepi pratyayavyavasthānumānaṃ syāt jñātṛbahutvasyeti //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3000: dṛṣṭaḥ karaṇalakṣaṇeṣu bhūteṣu paraśvādiṣu upādānalakṣaṇeṣu ca mṛtprabhṛtiṣu anyaguṇanimittaḥ pravṛttiviśeṣaḥ sonumānamanyatrāpi |
GSP29nysvbh_u:3001: sa trasasthāvaraśarīreṣu tadavayavavyūhaliṅgaḥ pravṛttiviśeṣo bhūtānām anyaguṇanimitta iti, sa ca guṇaḥ prayatnasamānāśrayaḥ saṃskāro dharmādharmasamākhyātaḥ sarvārthaḥ puruṣārthārādhanāya prayojako bhūtānāṃ prayatnavaditi/
GSP29nysvbh_u:3008: na ca tathāvidhe pṛthivyādiṣu dṛśyete tasmādayuktam--
GSP29nysvbh_u:3015: ityataḥ prabhṛti yathoktaṃ saṃgṛhyate tena bhūtendriyamanasāṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:3016: caitanyapratiṣedhaḥ, pāratantryāt uparatantrāṇi bhūtendriyamanāṃsidhāraṇapreraṇavyūhanakriyāsu prayatnavaśāt pravartante. caitanye punaḥ svatantrāṇi
GSP29nysvbh_u:3019: caitanye bhūtendriyamanasāṃ parakṛtaṃ karma puruṣeṇopabhujte iti syāt, acaitanye tu tatsādhanasya svakṛtakarmaphalopabhogaḥ puruṣasyetyupapadyate iti // 40 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3024: bhūtendriyamanasāṃ pratiṣedhe dravyāntaraṃ na prasajyate śiṣyate cātmā tasya guṇo jñānamiti jñāyate, yathoktahetūpapatteśceti--
GSP29nysvbh_u:3029: iti hetvantaramevedam-- nityaḥ khalvayamātmā yasmādekasmin śarīre dharmaṃ caritvā kāyabhedāt svarge deveṣūpapadyate. adharmaṃ caritvā dehabhedād narakeṣūpapadyate iti,
GSP29nysvbh_u:3033: buddhiprabandhamātre tu nirātmake nirāśrayā nopapadyate iti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:3035: buddhisaṃtatimātre tvekasattvānupapatterna kaścid dīrghamadhvānaṃ saṃdhāvati. na kaścit śarīraprabandhādvimucyata iti saṃsārāpavargānupapattiriti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:3036: buddhisaṃtatimātre ca sattvabhedāt sarvamidaṃ prāṇivyavahārajātam apratisaṃhitam avyāvṛttam apariniṣṭhitaṃ ca syāt tataḥ smaraṇābhāvāt--
GSP29nysvbh_u:3039: 'ajñāsiṣamamumarthaṃ jñeyam' iti. soyameko jñātā pūrvajñātamarthaṃ gṛhṇāti taccāsya grahaṇaṃ smaraṇamiti. tad buddhiprabandhamātre nirātmake nopapadyate // 41 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3041: upapadyate iti, ātmana eva smaraṇaṃ na buddhisaṃtatimātrasyeti,
GSP29nysvbh_u:3046: jānāti ajñāsīt' iti trikālaviṣayeṇānekena jñānena saṃbadhyate. taccāsya trikālaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ pratyātmavedanīyam-- 'jñāsyāmi
GSP29nysvbh_u:3047: jānāmi ajñāsiṣam' iti vartate. tad yasyāyaṃ svo dharmastasya smaraṇaṃ na buddhiprabandhamātrasya nirātmakasyeti // 42 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3049: atha kebhyaḥ smṛtirutpadyate iti ?, smṛtiḥ khalu---
GSP29nysvbh_u:3053: ekagranthopayatāḥ khalvarthā anyonyasmṛtihetavaḥ ānupūrvyeṇetarathā vā bhavantīti, dhāraṇāśāstrakṛto vā prajñāteṣu vastuṣu smartavyānāmupanikṣepo nibandha iti 2,
GSP29nysvbh_u:3054: abhyāsastu samāne viṣaye jñānānāmabhyāvṛttiḥ abhyāsajanitaḥ saṃskāra ātmaguṇo 'bhyāsaśabdenocyate sa ca smṛtihetuḥ samāna iti 3,
GSP29nysvbh_u:3055: liṅgaṃ punaḥ saṃyogi samavāyi ekārthasamavāyi virodhi ceti, saṃyogi yathā dhūmo 'gneḥ gorviṣaṇaṃ pāṇiḥ pādasya rūpaṃ sparśasya abhūtaṃ bhūtasyeti 4, lakṣaṇaṃ paśvavayavasthaṃ gotrasya smṛtihetuḥ-- vidānāmidaṃ gargāṇāmidamiti 5, sādṛśyaṃ citragataṃ pratirūpakaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:3056: devadattasyetyevamādi 6, parigrahāt-- svena vā svāmī svāminā vā svaṃ smaryate 7, āśrayāt--
GSP29nysvbh_u:3058: tadadhīnena grāmaṇyamiti 9, saṃbandhāt-- antevāsinā yuktaṃ guruṃ smarati ṛtvijā yājyamiti
GSP29nysvbh_u:3060: viyogāt-- yena viprayujyate tadviyogapratisaṃvedī bhṛśaṃ smarati 12,
GSP29nysvbh_u:3062: vijigīṣamāṇayoranyataradarśanādanyataraḥ smaryate 14, atiśayāt-- yenātiśaya utpāditaḥ 15, prāpteḥ-- yato yena kiñcit prāptamāptavyaṃ vā bhavati tamabhīkṣṇaṃ smarati 16, vyavadhānāt--
GSP29nysvbh_u:3063: kośādibhirasibhṛtīni smaryante 17, sukhaduḥkhābhyāṃ taddhetuḥ smaryate 19, icchādveṣābhyāṃ yamicchati yaṃ ca dveṣṭi taṃ smarati 21, bhayāt-- yato bibheti 22, arthitvāt-- yenārthī bhojanen ācchādanena
GSP29nysvbh_u:3065: rāgāt-- yasyāṃ striyāṃ rakto bhavati tāmabhīkṣṇaṃ smarati 25, dharmāt jātyantarasmaraṇam iha
GSP29nysvbh_u:3066: cādhītaśrutāvadhāraṇamiti26, adharmāt prāganubhūtaduḥkhasādhanaṃ smarati 27, na caiteṣu nimitteṣu yugapatsaṃvedanāni bhavantīti yugapadasmaraṇamiti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:3068: anityāyāṃ ca buddhau utpannāpavargitvāt kālāntarāvasthānāccānityānāṃ saṃśayaḥ--
GSP29nysvbh_u:3075: kṣiptasyeṣorāpatanāt kriyāsaṃtāno gṛhyate, gatyarthaniyamācca buddhīnāṃ kriyāsaṃtānavad
GSP29nysvbh_u:3077: avasthite ca kumbhe gṛhyamāṇe saṃtānenaiva buddhirvartate prāg vyavadhānāt. tena vyavahite pratyakṣaṃ jñānaṃ nivartate, kālāntarāvasthāne tu buddherdṛśyavyavadhānepi
GSP29nysvbh_u:3081: avatiṣṭhate buddhiḥ-- dṛṣṭā hi buddhiviṣaye smṛtiḥ sā ca buddhāvanityāyāṃ kāraṇābhāvānna syāditi, tadidamaliṅgam,
GSP29nysvbh_u:3085: yāvadavatiṣṭhate buddhistāvadasau boddhavyārthaḥ pratyakṣaḥ pratyakṣe ca smṛtiranupapanneti NyS_3,2.45: avyaktagrahaṇamanavasthāyitvād vidyutsaṃpāte rūpāvyaktagrahaṇavat //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3087: prāptam avyaktaṃ boddhavyasya grahaṇaṃ yathā vidyutsaṃpāte vaidyutasya prakāśasyānavasthānādavyaktaṃ rūpagrahaṇamiti. vyaktaṃ tu dravyaṇāṃ grahaṇaṃ tasmādayuktametaditi // 45 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3095: // yadidaṃ kvacidavyaktaṃ kvacid vyaktaṃ grahaṇam ayaṃ vikalpo grahaṇahetuvikalpāt uyatrānavasthito grahaṇahetustatrāvyaktaṃ grahaṇam yatrāvasthitastatra vyaktaṃ na tu buddher avasthānānavasthānābhyāmiti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:3097: yat tadarthagrahaṇam avyaktaṃ vyaktaṃ vā buddhiḥ
GSP29nysvbh_u:3098: seti, viśeṣāgrahaṇe ca sāmānyagrahaṇam avyaktagrahaṇaṃ tatra
GSP29nysvbh_u:3100: yatra sāmānyadharmayuktaśca dharmī gṛhyate viśeṣadharmayuktaśca tad vyaktaṃ grahaṇaṃ. tatra tu viśeṣe 'gṛhyamāṇe
GSP29nysvbh_u:3102: sāmānyadharmayogācca viśiṣṭadharmayogo viṣayāntaram, tatra yad grahaṇaṃ na bhavati tad grahaṇanimittābhāvād na nu buddheranavasthānāditi/
GSP29nysvbh_u:3103: yathāviṣayaṃ ca grahaṇa vyaktameva-- pratyarthaniyatatvācca buddhīnām |
GSP29nysvbh_u:3104: sāmānyaviṣayaṃ ca grahaṇaṃ svaviṣayaṃ prati vyaktaṃ viśeṣaviṣayaṃ ca grahaṇaṃ svaviṣayaṃ prati vyaktam-- pratyarthaniyatā hi buddhayaḥ, tadidamavyaktagrahaṇaṃ deśitaṃ kva viṣaye buddhyanavasthānakāritaṃ syāditi
GSP29nysvbh_u:3105: // dharmiṇastu dharmabhede buddhinānātvasya bhāvābhāvābhyāṃ tadupapattiḥ dharmiṇaḥ khalvarthasya samānāśca dharmā viśiṣṭāśca teṣu pratyarthaniyatāḥ = nānā buddhayastā ubhayyo yadi dharmiṇi vartante tadā vyaktaṃ grahaṇaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:3106: dharmiṇamabhipretya. yadā tu sāmānyagrahaṇamātraṃ tadāvyaktaṃ grahaṇamiti. evaṃ dharmiṇamabhipretya vyaktāvyaktayorgrahaṇayorupapattiriti, na cedamavyaktaṃ grahaṇaṃ buddherboddhavyasya vānavasthāyitvādupapadyate iti // 46 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3109: anavasthāyitvepi buddheḥ teṣāṃ dravyāṇāṃ grahaṇaṃ vyaktaṃ pratipattavyam/
GSP29nysvbh_u:3111: pradīpārciḥsaṃtatyabhivyaktagrahaṇavat upradīpārciṣāṃ saṃtatyā vartamānānāṃ grahaṇānavasthānaṃ grāhyānavasthānaṃ ca, pratyarthaniyatatvādvā buddhīnāṃ yāvanti pradīpārcīṣi tāvatyo buddhaya iti. dṛśyate cātra vyaktaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:3113: cetanā śarīraguṇaḥ-- sati śarīre bhāvādasati cābhāvāditi|
GSP29nysvbh_u:3117: tenāyaṃ saṃśayaḥ-- kiṃ śarīraguṇaścetanā śarīre gṛhyate ? atha dravyāntaraguṇaḥ ? iti //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3121: na rūpādihīnaṃ śarīraṃ gṛhyate cetanāhīnaṃ tu gṛhyate yathoṣṇatāhīnā āpaḥ tasmānna śarīraguṇaścetaneti
GSP29nysvbh_u:3123: yathāvidhe dravye saṃkārastathāvidhe evoparamaḥ ?. na-- tatra kāraṇocchedādatyantaṃ saṃskārānupattirbhavati,
GSP29nysvbh_u:3124: yathāvidhe śarīre cetanā gṛhyate tathāvidhe evātyantoparamaścetanāyā
GSP29nysvbh_u:3126: athāpi śarīrasthaṃ cetanotpattikāraṇaṃ syāt dravyāntarasthaṃ vā ubhayasthaṃ vā, tanna--
GSP29nysvbh_u:3127: niyamahetvabhāvāt uśarīrasthena kadācit cetanotpadyate kadācinneti niyame heturnāstīti.
GSP29nysvbh_u:3128: dravyāntarasthena ca śarīre eva cetanotpadyate na loṣṭādiṣvityatra
GSP29nysvbh_u:3130: cetanā notpadyate śarīre eva cotpadyate itiniyame heturnāstīti // 49 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3132: manyeta-- sati śyāmādiguṇe dravye śyāmādyuparamo dṛṣṭa evaṃ cetanoparamaḥ syāditi,
GSP29nysvbh_u:3134: nātyantarūpoparamaḥ = dravyasya śyāme rūpe nivṛtte pākajaṃ guṇāntaram uraktaṃ rūpamutpadyate, śarīre tu cetanāmātroparamo 'tyantamiti // 50 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3138: pākajotpattirdṛśyate-- pūrvaguṇaiḥ saha pākajānāmavasthānasyāgrahaṇāt. na ca śarīre
GSP29nysvbh_u:3139: cetanāpratidvandvi sahānavasthāyi guṇāntaraṃ gṛhyate yenānumīyeta tena cetanāyā virodhaḥ, tasmādapratiṣaddhā cetanā yāvaccharīraṃ varteta na tu vartate tasmānna śarīraguṇaścetanā iti itaśca na śarīraguṇaścetanā---
GSP29nysvbh_u:3141: śarīraṃ śarīrāvayavāśca sarve cetanotpattyā vyāptā iti na
GSP29nysvbh_u:3142: kvacidanutpattiścetanāyāḥ. śarīravat śarīrāvayavāścetanā iti prāptaṃ cetanabahutvam, tatra yathā pratiśarīraṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:3143: cetanabahutve sukhaduḥkhajñānānāṃ vyavasthā liṅgam evamekaśarīrepi syāt. na tu bhavati. tasmānna śarīraguṇaścetaneti // 52 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3150: tvakparyantaṃ jīvamanaḥsukhaduḥkhasaṃvittyāyatanabhūtaṃ śarīraṃ tasmānna keśādiṣu cetanotpadyate, arthakāritastu śarīropanibandhaḥ keśādīnāmiti // 54 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3154: apratyakṣaṃ ca gurutvam indriyagrāhyaṃ ca rūpādi,
GSP29nysvbh_u:3160: jahati. evaṃ rūpādivaidharmyārt cetanā śarīraguṇatvaṃ na hāsyatīti // 56 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3162: apratyakṣatvācceti, yathetaretaravidharmāṇo rūpādayo na dvaividhyamativartante tathā rūpādivaidharmyāt
GSP29nysvbh_u:3163: cetanā na dvaividhyamativarteta yadi śarīraguṇaḥ syāditi. ativarttate tu tasmānna śarīraguṇa iti //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3166: parīkṣitā buddhiḥ, manasa idānīṃ parīkṣākramaḥ tat kiṃ pratiśarīramekamanekamiti
GSP29nysvbh_u:3170: ekaikasyendriyasya yathāviṣayaṃ karaṇasyaikapratyayanirvṛttau sāmarthyāt na tadekatve manaso liṅgam. yattu khalvindriyāntarāṇāṃ viṣayāntareṣu jñānāyaugapadyamiti talliṅgam/
GSP29nysvbh_u:3171: kasmāt ?. saṃbhavati khalu vai bahuṣu manaḥsu indriyamanaḥsaṃyogayaugapadyamiti jñānayaugapadyaṃ syāt. na tu bhavati
GSP29nysvbh_u:3174: ayaṃ khalvadhyāpako 'dhīte vrajati kamaṇḍaluṃ dhārayati panthānaṃ paśyati śṛṇotyāraṇyajān śabdān bibheti vyālaliṅgāni bubhutsate smarati ca gantavyaṃ sthānīyamiti kramasyāgrahaṇād yugapadetāḥ kriyā iti prāptaṃ manaso bahutvamiti // 59 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3176: āśusaṃcārādalātacakrasya bhramato vidyamānaḥ kramo na gṛhyate.
GSP29nysvbh_u:3177: kramasyāgrahaṇād avicchedabuddhyā cakravad buddhirbhavati, tathā buddhīnāṃ kriyāṇāṃ cāśuvṛttitvād
GSP29nysvbh_u:3178: kramo na gṛhyate. kramasyāgrahaṇād yugapat kriyā bhavanatīti abhimāno bhavati|
GSP29nysvbh_u:3179: kiṃ punaḥ kramasyāgrahaṇād yugapat kriyābhimānaḥ ? atha yugapadbhāvādeva yugapadanekakriyopalabdhiriti ?, nātra viśeṣapratipatteḥ kāraṇamucyate|
GSP29nysvbh_u:3181: indriyāntarāṇāṃ viṣayāntareṣu paryāyeṇa buddhayo bhavantīti, taccāpratyākhyeyam-- ātmapratyakṣatvāt/
GSP29nysvbh_u:3182: athāpi dṛṣṭaśrutānarthāṃścintayataḥ krameṇa buddhayo vartante na yugapad anenānumātavyamiti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:3185: katham ?, vākyastheṣu khalu varṇeṣūccaratsu prativarṇaṃ tāvacchravaṇaṃ bhavati.
GSP29nysvbh_u:3187: pratisaṃdhāya padaṃ vyavasyati. padavyavasāyena smṛtyāpadārthaṃ pratipadyate,
GSP29nysvbh_u:3190: pratipadyate, na cāsāṃ krameṇa vartamānānāṃ buddhīnāmāśuvṛttitvāt kramo gṛhyate. tadetadanumānamanyatra
GSP29nysvbh_u:3191: na cāsti muktasaṃśayā yugapadutpattirbuddhīnāṃ yayā manaso bahutvamekaśarīre 'numīyate
GSP29nysvbh_u:3194: aṇu mana ekaṃ ceti dharmasamuccayaḥ-- jñānāyaugapadyāt,
GSP29nysvbh_u:3195: mahattve manasaḥ sarvendriyasaṃyogād yugapad viṣayagrahaṇaṃ syāditi // 61 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3196: manasaḥ khalu bhoḥ sendriyasya śarīre vṛttilābho nānyatra
GSP29nysvbh_u:3198: buddhyādayo viṣayopabhogo jihāsitahānam īpsitāvāptiśca sarve ca śarīrāśrayā vyavahārāḥ, tatra khalu vipratipatteḥ saṃśayaḥ-- kimayaṃ puruṣakarmanimittaḥ śarīrasargaḥ ? atha vā bhūtamātrādakarmanimittaḥ iti, śrūyate khalvatra vipratipattiriti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:3201: pūrvaśarīre yā pravṛttiḥ vāgbuddhiśarīrārambhalakṣaṇā tat pūrvakṛtaṃ karmoktaṃ tasya phalam
GSP29nysvbh_u:3203: ātmasamavetasyāvasthānam. tena prayuktebhyo bhūtebhyastasya śarīrasyotpattirna svatantrebhya
GSP29nysvbh_u:3206: yatrābhiyukto yatropabhogatṛṣṇayā viṣayānupalabhamāno dharmādharmauṃ saṃskaroti tadasya śarīram. tena saṃskāreṇa dharmādharmalakṣaṇena bhūtasahitena patite 'smin
GSP29nysvbh_u:3208: niṣpannasya ca tasya pūrvaśarīra vat puruṣārthakriyā puruṣasya ca pūrvaśarīra vatpravṛttiriti karmāpekṣebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ śarīrasargesati etadupapadyate iti, dṛṣṭā ca puruṣaguṇena prayatnena prayuktebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ puruṣārthakriyāsamarthānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:3215: yathā karmanirapekṣebhyo bhūtebhyo nirvṛttā mūrtayaḥ usikatāśarkarāpāṣāṇagairikāñjanaprabhṛtayaḥ puruṣārthakāritvādupādīyante tathā karmanirapekṣebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ śarīmutpannaṃ puruṣārthakāritvādupādīyate iti // 63 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3217: yathā śarīrotpattirakarmanimittā sādhyā tathā sikatāśarkarāpāṣāṇagairikāñjanaprabhṛtīnāmapy akarmanimittaḥ sargaḥ sādhyaḥ sādhyasamatvādasādhanamiti = "bhūtebhyo mūrtyupādānavat"
GSP29nysvbh_u:3220: viṣamaścāyamupanyāsaḥ, kasmāt ?, nirbījā imā mūrtaya utpadyante. bījapūrvikā tu śarīrotpattiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh_u:3222: gṛhyete, tatra sattvasvaya garbhavāsānubhavanīyaṃ karma pitrośca putrulānubhavanīye karmaṇī māturgarbhāśraye śarīrotpattiṃ bhūtebhyaḥ prayojayanti ityupapannaṃ bījānuvidhānamiti
GSP29nysvbh_u:3228: mātrayā copacayaḥ bīje yāvad vyūhasamarthaḥ saṃcaya iti. saṃcitaṃ cārbudamāṃsapeśīkalakakaṇḍaraśiraḥpāṇyādinā ca vyūhena indriyādhiṣṭhānabhedena vyūhyate.
GSP29nysvbh_u:3229: vyūhe ca garbhaganāḍyāvatāritaṃ rasadravyamupacīyate yāvat prasavasamarthamiti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:3235: tatrāsati karmaṇi na bhavati sati ca bhavatītyupapanno niyamābhāva iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:3240: yathā khalvidaṃ śarīraṃ dhātuprāṇasaṃvāhinīnāṃ nāḍīnāṃ śukrāntānāṃ dhātūnāṃ ca snāyutvagasthiśirāpeśīkalalakaṇḍarāṇāṃ ca śirobāhūdarāṇāṃ sakthnāṃ ca koṣṭhagānāṃ vātapittakaphānāṃ ca mukhakaṇṭhahṛdayāmāśayapakvāśayādhaḥstrotasāṃ ca paramaduḥkhasaṃpādanīyena saṃniveśena vyūhitam aśakyaṃ pṛthivyādibhiḥ karmanirapekṣairutpādayitumiti karmanimittā śarīrotpattiriti
GSP29nysvbh_u:3242: nimittasyābhāvād niratiśayairātmabhiḥ saṃbandhāt sarvātmanāṃ na samānaiḥ pṛthivyādibhirutpāditaṃ śarīraṃ pṛthivyādigatasya ca
GSP29nysvbh_u:3243: niyamahetorabhāvāt sarvātmanāṃ sukhaduḥkhasaṃvittisādhanaṃ samānaṃ prāptam, yattu pratyātmaṃ vyavatiṣṭhate tatra śarīrotpattinimittaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:3244: karma vyavasthāheturiti vijñāyate, paripacyamāno hi pratyātmaniyataḥ karmāśayo yasminnātmani vartate tasyaivopabhogāyatanaṃ śarīramutpādya
GSP29nysvbh_u:3245: vyavasthāpayati, tadevaṃ śarīrotpattinimittavat saṃyoganimittaṃ karmeti vijñāyate|
GSP29nysvbh_u:3246: pratyātmavyavasthānaṃ tu śarīrasyātmanā saṃyogaṃ pracakṣmahe iti // 68 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3248: yo 'yamakarmanimitte śarīrasarge sati niyama ityucyate ayam--
GSP29nysvbh_u:3252: kastāvadayaṃ niyamaḥ ?. yathaikasyātmanaḥ śarīraṃ tathā sarveṣāmiti niyamaḥ, anyasyānyathā anyasyānyathā ity aniyamaḥ |
GSP29nysvbh_u:3253: bhedaḥ uvyāvṛttiviśeṣa iti, dṛṣṭā ca janmavyāvṛttiḥ-- uccābhijano nikṛṣṭābhijana iti. praśastaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:3261: asati karmabhede pratyātmaniyate niratiśayatvādātmanāṃ samānatvācca pṛthivyādīnāṃ pṛthivyādigatasya niyamahetorabhāvāt sarvaṃ sarvātmanāṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:3262: prasajyeta, na tvidamitthambhūtaṃ janma,tasmād nākarmanimittā śarīrotpattiriti // 69
GSP29nysvbh_u:3264: karmanimitte śarīrasarge tena śarīreṇātmano viyoga upapannaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh_u:3267: prakṣīṇe mohe vītarāgaḥ punarbhavahetukarma kāyavāṅmanobhirna karoti ityuttarasyānupacayaḥ pūrvopacitasya vipākapratisaṃvedanāt prakṣayaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh_u:3274: na jātv anutpanne śarīre draṣṭā nirāyatano dṛśyaṃ paśyati. taccāsya dṛśyaṃ dvividham--
GSP29nysvbh_u:3276: śarīrasargaḥ, tasminn avasite caritārthāni bhūtāni na śarīramutpādayantīti upapannaḥ śarīraviyoga iti, evaṃ cenmanyase ? punastatprasaṅgo 'pavarge |
GSP29nysvbh_u:3278: yā cānutpanne śarīre darśanānutpattiradarśanābhimatā yā cāpavarge śarīranivṛttau darśanānutpattiradarśanabhūtā naitayoradarśanayoḥ kvacid viśeṣaityadarśanasyānivṛtterapavarge punaḥ śarīrotpattiprasaṅga iti //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3281: caritārthāni bhūtāni darśanāvasānād na śarīrāntaramārabhante ityayaṃ viśeṣaḥ.
GSP29nysvbh_u:3283: karaṇākaraṇayorārambhadarśanāt = caritārthānāṃ bhūtānāṃ viṣayopalabdhikaraṇāt punaḥ punaḥ śarīrārambho dṛśyate.
GSP29nysvbh_u:3286: śarīrotpattiryuktā. yuktā tu karmanimitte sarge darśanārthā śarīrotpattiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh_u:3287: karmaviṣākasaṃvedanaṃ darśanamiti tadadṛṣṭakāritamiti ca kasyacid darśanam |
GSP29nysvbh_u:3288: adṛṣṭaṃ nāma paramāṇūnāṃ guṇaviśeṣaḥ kriyāhetustena preritāḥ paramāṇavaḥ saṃmūrcchitāḥ śarīramutpādayantīti tad manaḥ samāviśati svaguṇenādṛṣṭena preritam. samanaske śarīre draṣṭurupalabdhirbhavatīti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:3293: manoguṇenādṛṣṭena samāveśite manasi saṃyogavyucchedo na syāt. tatra kiṅkṛtaṃ śarīrādapasarpaṇaṃ manasa iti ?|
GSP29nysvbh_u:3299: evaṃ ca sati ekamadṛṣṭaṃ jīvanaprāyaṇayorheturitiprāptaṃ naitadupapadyate // 72 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3303: bhūtamātrāttu karmanirapekṣāt śarīrotpattau kasya kṣayāt śarīrapātaḥ |
GSP29nysvbh_u:3310: yathāṇoḥ śyāmatā nityā agnisaṃyogena pratibaddhā na punarutpadyate evamadṛṣṭakāritaṃ śarīramapavarge punarnotpadyate iti // 74 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3323: akṛte sukhaduḥkhohetau karmaṇi puruṣasya sukhaṃ duḥkhamabhyāgacchatīti prasajyeta,
GSP29nysvbh_u:3325: pratyakṣavirodhastāvat-- bhinnamidaṃ sukhaduḥkhaṃ pratyātmavedanīyatvāt pratyakṣaṃ sarvaśarīriṇām/
GSP29nysvbh_u:3329: sukhaduḥkhahetuviśeṣaḥ, na cāsati hetuviśeṣe phalaviśeṣo dṛśyate/
GSP29nysvbh_u:3330: karmanimitte tu sukhaduḥkhayoge karmaṇāṃ tīvramandatopapatteḥ karmasaṃcayānāṃ cotkarṣāpakarṣabhāvād nānāvidhaikavidhabhāvācca karmaṇāṃ sukhaduḥkhabhedopapattiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh_u:3331: soyaṃ hetubhedābhāvād dṛṣṭaḥ sukhaduḥkhabhedo na syāditi pratyakṣavirodhaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3332: tathānumānavirodhaḥ-- dṛṣṭaṃ hi puruṣaguṇavyavasthānāt sukhaduḥkhavyavasthānam uyaḥ khalu cetanāvān sādhananirvartanīyaṃ sukhaṃ buddhvā tadīpsan sādhanāvāptaye yatate sa sukhena yujyate na viparītaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh_u:3333: yaśca sādhananirvartanīyaṃ duḥkhaṃ buddhvā tajjihāsuḥ sādhanapari varjanāya yatate sa duḥkhena tyajyate na viparītaḥ, nāsti cedaṃ yatnamantareṇa cetanānāṃ sukhaduḥkhavyavasthānaṃ tenāpi cetanaguṇāntaravyavasthākṛtena bhavitavyamityanumānam.
GSP29nysvbh_u:3334: tadetad akarmanimitte sukhaduḥkhayoge virudhyate iti, tacca guṇāntaram asaṃvedyatvādadṛṣṭaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:3338: upadeśaphalaṃ ca śarīriṇāṃ varṇāśramavibhāgenānuṣṭhānalakṣaṇā pravṛttiḥ parivarjanalakṣaṇā
GSP29nysvbh_u:3339: taccobhayametasyāṃ dṛṣṭau 'nāsti karma sucaritaṃ duścaritaṃ vākarmanimittaḥ puruṣāṇāṃ sukhaduḥkhayogaḥ'
GSP29nysvbh_u:3346: manaso 'nantaraṃ pravṛttiḥ parīkṣitavyā, tatra khalu yāvad
GSP29nysvbh_u:3347: dharmādharmāśrayaśarīrādi parīkṣitaṃ sarvā sā pravṛtteḥ parīkṣetyāha---
GSP29nysvbh_u:3358: ityuktaṃ tathā ceme mānerṣyāsūyāvicikitsāmatsarādayaḥ te kasmānnopasaṃkhyāyante ? ityata āha---
GSP29nysvbh_u:3361: trayaḥ pakṣāḥ-- rāgapakṣaḥ-- kāmo matsaraḥ spṛhā tṛṣṇā lobha iti.
GSP29nysvbh_u:3362: dveṣapakṣaḥ-- krodha īrṣyāsūyā droho 'marṣa iti, mohapakṣaḥ-- mithyājñānaṃ vicikitsā mānaḥ pramāda iti. trairāśyānnopasaṃkhyāyante iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:3365: āsaktilakṣaṇo rāgaḥ. amarṣalakṣaṇo dveṣaḥ. mithyāpratipattilakṣaṇo moha iti, etat pratayātmavedanīyaṃ sarvaśarīriṇām |
GSP29nysvbh_u:3366: vijānātyayaṃ śarīrī rāgamutpannam-- 'asti me 'dhyātmaṃ rāgadharmaḥ' iti,
GSP29nysvbh_u:3367: virāgaṃ ca vijānāti-- 'nāsti me 'dhyātmaṃ rāgadharmaḥ' iti.
GSP29nysvbh_u:3377: ekapratyanīkāḥ pṛthivyāṃ śyāmādayo 'gnisaṃyogenaikena. ekayonayaśca pākajā iti // 5 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3380: mohaḥ pāpaḥ pāpataro vā dvāvabhipretyoktam, kasmāt ?.
GSP29nysvbh_u:3382: amūḍhasya rāgadveṣau notpadyete, mūḍhasya tu yathāsaṃkalpamutpattiḥ |
GSP29nysvbh_u:3383: viṣayeṣu rañjanīyāḥ saṃkalpā rāgahetavaḥ kopanīyāḥ saṃkalpā dveṣahetavaḥ ubhaye ca saṃkalpā na mithyāpratipattilakṣaṇatvād mohādanye, tāvimau mohayonī rāgadveṣāviti, tattvajñānācca mohanivṛttau rāgadveṣānutpattirityekapratyanīkabhāvopapattiḥ, evaṃ ca kṛtvā
GSP29nysvbh_u:3389: anyaddhi nimittam anyacca naimittakamiti doṣanimittatvādadoṣo moha iti //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3394: dravyāṇāṃ guṇānāṃ vānekavidhavikalpo nimittanaimittakabhāvo tulyajātīyānāṃ dṛṣṭa iti // 9
GSP29nysvbh_u:3396: na khalu nityaṃ kiñcit jāyate mriyate vā iti.
GSP29nysvbh_u:3406: punarutpattiḥ pretyabhāva iti. taccaitat nityatve saṃbhavatīti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:3407: yasya tu sattvotpādaḥ sattvanirodhaḥ pretyabhāvastasya kṛtahānamakṛtābhyāgamaśca doṣaḥ, ucchedahetuvāde ṛṣyupadeśāścānarthakā iti
GSP29nysvbh_u:3410: kena prakāreṇa kindharmakāt kāraṇād vyaktaṃ śarīramutpadyate iti ?,
GSP29nysvbh_u:3413: śarīrendriyaviṣayopakaraṇādhāraṃ prajñātaṃ dravyamutpadyate, vyaktaṃ ca khalvindriyagrāhyaṃ tatsāmānyāt kāraṇamapi vyaktam|
GSP29nysvbh_u:3415: rūpādiguṇayuktebhyaḥ pṛthivyādibhyo nityebhyo rūpādiguṇayuktaṃ śarīrādi utpadyate-- pratyakṣaprāmāṇyāt
GSP29nysvbh_u:3416: dṛṣṭo hi rūpādiguṇayuktebhyo mṛtprabhṛtibhyastathābhūtasya dravyasyotpādaḥ tena cādṛṣṭasyānumānamiti
GSP29nysvbh_u:3417: rūpādīnāmanvayadarśanāt prakṛtivikārayoḥ pṛthivyādīnāṃ nityānāmatīndriyāṇāṃ kāraṇabhāvo 'numīyate iti // 11 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3419: idamapi pratyakṣam-- na khalu vyaktād ghaṭād vyakto ghaṭa utpadyamāno dṛśyate iti. vyaktād vyaktasyānutpattidarśanānna vyaktaṃ kāraṇamiti // 12
GSP29nysvbh_u:3421: na brūmaḥ sarvaṃ sarvasya kāraṇamiti kiṃ tu yadutpadyate vyaktaṃ dravyaṃ tat tathābhūtādevotpadyate iti, vyaktaṃ ca tad mṛddravyaṃ kapālasaṃjñakaṃ yato ghaṭa utpadyate na caitad nihnuvānaḥ kvacidabhyanujñāṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:3426: asataḥ sadutpadyate ityayaṃ pakṣaḥ, kasmāt ?, upamṛdya prādurbhāvāt |
GSP29nysvbh_u:3427: upamṛdya bījamaṅkura utpadyate nānupamṛdya, na ced bījopamarde
GSP29nysvbh_u:3432: yadupamṛdnāti na tadupamṛdya prādurbhavitumarhati-- vidyamānatvāt. yacca prādurbhavati na tenāprādurbhūtena |
GSP29nysvbh_u:3435: atīti cānāgate cāvidyamāne kārakaśabdaḥ prayujyante-- putro janiṣyate janiṣyamāṇaṃ putramabhinandati, putrasya janiṣyamāṇasya nāma karoti, abhūt kumbho bhinnaṃ kumbhamanuśocati-- bhinnasya kumbhasya kapālāni, ajātāḥ putrāḥ pitaraṃ tāpayanti iti bahulaṃ bhāktāḥ prayogā dṛśyante|
GSP29nysvbh_u:3440: na vinaṣṭād bījādaṅkura utpadyate iti tasmānnābhāvād bhāvotpattiriti // 17
GSP29nysvbh_u:3442: uṣamardaprādurbhāvayoḥ paurvāparyaniyamaḥ kramaḥ sa khalvabhāvād bhāvotpatterheturnirdiśyate sa ca na pratiṣidhyate iti //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3444: bījāvayavāḥ kutaścinnimittāt prādurbhūtākriyāḥ pūrvavyūhaṃ jahati vyūhāntaraṃ cāpadyante vyūhāntarādaṅkura utpadyate-- dṛśyante khalu avayavāstatsaṃyogāścāṅkurotpattihetavaḥ, na cānivṛtte pūrvavyūhe
GSP29nysvbh_u:3445: bījāvayavānāṃ śakyaṃ vyūhāntareṇa bhavitumiti upamardaprādurbhāvayoḥ paurvāparyaniyamaḥ kramaḥ tasmānnābhāvād bhāvotpattiriti, na cānyad bījāvayavebhyo 'ṅkurotpattikāraṇamityupapadyate bījopādānaniyama iti // 18
GSP29nysvbh_u:3448: puruṣoyaṃ samīhamāno nāvaśyaṃ samīhāphalaṃ prāpnoti tenānumīyate--
GSP29nysvbh_u:3449: parādhīnāṃ puruṣasya karmaphalārādhanamiti. yadadhīnaṃ sa īśvaraḥ
GSP29nysvbh_u:3452: īśvarādhīnā cet phalaniṣpattiḥ syād api tarhi puruṣasya samīhāmantareṇa phalaṃ niṣpadyeteti NyS_4,1.21: tatkāritatvādahetuḥ //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3454: phalāya puruṣasya yatamānasyeśvaraḥ phalaṃ saṃpādayatīti. yadā na saṃpādayati tadā puruṣakarmāphalaṃ bhavatīti. tasmād īśvarakāritatvād ahetuḥ--
GSP29nysvbh_u:3456: guṇaviśiṣṭamātmāntaramīśvaraḥ tasyātmakalpāt kalpāntarānupapattiḥ, adharmamithyājñānapramādahānyā dharmajñānasamādhisaṃpadā ca viśiṣṭamātmāntaramīśvaraḥ tasya ca dharmasamādhiphalam aṇimādyaṣṭavidhamaiśvaryam,
GSP29nysvbh_u:3457: saṃkalpānuvidhāyī cāsya dharmaḥ pratyātmavṛttīn dharmādharmasaṃcayān pṛthivyādīni ca bhūtāni pravartayati, evaṃ ca svakṛtābhyāgamasyālopena
GSP29nysvbh_u:3459: āptakalpaścāyam uyathā pitāpatyānāṃ tathā pitṛbhūta īśvaro
GSP29nysvbh_u:3461: na tāvadasya buddhiṃ vinā kaścid dharmo liṅgabhūtaḥ śakya upapādayitum. āgamācca draṣṭā boddhā
GSP29nysvbh_u:3464: svakṛtābhyāgamalopena ca pravartamānasyāsya yaduktaṃ pratiṣedhajātam akarmanimitte śarīrasarge tatsarvaṃ prasajyate iti // 21 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3468: kaṇṭakataikṣṇyādidarśanāt = kaṇṭakasya taikṣṇyaṃ parvatadhātūnāṃ citratā grāvṇāṃ ślakṣṇatā. ninirmittaṃ copādānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:3472: ityucyate. yataścotpadyate tannimittam, animittasya nimittatvād nānimittā
GSP29nysvbh_u:3479: ityetasmānna bhidyate abhedāt tatpratiṣedhenaiva pratiṣiddho veditavya iti // 24 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3484: kiṃ punaḥ ?, sarvaṃ bhautikaṃ ca śarīrādi abhautikaṃ ca buddhyādi tadubhayamutpattivināśadharmakaṃ vijñāyate tasmāttatsarvamanityamiti // 25
GSP29nysvbh_u:3486: yadi tāvat sarvasyānityatā nityā ? tannityatvād na sarvamanityam|
