GSP29nysvbh_u:3490: katham ?, yathāgnirdāhyaṃ vināśyānuvinaśyati evaṃ sarvasyānityatā sarvaṃ vināśyānuvinaśyatīti NyS_4,1.28: nityasyāpratyākhyānaṃ yathopalabdhi vyavasthānāt //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3491: ayaṃ khalu vādo nityaṃ pratyācaṣṭe nityasya ca pratyākhyānamanupapannam |
GSP29nysvbh_u:3495: viparītam, na ca paramasūkṣmāṇāṃ bhūtānām ākāśakāladigātmamanasāṃ tadguṇānāṃ ca keṣāñcit sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyānāṃ cotpattivināśadharmakatvaṃ pramāṇata upalabhyate tasmād nityānyetānīti ayamanya ekāntaḥ---
GSP29nysvbh_u:3497: bhūtamātram idaṃ sarvaṃ. tāni ca nityāni--
GSP29nysvbh_u:3500: utpattikāraṇaṃ copalabhyate vināśakāraṇaṃ ca tat sarvanityatve vyāhanyate iti // 30 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3502: yasyotpattivināśakāraṇamupalabhyate iti manyase na tad bhūtalakṣaṇahīnamarthāntaraṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:3503: gṛhyate. bhūtalakṣaṇāvarodhād bhūtamātramidam ity ayukto 'yaṃ pratiṣedha iti // 31 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3505: kāraṇasamānaguṇasyotpattiḥ kāraṇaṃ copalabhyate na caitadubhayaṃ nityaviṣayam, na cotpattitatkāraṇopalabdhiḥ śakyā pratyākhyātum-- na cāviṣayā kācidupalabdhiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh_u:3506: upalabdhisāmarthyāt kāraṇena samānaguṇaṃ kāryamutpadyate ityanumīyate sa khalūpalabdherviṣaya
GSP29nysvbh_u:3515: iti, evaṃ ca etad bhūtopalabdhau tulyam upṛthivyādyupalabdhirapi svapnaviṣayābhimānavat prasajyate //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3518: avasthitasyopādānasya dharmamātraṃ nivartate dharmamātramupajāyate sa khalūtpattivināśayorviṣayaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh_u:3519: yaccopajāyate tat prāgapyupajananādasti yacca nivartate tad nivṛttamapyastīti evaṃ ca sarvasya
GSP29nysvbh_u:3522: upajātanivṛttayorvidyamānatvāt, ayaṃ dharma upajāto 'yaṃ nivṛtta iti sadbhāvāviśeṣādavyavasthā,
GSP29nysvbh_u:3524: nopapadyate-- sarvadā vidyamānatvāt, asya dharmasyopajananivṛttī nāsyeti vyavasthānupapattiḥ--
GSP29nysvbh_u:3527: avidyamānasyātmalābha upajano vidyamānasyātmahānaṃ nivṛttiḥ ityetasmin sati naite doṣāḥ, tasmād yaduktam-- 'prāgapyupajananādasti
GSP29nysvbh_u:3532: na kaścideko bhāvo vidyate, kasmāt ?, bhāvalakṣaṇapṛthaktvāt ubhāvasya lakṣaṇam |
GSP29nysvbh_u:3534: yena lakṣyate bhāvaḥ sa samākhyāśabdaḥ tasya pṛthagviṣayatvāt |
GSP29nysvbh_u:3535: sarvobhāvasamākhyāśabdaḥ samūhavācī, 'kumbhaḥ' iti saṃjñāśabdo gandharasarūpasparśasamūhe badhnapārśvagrīvādisamūhe ca vartate, nidarśanamātraṃ cedamiti // 34 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3537: 'anekavidhalakṣaṇaiḥ' iti madhyamapadalopī samāsaḥ, gandhādibhiśca guṇairbudhnādibhiścāvayavaiḥ saṃbaddha eko bhāvo niṣpadyate|
GSP29nysvbh_u:3543: yadiha lakṣaṇaṃ bhāvasya saṃjñāśabdabhūtaṃ tadekasmin vyavasthitam-- 'yaṃ kumbhamadrākṣaṃ taṃ spṛśāmi'
GSP29nysvbh_u:3544: 'yamevāsprākṣaṃ taṃ paśyāmīti. nāṇusamūho gṛhyate iti. aṇusamūhe cāgṛhyamāṇe yad
GSP29nysvbh_u:3549: nāstyeko bhāvo yasmāt samūhe bhāvaśabdaprayogaḥ, ekasya cānupapatteḥ samūho nopapadyate-- ekasamuccayo hi samūha iti, vyāhatatvādanupapannam-- 'nāstyeko bhāvaḥ' iti |
GSP29nysvbh_u:3552: sa evābhyunujñāyate-- ekasamuccayo hi samūha iti |
GSP29nysvbh_u:3553: samūhe bhāvaśabdaprayogāditi ca samūhamāśritya pratyekaṃ samūhipratiṣedhaḥ--
GSP29nysvbh_u:3554: nāstyeko bhāva iti, soyamubhayato vyāghātād yatkiñcana vāda iti // 36 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3564: anekasyāśeṣatā sarvaśabdasyārthaḥ bhāvapratiṣedhaścābhāvaśabdasyārthaḥ. pūrvaṃ sopākhyam uttaraṃ nirupākhyam. tatra samupākhyāyamānaṃ kathaṃ nirupākhyam abhāvaḥ syāditi = na jātvabhāvo nirupākhyo 'nekatayā |
GSP29nysvbh_u:3567: yadidaṃ sarvamiti manyase tadbhāva ityevaṃ cet ? anivṛtto vyāghātaḥ-- anekamaśeṣaṃ ceti nābhāvapratyayena śakyaṃ bhavitum. asti cāyaṃ pratyayaḥ-- sarvamiti. tasmānnābhāva iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:3574: iti nopapadyate. atha bhāveṣvitaretarābhāvasiddhi ? sarvamabhāva iti nopapadyate // 37
GSP29nysvbh_u:3577: na sarvamabhāvaḥ, kasmāt ? svena bhāvena sadbhāvād bhāvānām |
GSP29nysvbh_u:3579: kaśca svo dharmo bhāvānām ?, dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ sadādi sāmānyam. dravyāṇāṃ kriyāvadityevamādirviśeṣaḥ.
GSP29nysvbh_u:3580: sparśaparyantāḥ pṛthivyā iti ca, pratyekaṃ cānanto bhedaḥ, sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyānāṃ ca viśiṣṭā dharmā gṛhyante, soyamabhāvasya nirupākhyatvāt saṃpratyāyako 'rthabhedo na
GSP29nysvbh_u:3581: syāt. asti tvayaṃ tasmānna sarvamabhāva iti |
GSP29nysvbh_u:3584: iti svarūpasiddheriti. gauritiprayujyamāne śabde jātiviśiṣṭaṃ dravyaṃ gṛhyate nābhāvamātram.
GSP29nysvbh_u:3586: gośabdena cābhāva ucyeta, yasmāttu gośabdaprayoge dravyaviśeṣaḥ pratīyate nābhāvastasmādayuktamiti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:3589: iti 'asan gauraśvātmanā' iti gavātmanā kasmānnocyate ? avacanād 'gavātmanā gaurasti'
GSP29nysvbh_u:3591: iti vā kasmānnocyate ? avacanāt svena rūpeṇa vidyamānatā dravyasyetivijñāyate|
GSP29nysvbh_u:3594: tatpratiṣedhe cāsatpratyayasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ yathā-- 'na santi kuṇḍe badarāṇīti, 'asan
GSP29nysvbh_u:3597: gavāśvayorekatvaṃ nāstīti. tasmin pratiṣidhyamāne bhāvena gavā sāmādhikaraṇyamasatpratyayasya--
GSP29nysvbh_u:3598: 'asan gauraśvātmanā' iti. yathā 'na santi kuṇḍe badarāṇīti kuṇḍe badarasaṃyoge pratiṣidhyamāne sadbhirasatpratyayasya sāmādhikaraṇyamiti
GSP29nysvbh_u:3611: svabhāvasiddhāv asatyāṃ samayoḥ parimaṇḍalayorvā dravyayorāpekṣike dīrghatvahrasvatve kasmānna bhavataḥ ?|
GSP29nysvbh_u:3613: yāvatī dravye apekṣamāṇe tāvatī evānapekṣamāṇe nānyataratra bhedaḥ |
GSP29nysvbh_u:3614: āpekṣikatve tu saty anyataratra viśeṣopajanaḥ syāditi|
GSP29nysvbh_u:3616: dve dravye paśyan ekatra vidyamānamatiśayaṃ gṛhṇāti tad dīrghamiti vyavasyati, yacca hīnaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:3620: nityānityabhedāt, sarvaṃ tredhā-- jñātā jñānaṃ jñeyamiti, sarvaṃ caturdhā-- pramātā pramāṇaṃ prameyaṃ pramitiriti, evaṃ yathāsaṃbhavamanye 'pīti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:3623: yadi sādhyasādhānayornānātvam ? ekānto na sidhyati-- vyatirekāt, atha sādhyasādhanayorabhedaḥ ? evamapyekānto na sidhyati-- sādhanābhāvāt,
GSP29nysvbh_u:3627: kāraṇasyāvayavabhāvāt = avayasavaḥ kaścit sādhanabhūta ity avyatirekaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh_u:3631: ityahetuḥ, kasmāt ? 'sarvamekam' ityanapavargeṇa pratijñāya kasyacidekatvamucyate tatra vyapavṛkto
GSP29nysvbh_u:3633: te khalvime saṃkhyaikāntā yadi viśeṣakāritasyārthabhedavistarasya pratyākhyānena vartante ? pratyākṣānumānāgamavirodhād mithyāvādā bhavanti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:3639: NyS_4,1.44: sadyaḥ kālāntare ca phalaniṣpatteḥ saṃśayaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3641: odanapayasī, 'karṣati vapatīti kālāntare phalaṃ śasyādhigama iti, asti ceyaṃ kriyā--
GSP29nysvbh_u:3645: svargaḥ phalaṃ śrūyate tacca bhinne 'smin dehabhedādutpadyate iti na
GSP29nysvbh_u:3649: dhvastāyāṃ pravṛttau pravṛtteḥ phalaṃ na kāraṇamantareṇotpattamarhati--
GSP29nysvbh_u:3650: na khalu vai vinaṣṭāt kāraṇāt kiñcidutpadyate iti // 46 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3652: yathā phalārthinā vṛkṣamūle sekādi parikarma kriyate taṃmiṃśca pradhvaste pṛthivīdhāturabdhātunā saṃgṛhīte āntareṇa tejasā pacyamāno rasadravyaṃ nirvartayati sa dravyabhūto raso vṛkṣānugataḥ pākaviśiṣṭo vyūhaviśeṣeṇa saṃniviśamānaḥ parṇādi phalaṃ nirvartayati evaṃ pariṣekādi karmacārthavat--
GSP29nysvbh_u:3654: tathā pravṛttyā saṃskāro dharmādharmalakṣaṇo janyate sa jāto nimittāntarānugṛhītaḥ kālāntare
GSP29nysvbh_u:3659: NyS_4,1.48: nāsan na san na sadasat sadasatorvaidharmyāt //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3662: kasyacidutpattaye kiñcidupādeyaṃ na sarvaṃ sarvasyety asadbhāve niyamo nopapadyate iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:3666: NyS_4,1.49: prāgutpatterutpattidharmakam asad ity addhā, kasmād utpādavyayadarśanāt //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3671: idamasyotpattaye samarthaṃ na sarvamiti prāgutpatterniyatakāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ buddhyā siddham--
GSP29nysvbh_u:3676: vṛkṣāśrayam. karma ceha śarīre phalaṃ cāmutreti āśrayavyatirekādaheturiti // 51 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3678: prītirātmapratyakṣatvādātmāśrayā tadāśrayameva karma dharmasaṃjñitam-- dharmasyātmaguṇatvāt tasmādāśrayavyatirekānupapattiriti // 52 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3682: iti. tatra yaduktam-- 'prītiḥ phalam' iti etadayuktam // 53 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3684: putrādisaṃbandhāt phalaṃ prītilakṣaṇamutpadyate iti putrādiṣu phalavadupacāro yathānne prāṇaśabdaḥ--
GSP29nysvbh_u:3690: sarvajantupratyakṣasya sukhasya pratyākhyānam ? āhosvidanyaḥ kalpaḥ ? iti,
GSP29nysvbh_u:3691: anya ityāha, katham ?, na vai sarvalokasākṣikaṃ sukhaṃ śakyaṃ pratyākhyātum |
GSP29nysvbh_u:3692: ayaṃ tu janmamaraṇaprabandhānubhavanimittād duḥkhād nirviṇṇasya duḥkhaṃ jihāsato duḥkhasaṃjñābhāvanopadeśo duḥkhahānārtha iti |
GSP29nysvbh_u:3693: kayā yuktyā ?, sarve khalu sattvanikāyāḥ sarvāṇyutpattisthānāni sarvaḥ punarbhavo bādhanānuṣakto
GSP29nysvbh_u:3699: jāyate iti śarīrendriyabuddhayaḥ, śarīrādīnāṃ saṃsthānaviśiṣṭānāṃ prādurbhāva utpattiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh_u:3700: vividhā ca bādhanā-- hīnā madhyamā utkṛṣṭā
GSP29nysvbh_u:3701: ceti. utkṛṣṭā nārakiṇāṃ. tiraścāṃ tu madhyamā,
GSP29nysvbh_u:3704: paśyataḥ sukhe tatsādhaneṣu ca śarīrendriyabuddhiṣu duḥkhasaṃjñā vyavatiṣṭhate. duḥkhasaṃjñāvyavasthānāt sarvalokeṣv anabhiratisaṃjñā bhavati. anabhiratisaṃjñāmupāsīnasya sarvalokaviṣayātṛṣṇā vicchidyate. tṛṣṇāprahāṇāt sarvaduḥkhād vimucyate iti, yathā viṣayogāt payo viṣayamiti budhyamāno nopādatte. anupādadāno maraṇaduḥkhaṃ nāpnoti
GSP29nysvbh_u:3709: niṣpadyate khalu bādhanāntarāleṣu sukhaṃ pratyātmavedanīyaṃ śarīriṇāṃ tadaśakyaṃ pratyākhyātumiti athāpi---
GSP29nysvbh_u:3715: saṃpadyate. saṃpadya vā vipadyate. nyūnaṃ vā saṃpadyate.
GSP29nysvbh_u:3716: bahupratyanīkaṃ vā saṃpadyate. ityetasmāt paryeṣaṇadoṣāt nānāvidho mānasaḥ saṃtāpo bhavati. evaṃ vedayataḥ paryeṣaṇadoṣād bādhanāyā
GSP29nysvbh_u:3718: anena kāraṇena duḥkhaṃ janma na tu sukhasyābhāvāditi/
GSP29nysvbh_u:3722: "api cedudanemi samantād bhūmimālabhate sagavāśvāṃ na sa tena dhanena dhanaiṣī tṛpyati kiṃ nu sukhaṃ dhanakāme"
GSP29nysvbh_u:3726: kriyate, ayaṃ khalu sukhasaṃvedane vyavasthitaḥ sukhaṃ paramapuruṣārthaṃ manyate-- na sukhādanyad niḥśreyasamasti. sukhe prāpte caritārthaḥ kṛtakaraṇīyo
GSP29nysvbh_u:3728: ca viṣayeṣu saṃrajyate. saṃraktaḥ sukhāya ghaṭate. ghaṭamānasyāsya janmajarāvyādhiprāyaṇāniṣṭasaṃyogeṣṭaviyogaprārthitānupapattinimittamanekavidhaṃ yāvad duḥkhamutpadyate taṃ duḥkhavikalpaṃ sukhamityabhimanyate.
GSP29nysvbh_u:3731: iti saṃsāraṃ nātivartate. tadasyāḥ sukhasaṃjñānayāḥ pratipakṣo duḥkhasaṃjñābhāvanamupadiśyate. duḥkhānuṣaṅgād duḥkhaṃ janmeti na sukhasyābhāvāt|
GSP29nysvbh_u:3732: yadyevaṃ kasmāt 'duḥkhaṃ janma' iti nocyate ?. soyamevaṃ vācye yadevakāha--
GSP29nysvbh_u:3734: iti tena sukhābhāvaṃ jñāpayatīti, janmavinigrahārthīyo vai khalvayamevaśabdaḥ, katham ? na duḥkhaṃ janma
GSP29nysvbh_u:3735: svarūpataḥ kiṃ tu duḥkhopacārāt. evaṃ sukhamapīti etad anenaiva nivartyate na tu duḥkhameva
GSP29nysvbh_u:3739: jāyate-- brahmacaryeṇa ṛṣibhyo yajñena devebhyaḥ prajāyā pitṛbhyaḥ"
GSP29nysvbh_u:3742: "jarāmarya vā etatsatraṃ yadagnihotraṃ darśapūrṇamāsau ceti ujarayā ha eṣa tasmāt satrādvimucyate mṛtyunā ha vā"
GSP29nysvbh_u:3745: kleśānubaddha evāyaṃ mriyate kleśānubaddhaśca jāyate nāsya kleśānubandhavicchedo gṛhyate/
GSP29nysvbh_u:3747: janmaprabhṛty ayaṃ yāvatprāyaṇaṃ vāgbuddhiśarīrārambheṇāvimukto gṛhyate tatra yaduktam--
GSP29nysvbh_u:3754: "ṛṇaiḥ" iti nāyaṃ pradhānaśabdaḥ, yatra khalvekaḥ pratyādeyaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:3755: dadāti dvitīyaśca pratideyaṃ gṛhṇāti tatrāsya dṛṣṭatvāt pradhānamṛṇaśabdaḥ. na caitadihopapadyate pradhānaśabdānupapatterguṇaśabdenāyamanuvādaḥ--
GSP29nysvbh_u:3757: "agnirmāṇavakaḥ" iti = anyatra dṛṣṭaścāyamṛṇaśabda iha prayujyate yathāgniśabdo māṇavake |
GSP29nysvbh_u:3758: kathaṃ guṇaśabdenānuvādaḥ ?, nindāprasaṃsopapatteḥ = karmalope ṛṇīva ṛṇādānād nindyate.
GSP29nysvbh_u:3759: karmānuṣṭhāne ca ṛṇīva ṛṇadānād praśasyate sa evopamārtha iti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:3761: iti guṇaśabdaḥ-- viparyaye 'nadhikārāt = "jāyamāno ha vai brāhmaṇaḥ"
GSP29nysvbh_u:3762: iti ca śabdo gṛhasthaḥ saṃpadyamānaḥ, jāyamāna iti uyadāyaṃ gṛhastho jāyate tadā karmabhiradhikriyate--
GSP29nysvbh_u:3763: mātṛto jāyamānasyānadhikārāt uyadā tu mātṛto jāyate kumāro na tadā karmabhiradhikriyate-- arthinaḥ śaktasya cādhikārāt = arthinaḥ
GSP29nysvbh_u:3767: uśaktasya karmabhiradhikāraḥ-- pravṛttisaṃbhavāt uśaktaḥ khalu vihite karmaṇi pravartate netara
GSP29nysvbh_u:3770: mātṛto jāyamāne kumāre ubhayam = arthitā śaktiśca na bhavatīti, na bhidyate laukikād vākyād vaidikaṃ vākyam-- prekṣāpūrvakāripuruṣapraṇītatvena,
GSP29nysvbh_u:3771: tatra laukikastāvadaparīkṣakopi na jātamātraṃ kumāramevaṃ brūyāt-- 'adhīṣva yajasva brahmacaryaṃ cara' iti. kuta eṣa ṛṣirupapannānavadyavādī
GSP29nysvbh_u:3772: upadeśārthena prayukta upadiśati ?, na khalu vai
GSP29nysvbh_u:3775: yaścopadiṣṭamarthaṃ vijānāti taṃ pratyupadeśaḥ kriyate na caitadasti jāyamānakumārake iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:3777: yacca mantrabrāhmaṇaṃ karmābhivadati tat patnīsaṃbandhādinā gārhasthyaliṅgenopapannaṃ tasmād gṛhasthoyaṃ jāyamāno 'bhidhīyate iti //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3780: na nivartate tāvadanena karmānuṣṭheyamityupapadyate jarāmaryavādastaṃ pratīti.
GSP29nysvbh_u:3786: caturthaṃpravrajyāyuktaṃ jaretyucyate-- tatra hi pravrajyā vidhīyate, atyantajarāsaṃyoge
GSP29nysvbh_u:3791: "antevāsī vā juhuyāt brahmaṇā sa parikrītaḥ. kṣīrahotā vā juhuyād dhanena sa parikrītaḥ"
GSP29nysvbh_u:3792: iti athāpi vihitaṃ vānūdyeta ? kāmādvārthaḥ parikalpyeta ? vihitānuvacanaṃ nyāyyamiti,
GSP29nysvbh_u:3793: ṛṇavānivāsvatantro gṛhyasthaḥ karmasu pravartate ityupapannaṃ vākyasya sāmarthyam|
GSP29nysvbh_u:3794: phalasya hi sādhanāni prayatnaviṣayo na phalaṃ. tāni saṃpannāni phalāya
GSP29nysvbh_u:3796: vihitaṃ ca jāyamānaṃ vidhīyate ca jāyamānaṃ tena yaḥ saṃbadhyate soyaṃ jāyamāna iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:3799: pratyakṣato vidhīyate gārhasthyaṃ brāhmaṇena yadi cāṃśramāntaramabhaviṣyat tadapi vyadhāsyat
GSP29nysvbh_u:3801: na-- pratiṣedhasyāpi pratyakṣavidhānābhāvāt = na pratiṣedhopi vai
GSP29nysvbh_u:3802: brāhmaṇena pratyakṣato vidhīyate-- 'na santyāśramāntarāṇi eka eva
GSP29nysvbh_u:3805: yathā śāstrāntarāṇi sve sve 'dhikāre pratyakṣato vidhāyakāni nārthāntarābhāvād evamidaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ gṛhasthaśāstraṃ sve 'dhikāre pratyakṣato vidhāyakaṃ nāśramāntarāṇāmabhāvāditi|
GSP29nysvbh_u:3809: "karmabhirmṛtyumṛṣayo niṣeduḥ prajāvanto draviṇamicchamānāḥ, athāpare ṛṣayo manīṣiṇaḥ paraṃ karmabhyo 'mṛtatvamānaśuḥ,"
GSP29nysvbh_u:3810: "na karmaṇā na prajayā dhanena tyāgenaike amṛtatvamānaśuḥ"
GSP29nysvbh_u:3811: "pareṇa nākaṃ nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ vibhrājate tad yatayo viśanti"
GSP29nysvbh_u:3815: "trayo dharmaskandhāḥ-- yajño 'dhyayanaṃ dānamiti prathamastapa eva dvitīyo brahmacāryācāryakulavāsīti
GSP29nysvbh_u:3820: iti sa yathākāmo bhavati tathākraturbhavati yathākraturbhavati tatkarma kurute yatkarma kurute tadabhisaṃpadyate"
GSP29nysvbh_u:3823: niṣkām ātmakāma āptakāmo bhavati na tasya prāṇā utkrāmanti ihaiva samavalīyante brahmaiva san brahmāpyeti"
GSP29nysvbh_u:3829: "jarāmaryaṃ vā etatsatraṃ yadagrihotraṃ darśapūrṇamāsau ca" iti
GSP29nysvbh_u:3832: "prājāpattyāmiṣṭiṃ nirupya nasyāṃ sarvavedasaṃ hutvā ātmanyagnīn samāropya
GSP29nysvbh_u:3834: iti śrūyate tena vijānīmaḥ-- prajāvittalokaiṣaṇābhyo vyutthitasya nivṛtte phalārthitve samāropaṇaṃ vidhīyate iti, evaṃ ca brāhmaṇāni--
GSP29nysvbh_u:3836: pravrajiṣyan vā are ahamasmāt sthānādasmi hanta te 'nayā kātyāyanyā sahāntaṃ karavāṇīti.
GSP29nysvbh_u:3837: athāpyuktānuśāsanāsi maitreyi etāvadare khalvamṛtatvamiti hoktvā yājñavalkyaḥ pravavrāja"
GSP29nysvbh_u:3840: jarāmarye ca karmaṇy aviśeṣeṇa kalpyamāne sarvasya pātracayāntāni karmāṇīti prasajyate tatraiṣaṇāvyutthānaṃ na śrūyeta--
GSP29nysvbh_u:3841: "etaddha sma vai tatpūrve brāhmaṇā anūcānā vidvāṃsaḥ
GSP29nysvbh_u:3842: prajāṃ na kāmayante kiṃ prajayā kariṣyāmo yeṣāṃ noyamātmāyaṃ loka iti. te ha sma putraiṣaṇāyāśca vittaiṣaṇāyāśca lokaiṣaṇāyāśca vyutthāyātha bhikṣācaryaṃ caranti"
GSP29nysvbh_u:3844: karmāṇi nopapadyante iti nāviśeṣeṇa kartuḥ prayojakaṃ phalaṃ bhavatīti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:3849: "te vā khalvete atharvāṅgirasa etaditihāsapurāṇamabhyavadan itihāsapurāṇaṃ pañcamaṃ vedānāṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:3851: aprāmāṇye ca dharmaśāstrasya prāṇabhṛtāṃ vyavahāralopāt lokocchedaprasaṅgaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh_u:3855: viṣayavyavasthānācca yathāviṣayaṃ prāmāṇyam = anyo mantrabrāhmaṇasya viṣayo 'nyaścetihāsapurāṇadharmaśāstraṇāmiti
GSP29nysvbh_u:3857: lokavyavahāravyavasthānaṃ dharmaśāstrasya viṣayaḥ, tatraikena na sarvaṃ vyavasthāpyate iti yathāviṣayametāni pramāṇānīndriyādivaditi
GSP29nysvbh_u:3860: yathā suṣuptasya khalu svapnādarśane rāgānubandhaḥ sukhaduḥkhānubandhaśca vicchidyate
GSP29nysvbh_u:3865: prakṣīṇeṣu rāgadveṣāmoheṣu pravṛttirna pratisaṃdhānāya, pratisaṃdhistu pūrvajanmanivṛttau punarjanma taccādṛṣṭakāritaṃ tasyāṃ prahīṇāyāṃ janmāntarābhāvaḥ |
GSP29nysvbh_u:3870: pūrvajanmanivṛttau punarjanma na bhavatītyucyate na tu karmavipākapratisaṃvedanaṃ pratyākhyāyate,
GSP29nysvbh_u:3871: sarvāṇi pūrvakarmāṇi hyante janmani vipacyante iti // 64 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3874: kasmāt ?, kleśasaṃtateḥ svābhāvikatvāt = anādiriyaṃ kleśasaṃtatiḥ na
GSP29nysvbh_u:3878: yathānādiḥ prāgutpatterabhāva utpannena bhāvena nivartyate evaṃ svābhāvikī kleśasaṃtatiranityeti
GSP29nysvbh_u:3880: apara āha-- yathānādiraṇuśyāmatā atha cāgnisaṃyogādanityā tathā kleśasaṃtatirapīti
GSP29nysvbh_u:3881: sataḥ khalu dharmo nityatvamanityatvaṃ ca tattvaṃ bhāve 'bhāve bhāktamiti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:3888: iti samuccayaḥ, mithyāsaṃkalpebhyo rañjanīyakopanīyamohanīyebhyo rāgadveṣamohā utpadyante, karma ca kattvanikāyanirvartakaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:3891: dṛśyate hi kaścitsattvanikāyo rāgabahulaḥ kaścid dveṣabahulaḥ kaścid mohabahulaḥ iti, itaretaranimittā ca rāgādīnāmutpattiḥ umūḍho rajyati mūḍhaḥ kupyati. rakto muhyati.
GSP29nysvbh_u:3893: sarvamithyāsaṃkalpānāṃ tattvajñānādanutpattiḥ kāraṇānutpattau ca kāryānutpatteriti rāgādīnāmatyantamanutpattiriti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:3894: 'anādiśca kleśasaṃtatiḥ' ity ayuktam-- sarve ime khalvādhyātmikā
GSP29nysvbh_u:3898: na caivaṃ saty anutpattidharmakaṃ kiñcid vyayadharmakaṃ pratijñāyate iti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:3899: karma ca sattvanikāyanirvartakaṃ tattvajñānakṛtād mithyāsaṃkalpavighātānna rāgādyutpattinimittaṃ bhavati sukhaduḥkhasaṃvittiphalaṃ tu bhavatīti
GSP29nysvbh_u:3900: // iti vātsyāyanaviracite nyāyabhāṣye caturthādhyāyasya prathamamāhnikaṃ samāptam /
GSP29nysvbh_u:3901: atha nyāyabhāṣyacaturthādhyāyasya dvitīyamāhnikam kiṃ nu khalu bho yāvanto viṣayāstāvatsu pratyekaṃ tattvajñānamutpadyate ?
GSP29nysvbh_u:3904: yāvadviṣayamutpadyate-- jñeyānāmānantyāt, nāpi kvacidutpadyate-- tatra notpadyate tatrānivṛtto moha iti mohaśeṣaprasaṅgaḥ-- na cānyaviṣayeṇa tattvajñānenānyaviṣayo mohaḥ śakyaḥ pratiṣeddhumiti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:3905: mithyājñānaṃ vai khalu moho na tattvajñānasyānutpattimātraṃ tacca mithyājñānaṃ yatra viṣaye pravartamānaṃ saṃsārabījaṃ bhavati sa viṣayastattvato jñeya iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:3907: ahamasmīti moho 'haṅkāra iti. anātmānaṃ khalvahamasmīti paśyato
GSP29nysvbh_u:3911: kathaṃ tadviṣayo 'haṅkāraḥ saṃsārabījaṃ bhavati ?, ayaṃ khalu śarīrādyarthajātam ahamasmīti vyavasitaḥ taducchedenātmocchedaṃ manyamāno 'nucchedatṛṣṇāpariplutaḥ punaḥ punastadupādatte tadupādadāno janmamaraṇāya yatate tenāviyogād nātyantaṃ duḥkhādvimucyate iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:3912: yastu duḥkhaṃ duḥkhāyatanaṃ duḥkhānuṣaktaṃ sukhaṃ ca sarvamidaṃ duḥkhamiti paśyati sa duḥkhaṃ parijānāti parijñātaṃ ca duḥkhaṃ prahīṇaṃ bhavati--
GSP29nysvbh_u:3913: anupādānāt saviṣānnavat, evaṃ doṣān karma ca duḥkhaheturiti paśyati|
GSP29nysvbh_u:3914: na cāprahīṇeṣu doṣeṣu duḥkhaprabandhocchedena śakyaṃ bhavitumiti doṣān
GSP29nysvbh_u:3915: jahāti. prahīṇeṣu ca doṣeṣu na pravṛttiḥ pratisaṃdhānāyetyuktam,
GSP29nysvbh_u:3916: pretyabhāvaphaladuḥkhāni ca jñeyāni vyavasthāpayati karma ca doṣāṃśca
GSP29nysvbh_u:3917: praheyān, apavargo 'dhigantavyastasyādhigamopāyastattvajñānam. evaṃ catasṛbhirvidhābhiḥ prameyaṃ vibhaktamāsevamānasya |
GSP29nysvbh_u:3924: śarīrādi duḥkhāntaṃ prameyaṃ doṣanimittam, tadviṣayatvānmithyājñānasya tadidaṃ tattvajñānaṃ tadviṣayamutpannam ahaṅkāraṃ nivartayati--
GSP29nysvbh_u:3927: iti, sa cāyaṃ śāstrārthasaṃgraho 'nūdyate nāpūrvo vidhīyate iti // 1 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3930: kāmaviṣayā indriyārthā iti rūpādaya ucyante. te mityā saṃkalpyamānā
GSP29nysvbh_u:3931: rāgadveṣamohān pravartayanti tān pūrvaṃ prasaṃcakṣīta, tāṃśca prasaṃcakṣāṇasya rūpādiviṣayo mithyāsaṃkalpo nivartate, tannivṛttau adhyātmaṃ śarīrādi prasaṃcakṣīta, tatprasaṃkhyānādadhyātmaviṣayo 'haṅkāro
GSP29nysvbh_u:3932: nivartate. soyamadhyātmaṃ bahiśca viviktacitto viharan mukta ityucyate //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3933: ataḥ paraṃ kācit saṃjñā heyā kācid bhāvayitavyetyupadiśyate,
GSP29nysvbh_u:3937: doṣāṇāṃ nimittaṃ tv avayavyabhimānaḥ, sā ca khalu strīsaṃjñā sapariṣkārā puruṣasya puruṣasaṃjñā ca striyāḥ, pariṣkāraśca |
GSP29nysvbh_u:3940: itthaṃ dantau itthamoṣṭhāviti, seyaṃ saṃjñā kāmaṃ vardhayati tadanuṣaktāṃśca doṣān vivarjanīyān|
GSP29nysvbh_u:3943: tāmaśubhasaṃjñetyācakṣate. tāmasya bhāvayataḥ kāmarāgaḥ prahīyate. satyeva ca dvividhe viṣaye kācit saṃjñā bhāvanīyā kācit parivarjanīyetyupadiśyate
GSP29nysvbh_u:3947: sadasatorupalambhād vidyā dvividhā. sadasatoranupalambhād avidyapi dvividhā, upalabhyamāne 'vayavini vidyādvaividhyāt saṃśayaḥ.
GSP29nysvbh_u:3948: anupalabhyamāne cāvidyādvaividhyāt saṃśayaḥ, so 'yam avayavī yadyupalabhyate athāpi nopalabhyate na kathañcana saṃśayād mucyate iti //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3950: tasminn anupapannaḥ saṃśayaḥ, kasmāt ?, pūrvoktahetūnāmapratiṣedhādasti dravyāntarārambha iti // 5 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3955: ekaiko 'vayavo na tāvat kṛtsne 'vayavinirvatate-- tayoḥ parimāṇabhedād avayavāntarasaṃbandhābhāvaprasaṅgācca, nāpyavayavyekadeśe-- na hyasyānye avayavā ekadeśabhūtāḥ santīti // 7 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3958: na tāvat pratyavayavaṃ vartate-- tayoḥ parimāṇabhedād dravyasya.
GSP29nysvbh_u:3959: caikadravyatvaprasaṅgāt, nāpyekadeśe-- sarveṣvanyāvayavābhāvāt, tadevaṃ na yuktaḥ saṃśayaḥ-- nāstyavayavīti // 8 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3965: kiṃ pratyavayavaṃ kṛtsno 'vayavī vartate athaikadeśeneti nopapadyate
GSP29nysvbh_u:3967: 'kṛtsnam' ityanekasyāśeṣābhidhānam. 'ekadeśaḥ' iti nānātve kasyacidabhidhānam, tāvimau kṛsnaikadeśaśabdau bhedaviṣayau naikasminn
GSP29nysvbh_u:3971: avayavāntarābhāvāditi, yadyapyekadeśo 'vayavāntarabhūtaḥ syāt tathāpyavayave 'vayavāntaraṃ varteta nāvayavīti-- anyo 'vayavīti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:3975: āśrayāśritabhāvaḥ kathamiticet ? yasya yato 'nyatrātmalābhānupapattiḥ sa āśrayaḥ na kāraṇadravyebhyo 'nyatra kāryadravyamātmānaṃ labhate.
GSP29nysvbh_u:3978: nityeṣu dravyeṣu kathamāśrayāśrayibhāva iticet ? anityeṣu dravyaguṇeṣu darśanādāśrayāśrayibhāvasya nityeṣu siddhiriti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:3979: tasmādavayavyabhimānaḥ pratiṣidhyate niḥśreyasakāmasya. nāvayavī. yathā rūpādiṣu mityāsaṃkalpo na rūpādaya iti // 12 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3983: yathaikaikaḥ keśastaimirikeṇa nopalabhyate keśasamūhastūpalabhyate tathaikaiko 'ṇurnopalabhyate aṇusaṃcayastūpalabhyate tadidamaṇusamūhaviṣayaṃ grahaṇamiti // 13 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3987: cakṣuḥ khalu prakṛṣyamāṇaṃ nāviṣayaṃ gandhaṃ gṛhṇāti. nikṛṣyamāṇaṃ ca na
GSP29nysvbh_u:3988: svaviṣayāt pracyavate, soyaṃ taimirikaḥ kaściccakṣurviṣayaṃ keśaṃ na gṛhṇāti gṛhṇāti ca keśasamūham. ubhayaṃ hy ataimirikeṇa cakṣuṣā gṛhyate,
GSP29nysvbh_u:3990: indriyāviṣayabhūtā kenacidindriyeṇa gṛhyante samuditāstu gṛhyante ityaviṣaye pravṛttirindriyasya prasajyeta-- na jātvarthāntaramaṇubhyo gṛhyate iti. te khalvime paramāṇavaḥ saṃhatā gṛhyamāṇā atīndriyatvaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:3991: jahati viyuktāścāgṛhyamāṇā indriyaviṣayatvaṃ na labhante iti soyaṃ dravyāntarānutpattāvatimahān vyāghāta ityupapadyate dravyāntaraṃ yad grahaṇasya viṣaya iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:3992: saṃcayamātraṃ viṣaya iticet ? na-- saṃcayasya saṃyogabhāvāttasya cātīndriyasyāgrahaṇādayuktam|
GSP29nysvbh_u:3993: saṃcayaḥ khalvanekasya saṃyogaḥ sa ca gahyamāṇāśrayo gṛhyate
GSP29nysvbh_u:3994: nātīndriyāśrayaḥ. bhavati hīdamanena saṃyuktam' iti. tasmādayuktametaditi|
GSP29nysvbh_u:3997: yaḥ khalvavayavino 'vayaveṣu vṛttipratiṣedhādabhāvaḥ soyamavayavasyāvayaveṣu prasajyamānaḥ sarvapralayāya vā kalpeta
GSP29nysvbh_u:3998: niravayavādvā nivarteta. ubhayathā copalabdhiviṣayasyābhāvaḥ tadabhāvādupalabdhyabhāvaḥ, upalabdhyāśrayaścāyaṃ vṛttipratiṣedhaḥ sa
GSP29nysvbh_u:4002: avayavavibhāgamāśritya vṛttipratiṣedhādabhāvaḥ prasajyamāno niravayavāt paramāṇornivartate na sarvapralayāya kalpate|
GSP29nysvbh_u:4005: loṣṭasya khalu pravibhajyamānāvayavasyālpataramalpatamamuttaramuttaraṃ bhavati sa cācamalpataraprasaṅgaḥ yasmānnalpataramasti |
GSP29nysvbh_u:4006: yaḥ paramo 'lpastatra nivartate. yataśca nālpīyosti taṃ pṛramāṇuṃ pracakṣmahe iti // 16 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4019: 'antaḥ' iti pihitaṃ kāraṇāntaraiḥ kāraṇamucyate, 'bahiḥ' iti ca vyavadhāyakamavyavahitaṃ kāraṇamevocyate. tadetat kāryadravyasya saṃbhavati. nāṇoḥ-- akāryatvāt |
GSP29nysvbh_u:4020: akārye hi paramāṇāv antarbahirityasyābhāvaḥ, yatra cāsya bhāvo 'ṇukāryaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:4021: tat na paramāṇuḥ, yato hi nālpataramasti sa paramāṇuriti // 20 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4025: bhavantyākāśe. nāsaṃyuktamākāśena kiñcinmūrtadravyamupalabhyate tasmānnāsarvagatamiti // NyS_4,2.22: avyūhāviṣṭambhavibhutvāni cākāśadharmārḥ //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4026: saṃsapatā pratighātinā dravyeṇa na vyūhyate tathā kāṣṭhenodakam, kasmāt ?,
GSP29nysvbh_u:4027: niravayavatvārt, sapacca pratighāti dravyaṃ na viṣṭabhnāti |
GSP29nysvbh_u:4028: nāsya kriyāhetuṃ guṇaṃ pratibadhnāti, kasmāt ? asparśatvāt viparyaye hi
GSP29nysvbh_u:4029: viṣṭambho dṛṣṭa iti, sāvayave sparśavati dravye dṛṣṭaṃ dharmaṃ viparīte
GSP29nysvbh_u:4034: yastu sāvayavaḥ aṇukāryaṃ taditi. tasmādaṇukāryamidaṃ pratiṣidhyate iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:4038: paricchinnānāṃ hi sparśavatāṃ saṃsthānaṃ trikoṇaṃ caturasraṃ samaṃ parimaṇḍalamityupapadyate yattat saṃsthānaṃ so 'vayavasaṃniveśaḥ
GSP29nysvbh_u:4041: madhye sann aṇuḥ pūrvāparābhyāmaṇubhyāṃ saṃyuktastayorvyavadhānaṃ kurute.
GSP29nysvbh_u:4042: vyavadhānenānunamīyate-- pūrvabhāgena pūrveṇāṇunā saṃyujyate parabhāgena pareṇāṇunā saṃyujyate. yau tau pūrvāparau bhāgau tāv asyāvayavau. evaṃ sarvataḥ saṃyujyamānasya sarvato bhāgā avayavā iti // 24 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4052: iti ?, sparśavattvād vyavadhānam. āśrayasya cāvyāptyā bhāgabhaktiḥ uktaṃ cātra-- sparśavānaṇuḥ sparśavatoraṇvoḥ pratighātāt vyavadhāyako na sāvayavatvāt, sparśavattvācca vyavadhāne saty aṇusaṃyogo nāśrayaṃ vyāpnotīti bhāgabhaktirbhavati |
GSP29nysvbh_u:4053: bhāgavānivāyamiti, uktaṃ nātra-- 'vibhāge ālpataraprasaṅgasya yato nālpīyastatrāvasthānāt.
GSP29nysvbh_u:4056: mūrtimatāṃ ca saṃsthānopapatteḥ saṃyogopapatteśca paramāṇūnāṃ sāvayavattvamitihetvoḥ---
GSP29nysvbh_u:4058: yāvad mūrtimad yāvacca saṃyujyate tat sarvaṃ sāvayavamityanavasthākāriṇāvimau hetū.
GSP29nysvbh_u:4062: vibhāgaśca vibhajyamānahānernopapadyate tasmāt pralayāntatā nopapadyate iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:4063: anavasthāyāṃ capratyadhikaraṇaṃ dravyāvayavānāmānantyāt parimāṇabhedānāṃ gurutvasya cāgrahaṇaṃ samānaparimāṇatvaṃ cāvayavāvayavinoḥ paramāṇvavayavavibhāgādūrdhvamiti
GSP29nysvbh_u:4065: santīti manyate mithyābuddhaya etāḥ, yadi hi tattvabuddhayaḥ syurbuddhyā vivecane kriyamāṇe yathātmyaṃ buddhiviṣayāṇāmupalabhyeta---
GSP29nysvbh_u:4068: yathā 'ayaṃ tanturayaṃ tantuḥ' iti pratyekaṃ tantuṣu vivicyamāneṣu nārthāntaraṃ kiñcidupalabhyate yat paṭabuddherviṣayaḥ syāt-- yāthātmyānupalabdheḥ,
GSP29nysvbh_u:4072: yadi buddhyā vivecanaṃ bhāvānām ? na sarvabhāvānāṃ yāthātmyānupalabdhiḥ, atha sarvabhāvānāṃ yāthātmyānupalabdhiḥ ? na buddhyā vivecanaṃ bhāvānām, buddhyā vivecanaṃ ca yāthātmyānupalabdhiśceti vyāhanyate. taduktam---
GSP29nysvbh_u:4075: kāryadravyaṃ kāraṇadravyāśritaṃ tatkāraṇebhyaḥ pṛthaṅ nopalabhyate. viparyaye pṛthak grahaṇāt
GSP29nysvbh_u:4079: atīndriyeṣvaṇuṣu yadindriyeṇa gṛhyate tadetayā buddhyā vivicyamānamanyaditi // 28 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4082: yadasti yathā ca yannāsti yathā ca tatsarvaṃ pramāṇata upalabdhyā sidhyati, yā ca pramāṇata upalabdhistad buddhyā vivecanaṃ bhāvānāṃ tena sarvaśāstrāṇi
GSP29nysvbh_u:4083: sarvakarmāṇi sarve ca śarīriṇāṃ vyavahārā vyāptāḥ-- parīkṣamāṇo hi buddhyādhyavasyati--
GSP29nysvbh_u:4084: 'idamasti idaṃ nāstīti. tatra ca na sarvabhāvānupapattiḥ
GSP29nysvbh_u:4086: evaṃ ca sati sarvaṃ nāstīti nopapadyate,
GSP29nysvbh_u:4088: yadi sarvaṃ nāstīti pramāṇamupapadyate ? sarvaṃ nāstītyetad vyāhanyate, atha pramāṇaṃ nopapadyate ? sarvaṃ nāstītyasya kathaṃ siddhiḥ ?, atha pramāṇamantareṇa siddhiḥ ? sarvamastītyasya kathaṃ na siddhiḥ // 30 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4090: yathā svapne na viṣayāḥ santi atha cābhimāno bhavati. evaṃ na pramāṇāni prameyāṇi ca santi atha ca pramāṇaprameyābhimāno
GSP29nysvbh_u:4096: svapnānte cāsanto viṣayā upalabhyante ityatrāpi hetvabhāvaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4099: santīti ? tarhi ye ime pratibuddhena viṣayā upalabhyante (te) upalambhāt santīti--
GSP29nysvbh_u:4108: kaścitsvapno bhayopasaṃhitaḥ kaścit pramodopasaṃhitaḥ kaścidubhayaviparītaḥ kadācit svapnameva na paśyatīti, nimittavatastu svapnaviṣayābhimānasya nimittavikalpād vikalpopapattiḥ // NyS_4,2.34: smṛtisaṃkalpavacca svapnaviṣayābhimānaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4109: pūrvopalabdhaviṣayaḥ, yathā smṛtiśca saṃkalpaśca pūrvopalabdhaviṣayau na tasya pratyākhyānāya kalpete. tathā svapne viṣayagrahaṇaṃ pūrvopalabdhaviṣayaṃ na tasya pratyākhyānāvaya kalpate iti. evaṃ dṛṣṭaviṣayaśca svapnānto jāgaritāntena|
GSP29nysvbh_u:4110: yaḥ suptaḥ svapnaṃ paśyati sa eva jāgrat svapnadarśanāni pratisaṃdhatte--
GSP29nysvbh_u:4111: 'idamadrākṣam' iti. tatra jāgradbuddhivṛttivaśāt svapnaviṣayābhimāno mithyeti vyavasāyaḥ
GSP29nysvbh_u:4112: usati ca pratisaṃdhāne yā jāgrato buddhivṛttistadvaśādayaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:4118: apuruṣe sthāṇau puruṣa iti (yaḥ) vyavasāyaḥ sa pradhānāśrayaḥ-- na khalu puruṣe 'nupalabdhe
GSP29nysvbh_u:4127: sthāṇupuruṣasāmānyalakṣaṇaḥ, yathā pratibodhe yā jñānavṛttistayā svapnaviṣayābhimāno
GSP29nysvbh_u:4129: tathā māyagandharvanagaramṛgatṛṣṇikāṇāmapi yā buddhayaḥ (tāḥ) etasmiṃstaditivyavasāyāstatrāpyanenaiva kalpena mityopalabdhivināśastattvajñānād.
GSP29nysvbh_u:4131: upādānavacca māyādiṣu mithyājñānam. prajñāpanīyasarūpaṃ ca dravyamupādāvaya sādhanavān parasya mithyādhyavasāyaṃ karoti sā māyā, nīhāraprabhatīnāṃ nagarasarūpasaṃniveśe dūrād nagarabuddhirutpadyate viparyaye tadabhāvāt,
GSP29nysvbh_u:4133: sāmānyagrahaṇāt. antikasthasya viparyaye tadabhāvāt, kvacit kadācit kasyacicca
GSP29nysvbh_u:4135: dṛṣṭaṃ ca buddhidvaitaṃ māyāprayoktuḥ parasya cadūrāntikasthayorgandharvanagaramṛgatṛṣṇikāsu suptapratibuddha yośca svapnaviṣaye. tadetat sarvasyābhāve |
GSP29nysvbh_u:4141: upalabhyate mithyābuddhinimittaṃ mithyābuddhiśca pratyātmamutpanna gṛhyate-- saṃvedyatvāt. tasmāt mithyābuddhirapyastīti // 36 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4147: loṣṭe kapota iti, na tv asamāne
GSP29nysvbh_u:4152: gandhādau ca prameye gandhādibuddhayo mithyābhimatāstattvapradhānayoḥ sāmānyagrahaṇasya cābhāvāt tattvabuddhaya eva
GSP29nysvbh_u:4156: ityuktam. atha kathaṃ tattva jñānamutpadyate ? iti---
GSP29nysvbh_u:4158: sa tu pratyāhṛtasyendriyārthebhyo manaso dhārakeṇa prayatnena dhāryamāṇasyātmanā
GSP29nysvbh_u:4159: saṃyogastatvabubhutsāviśiṣṭaḥ, sati hi tasminnindriyārtheṣu buddhayo notpadyante tadabhyāsavaśāt tattvabuddhirutpadyate // 38 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4162: kasmāt ? arthaviśeṣaprābalyād abubhutsamānasyāpi buddhyutpattirdṛṣṭā yathā stanayitnuśabdaprabhṛtiṣu.
GSP29nysvbh_u:4165: kṣutpipāsābhyāṃ śītoṣṇābhyāṃ vyādhibhiścānicchatopi buddhayaḥ pravartante tasmādaikāgryā nupapattiriti
GSP29nysvbh_u:4166: astvetat samādhivyutthānanimittaṃ samādhipratyanīkaṃ ca. sati tvetasmin---
GSP29nysvbh_u:4176: pracayakāṣṭhāgate tattvajñānahetau dharme prakṛṣṭāyāṃ samādhibhāvanāyāṃ tattvajñānamutpadyate
GSP29nysvbh_u:4179: anyatra me mano 'bhūt' ityāha laukika iti
GSP29nysvbh_u:4185: buddhīnāmutpādaḥ, na ca prabalopi san bāhyo 'rtha
GSP29nysvbh_u:4186: ātmano buddhyutpāde samartho bhavati-- tasyendriyeṇa saṃyogād buddhyutpāde sāmarthyaṃ dṛṣṭamiti NyS_4,2.45: tadabhāvaścāpavarge //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4192: yasmāt sarvaduḥkhabījaṃ sarvaduḥkhāyatanaṃ cāpavarge vicchidyate tasmāt sarveṇa duḥkhena vimuktirapavargaḥ. na nirbījaṃ nirāyatanaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:4197: yamaḥ usamānamāśramiṇāṃ dharmasādhanam, niyamastu viśiṣṭamdva ātmasaṃskāraḥ
GSP29nysvbh_u:4198: punaradharmahānaṃ dharmopacayaśca, yogaśāstrāccādhyātmavidhiḥ pratipattavyaḥ sa punaḥ-- tapaḥ prāṇāyāmaḥ pratyāhāro
GSP29nysvbh_u:4199: dhyānaṃ dhāraṇeti, indriyaviṣayeṣu prasaṃkhyānābhyāso rāgadveṣaprahāṇārthaḥ, upāyastu yogācāravidhānamiti NyS_4,2.47: jñānagrahaṇābhyāsastadvidyaiśca saha saṃvādaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4205: iti prajñāparipākārthaṃ, paripākastu saṃśayacchedanam avijñātārthabodhaḥ adhyavasitābhyanujñānamiti,
GSP29nysvbh_u:4215: anyonyapratyanīkāni ca prāvādukānāṃ darśanāni svapakṣarāgeṇa caike nyāyamativartante. tatra--
GSP29nysvbh_u:4220: vigṛhyeti vijigīṣayā na tattvabubhutsayeti, tadedat vidyāpālanārthaṃ na lābhapūjākhyātyarthamiti
GSP29nysvbh_u:4223: sādharmyavaidharmyābhyāṃ pratyavasthānasya vikalpājjātibahutvamiti saṃkṣepeṇoktaṃ tadvistareṇa vibhajate, tāḥ khalvimā jātayaḥ sthāpanāhetau prayukte caturviṃśatiḥ pratiṣedhahetavaḥ |
GSP29nysvbh_u:4226: viśeṣaṃ tatra tatrodāhariṣyāmyaḥ, evaṃ vaidharmyasamaprabhṛtayopi nirvaktavyāḥ // 1 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4229: sādharmyeṇopasaṃkāre sādhyadharmviparyayopapatteḥ sādharmyeṇaiva pratyavasthānam aviśiṣyamāṇaṃ sthāpanāhetutaḥ sādharmyasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh_u:4230: nidarśanam-- 'kriyāvānātmā-- dravyasya kriyaḥhetuguṇayogāt. dravyaṃ loṣṭaḥ kriyāhetuguṇayukta kriyāvān tathā cātmā tasamāt kriyāvān' iti,
GSP29nysvbh_u:4232: vibhuno dravyasya niṣkriyatvāt. vibhu cākāśaṃ niṣkriyaṃ ca tathā cātmā
GSP29nysvbh_u:4233: tasmāt niṣkriyaḥ' iti, na cāsti viśeṣahetuḥ-- kriyāvatsādharmyāt kriyāvatā bhavitavyaṃ na purakriyasādharmyād niṣkriyeṇeti, viśeṣahetvabhāvān sādharmyasamāḥ pratiṣedho bhavati|
GSP29nysvbh_u:4234: atha vaidharmyasamaḥ-- 'kriyāhetuguṇayukto loṣṭaḥ paricchinno dṛṣṭo na tathātmā tasmānna loṣṭavat kriyāvān' iti. na nāsti viśeṣahetuḥ--
GSP29nysvbh_u:4235: kriyāvatsādharmyāt kriyāvatā bhavitavyaṃ na punaḥ kriyāvadvaidharmyādkiyeṇeti. viśeṣahetvabhāvād
GSP29nysvbh_u:4236: vaidharmyeṇa copasaṃhāre-- 'niṣkriya ātmā-- vibhutvāt. kriyāvad dravyamavibhu dṛṣṭaṃ yathā loṣṭaḥ na ca tathātmā tasmād niṣkriyaḥ' iti,
GSP29nysvbh_u:4237: vaidharmyeṇa pratyavasthānam-- 'niṣkriyaṃ dravyamākāśaṃ kriyāhetuguṇarahitaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ na tathātmā tasmānna niṣkriyaḥ' iti. ni cāsti viśeṣahetuḥ-- kriyāvadvaidharmyād niṣkriyeṇa bhavitavyaṃ na punarakriyavaidharmyāt kriyāvateti. viśeṣahetvabhāvād vaidharmyasamaḥ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:4238: atha ( punaḥ ) sādharmyasamaḥ-- 'kriyāvān loṣṭaḥ kriyāhetuguṇayukto dṛṣṭaḥ
GSP29nysvbh_u:4239: tathā cātmā tasmātpava kriyāvān' iti. na cāsti viśeṣahetuḥ--
GSP29nysvbh_u:4240: kriyāvadvaidharmyād niṣkriyo na punaḥ kriyāvatsādharmyāt kriyāvāniti.
GSP29nysvbh_u:4244: sādharmyamātreṇa vaidharmyamātreṇa ca sādhyasādhane pratijñāyamāne syādavyavasthā sā tu dharmaviśeṣe nopapadyate, gosādharmyād gotvājjātiviśeṣād gauḥ sidhyati na tu sāsnādisaṃbandhāt. aśvādivaidharmyād gotvādeva gauḥ sidhyati na guṇādibhedāt, taccaitat
GSP29nysvbh_u:4245: kṛtavyākhyānamavayavaprakaraṇe, pramāṇānāmabhisaṃbandhāccaikārthakāritvaṃ samānaṃ vākye iti, hetvābhāsāśrayā khalv iyam avyavastheti // 3 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4247: dṛṣṭāntadharma sādhye samāsajata utkarṣasamaḥ-- yadi kriyāhetuguṇayogalloṣṭavat kriyāvānātmā ( tadā ) loṣṭavadeva sparśavānapi prāpnoti. atha na sparśavān loṣṭavat kriyāvānapi na prāpnoti, viparyaye vā viśeṣo vaktavya iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:4248: sādhye dharmābhāvaṃ dṛṣṭāntāt prasajato 'pakarṣasamaḥ-- loṣṭaḥ khalu kriyāvān avibhurdṛṣṭaḥ kāmamātmāpi kriyāvānavibhurastu. viparyaye vā viśeṣo vaktavya iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:4249: khyāpanīyo varṇyo viparyayādavarṇyaḥ tāvetau sādhyadṛṣṭāntadharmauṃ viparyasyato varṇyāvarṇyasamau
GSP29nysvbh_u:4250: sādhanadharmayukte dṛṣṭānte dharmāntaravikalpāt sādhyadharmavikalpaṃ prasajato vikalpasamaḥ-- kriyāguṇahetuyuktaṃ kiñcid guru yathā loṣṭaḥ kiñcicca laghu yathā vāyurevaṃ kriyāhetuguṇayuktaṃ kiñcat kriyāvat syād yathā loṣṭaḥ kiñcidakriyaṃ yathātmā. viśeṣo vā vācya iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:4251: hetvādyivayavasāmarthyayogī dharmaḥ sādhyastaṃ dṛṣṭānte prasajataḥ sādhyasamaḥ-- yadi 'yathā loṣṭastathātmā ?' prāptastarhi 'yathātmā tathā
GSP29nysvbh_u:4252: loṣṭaḥ' iti. sādhyaścāyamātmā kriyāvāniti kāmaṃ loṣṭopi sādhyaḥ, atha naivam ? na tarhi 'yathā loṣṭastathātmā' (iti ) // 4 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4255: alabhyaḥ siddhasya nihnavaḥ, siddhaṃ ca kiñcitsādharmyādupamānam-- 'yathā
GSP29nysvbh_u:4256: gaustathā gavayaḥ' iti, tatra na labhyo
GSP29nysvbh_u:4258: dṛṣṭāntādisāmarthyayukte na labhyaḥ sādhyadṛṣṭāntayordharmavikalpāt vaidharmyāt pratiṣedho vaktumiti // 5 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4261: prajñāpanārtham. evaṃ sādhyātideśād dṛṣṭānte upapadyamāne sādhyatvamanupapannamiti // 6 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4262: NyS_5,1.7: prāpya sādhyamaprāpya vā hetoḥ prāptyāviśiṣṭatvād aprāptyāsādhakatvācca prāptyaprāptisamau
GSP29nysvbh_u:4263: hetuḥ prāpya vā sādhyaṃ sādhayedaprāpya vā ?, na tāvat prāpya--
GSP29nysvbh_u:4264: prāptyāmaviśiṣṭatvād asādhakaḥu dvayorvidyamānayoḥ prāptau satyāṃ kiṃ kasya sādhakaṃ sādhyaṃ vā ?|
GSP29nysvbh_u:4265: aprāpya sādhakaṃ na bhavati-- nāprāptaḥ pradīpaḥ prakāśayatīti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:4266: prāptyā pratyavasthānaṃ prāptisamaḥ, aprāptyā pratyavasthānam aprāptisamaḥ
GSP29nysvbh_u:4268: ubhayathā khalvayuktaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ-- kartṛkaraṇādhikaraṇāni prāpya mṛdaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:4269: ghaṭādikāryaṃ viṣpādayanti, abhicārācca pīḍane sati dṛṣṭam aprāpya sādhakatvamiti // 8
GSP29nysvbh_u:4270: NyS_5,1.9: dṛṣṭāntasya kāraṇānapadeśāt pratyavasthānācca pratidṛṣṭāntena prasaṅgapratidṛṣṭāntasamau
GSP29nysvbh_u:4271: sādhanasyāpi sādhanaṃ vaktavyamiti prasaṅgena pratyavasthānaṃ prasaṅgasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ-- kriyāhetuguṇayogī kriyāvān loṣṭa
GSP29nysvbh_u:4275: 'kriyāhetuguṇayuktamākāśaṃ niṣkriyaṃ dṛṣṭam' iti, kaḥ punarākāśasya kriyāheturguṇaḥ ? vāyunā saṃyogaḥ saṃskārāpekṣaḥ
GSP29nysvbh_u:4279: idaṃ tāvadayaṃ pṛṣṭo vaktumarhati-- atha ke pradīpamupādadate kimarthaṃ ceti ?, didṛkṣamāṇā dṛśyadarśanārthamiti /
GSP29nysvbh_u:4280: atha pradīpaṃ didṛkṣamāṇāḥ pradīpāntaraṃ kasmānnopādadate ?, antareṇāpi pradīpāntaraṃ dṛśyate
GSP29nysvbh_u:4282: atha dṛṣṭāntaḥ kimarthamucyate iti ?. aprajñātasya jñāpanārthamiti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:4283: atha dṛṣṭānte kāraṇādeśaḥ kimarthaṃ mṛgyate ?, yadi prajñāpanārtham ?,
GSP29nysvbh_u:4284: prajñāto dṛṣṭāntaḥ sa khalu--"laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ yasminnarthe buddhisāmyaṃ sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ 1-1-25"iti tatprajñāpanārthaḥkāraṇāpadeśo nirarthaka iti prasaṅgasamasyottaram // 10 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4287: pratidṛṣṭāntaṃ bruvatā na viśeṣaheturapadiśyate-- anena prakāreṇa pratidṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhako na dṛṣṭānta iti, evaṃ pratidṛṣṭāntahetutve nāheturdṛṣṭānta ityupapadyate. sa ca kathaṃ heturnasyād yadyapratiṣiddhaḥ sādhakaḥ syāditi // 11 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4289: anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavadityukte apara āha--
GSP29nysvbh_u:4290: prāgutpatteranutpanne śabde prayatnānantarīyakatvamanityatvakāraṇaṃ nāsti tadabhāvād nityatvaṃ prāptaṃ nityasya cotpattirnāsti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:4294: tathābhāvādutpannasyeti-- utpannaḥ khalvayaṃ śabda iti bhavati.
GSP29nysvbh_u:4295: prāgutpatteḥ śabda eva nāsti-- utpannasya śabdabhāvāt. śabdasya sataḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvam
GSP29nysvbh_u:4300: anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavadityukte hetau. saṃśayena
GSP29nysvbh_u:4301: pratyavatiṣṭhate-- sati prayatnānāntarīyakatve astyevāsya nityena sāmānyena sādharmyam- aindriyakatvam. asti ca ghaṭenānityena. ato nityānityasādharmyādanivṛttaḥ saṃśaya iti // 14 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4303: NyS_5,1.15: sādharmyātsaṃśaye na saṃśayo vaidharmyād ubhayathā vā saṃśaye
GSP29nysvbh_u:4305: viśeṣād vaidharmyādavadhāryamāṇe 'rthe 'puruṣaḥ' iti na sthāṇupuruṣasādharmyāt saṃśayo 'vakāśaṃ labhate, evaṃ vaidharmyād viśeṣāt
GSP29nysvbh_u:4306: prayatnānantarīyakatvādavadhāryamāṇe śabdasyānityatve nityānityasādharmyāt saṃśayo 'vakāśaṃ na labhate. yadi vai labheta ? tataḥ sthāṇupuruṣasādharmyānucchedādatyantaṃ saṃśayaḥ syāt, gṛhyamāṇe ca viśeṣe
GSP29nysvbh_u:4307: nityasādharmyaṃ saṃśayaheturiti nābhyupagamyate-- nahi gṛhyamāṇe puruṣasya
GSP29nysvbh_u:4310: ubhayenaunityena cānityena sādharmyāt pakṣapratipakṣayoḥ pravṛttiḥ prakriyā, 'anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavat' ityekaḥ pakṣaṃ pravartayati. dvitīyaśca nityasādharmyāt. evaṃ ca sati
GSP29nysvbh_u:4311: 'prayatnānantarīyakatvāt' itiheturanityasādharmyeṇocyamāno na prakaraṇamativartate. prakaraṇānativṛtternirṇayānanivartanam, samānaṃ caitannityasādharmyeṇocyamāne hetau, tadidaṃ prakaraṇānativṛttyā pratyavasthānaṃ prakaraṇasamaḥ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:4312: samānaṃ caitadvaidharmye 'pi = ubhayavaidharmyāt prakriyāsiddheḥ prakaraṇasama iti // 16
GSP29nysvbh_u:4316: ubhayasādharmyāt prakriyāsiddhiṃ bruvatā pratipakṣāt prakriyāsiddhiruktā bhavati, yadyubhyasādharmyaṃ tatraikataraḥ pratipakṣa ityevaṃ satyupapannaḥ pratipakṣo bhavati. pratipakṣopapatteranupapannaḥ
GSP29nysvbh_u:4319: tattvānavadhāraṇācca prakriyāsiddhiḥ-- viparyaye prakaraṇāvasānātu tattvāvadhāraṇe hyavasitaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhavatīti // 17 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4321: hetuḥusādhanaṃ tat sādhyāt pūrvaṃ paścāt saha vā bhavet. yadi pūrvaṃ sādhanam ? asati sādhye kasya sādhanam, atha paścāt ? asati sādhane kasyedaṃ sādhyam, atha yugapat sādhyasādhate ? dvayorvidyamānayoḥ kiṃ kasya sādhanaṃ kiṃ kasya sādhyam. iti heturahetunā na viśiṣyate|
GSP29nysvbh_u:4325: na traikālyāsiddhiḥ, kasmāt ? hetutaḥ sādhyasiddheḥ, nirvatainīyasya nirvṛttiḥ vijñeyasya vijñānam ubhayaṃ kāraṇato dṛśyate. soyaṃ mahān pratyakṣaviṣaya udāharaṇamiti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:4326: yattu khalūktam-- asati sādhye kasya sādhanamiti ? yattu nirvartyate yacca
GSP29nysvbh_u:4329: 'pūrvaṃ paścād yugapadvā' pratiṣedha iti nopapadyate. pratiṣedhānupapatteḥ sthāpanāhetuḥ siddha iti // 20 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4331: 'anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavat' iti sthāpite pakṣe
GSP29nysvbh_u:4332: arthāpattyā pratipakṣaṃ sādhayato 'rthāpattisamaḥ, yadi prayatnānantarīyakatvādanityasādharmyādanityaḥ śabda iti ? ( tadā )
GSP29nysvbh_u:4333: arthādāpadyate-- nityasādharmyānnitya iti, asti tvasya nityena sādharmyam asparśatvamiti // asyottaram---
GSP29nysvbh_u:4338: anekāntikatvāccārthāpatteḥ = ubhayapakṣasamā ceyamarthāpattiḥ-- yadi nityasādharmyādasparśatvādākāśavacca nityaḥ śabdaḥ ? ( tadā )
GSP29nysvbh_u:4339: arthādāpannam-- anityasādharmyāt prayatnānantarīyakatvādanitya iti, na ceyaṃ viparyayamātrādekāntenārthāpattiḥ. na khalu vai dhanasya grāvṇaḥ patanamiti arthādāpadyate-- dravāṇāmapāṃ patanābhāva iti NyS_5,1.23: ekadharmopapatteraviśeṣe sarvāviśeṣaprasaṅgāt sadbhāvopapatter
GSP29nysvbh_u:4341: eko dharmaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ śabdaghaṭayorupapadyate ityaviśeṣe ubhayoranitayatve sarvasyāviśeṣaḥ
GSP29nysvbh_u:4342: katham ? sadbhāvopapatteḥ = eko dharmaḥ sadbhāvaḥ sarvasyopapadyate|
GSP29nysvbh_u:4346: yathā sādhyadṛṣṭāntayorekadharmasya prayatnānantarīyakatvasyopapatteranityatvaṃ dharmāntaram aviśeṣo naivaṃ sarvabhāvānāṃ sadbhāvopapattinimittaṃ dharmāntaramasti yenāviśeṣaḥ syāt|
GSP29nysvbh_u:4347: atha matam-- anityatvameva dharmāntaraṃ sadbhāvopapattinimittaṃ bhāvānāṃ sarvatra syāditi ?, evaṃ khalu vai kalpyamāne-- 'anityāḥ sarve bhāvāḥ sadbhāvopapatteḥ' itipakṣaḥ prāpnoti, tatra pratijñārthavyatiriktamanyadudāharaṇaṃ nāsti. anudāharaṇaśca heturnāstīti,
GSP29nysvbh_u:4349: bhavati, sataśca nityānityabhāvādanityatvānupapattistasmāt 'sadbhāvopapatteḥ sarvāviśeṣaprasaṅgaḥ' iti nirabhidheyametadvākyamiti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:4350: 'sarvabhāvānāṃ sadbhāvopapatteranityatvam' iti bruvatānujñātaṃ śabdasyānityatvaṃ tatrānupapannaḥ pratiṣedha iti // 24 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4352: yady anityatvakāraṇamupapadyate śabdasya ity anityaḥ śabdaḥ ?
GSP29nysvbh_u:4354: ubhayasya = anityatvasya nityatvasya ca kāraṇopapattyā pratyavasthānamupapattisamaḥ // 25
GSP29nysvbh_u:4361: ekasya nityatvānityatvaprasaṅgaṃ vyāhataṃ bruvatā uktaḥ pratiṣedha iticet
GSP29nysvbh_u:4362: ? spapakṣaparapakṣayoḥ samāno vyāghātaḥ sa ca naikatarasya sādhaka iti //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4368: prayatnānantarīyakatvāditi bruvatā kāraṇata utpattirabhidhīyate. na ( tu )
GSP29nysvbh_u:4369: kāryasya kāraṇaniyamaḥ, yida ca kāraṇāntarādapyupapadyamānasya śabdasya tad anityatvamupapadyate ? kimatrapratiṣidhyate ? iti // 28 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4371: āvaraṇādyanupalabdheḥuyathā vidyamānasyodakāderarthasyāvāraṇāderanupalabdhirnaivaṃ śabdasyāgrahaṇakāraṇenāvaraṇādinānupalabdhiḥugṛhyeta caitadasyāgrahaṇakāraṇamudakādivad na ( ca ) gṛhyate tasmādudakādiviparītaḥ śabdo 'nupalabhyamāna iti---
GSP29nysvbh_u:4377: hetuḥ-- āvaraṇādyanupalabdheriti āvaraṇādiṣu cāvaraṇādyanupalabdhau ca samatayānupaladhyā pratyavasthito 'nupalabdhisamo bhavati // 29 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4381: anupalambhātmakatvādanupalabdheḥ = upalambhābhāvamātratvādanupalabdheḥ yadasti tadupalabdherviṣayaḥ = upalabdhyā tadastīti pratijñāyate. yannāsti tadanupalabdherviṣayaḥ = anupalabhyamānaṃ nāstīti pratijñāyate,
GSP29nysvbh_u:4382: soyamāvaraṇādyanupalabdheranupalambho 'nupalabdhau svaviṣaye pravartamāno na svaviṣayaṃ pratiṣedhati, apratiṣiddhā cāvaraṇādyanupalabdhirhetutvāya kalpayate|
GSP29nysvbh_u:4383: āvaraṇādīni tu vidyamānatvādupalabdherviṣayāḥ teṣāmupalabdhyā bhavitavyaṃ yattāni nopalabhyante tad upalabdheḥ svaviṣayapratipādikāyā abhāvād =
GSP29nysvbh_u:4385: śabdasyāgrahaṇakāraṇānīti, anupalambhādanupalabdhiḥ sidhyati-- viṣayaḥ sa tasyeti // 30
GSP29nysvbh_u:4388: śarīre śarīriṇāṃ jñānavikalpānāṃ bhāvābhāvau saṃvedanīyau-- 'asti me saṃśayajñānam nāsti me saṃśayajñānam' iti. evaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:4390: upalabdhyabhāvaḥ svasaṃvedyaḥ-- nāsti me śabdasyāvaraṇādyupalabdhiḥ iti =
GSP29nysvbh_u:4396: iti sarvasyānityatvamaniṣṭaṃ saṃpadyate, soyamanityatvena pratyavasthānādanityasama iti // asyottaram---
GSP29nysvbh_u:4399: pratiṣedhaḥ, tasya pakṣeṇa pratiṣedhyena sādharmyaṃ pratijñādiyogaḥ, tad yadyanityasādharmyādanityatvasyāsiddhiḥ ?-- sādharmyādasiddheḥ,
GSP29nysvbh_u:4401: NyS_5,1.34: dṛṣṭānte ca sādhyasādhanabhāvena prajñātasya dharmasya hetutvāttasya cobhayathā bhāvānnāviśeṣaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4402: dṛṣṭānte yaḥ khalu dharmaḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvena prajñāyate sa
GSP29nysvbh_u:4403: hetutvenābhidhīyate. sa cobhayathā bhavati-- kena citsamānaḥ kutaścidviśiṣṭaḥ. sāmānyāt sādharmya viśeṣācca vaidharmyam. ekaṃ sādharmyaviśeṣo hetuḥ nāviśeṣeṇa sādharmyamātraṃ vaidharmyamātraṃ vā.
GSP29nysvbh_u:4409: 'anityaḥ śabdaḥ' iti pratijñāyate. tadanityatvaṃ kiṃ śabde nityam ?
GSP29nysvbh_u:4410: athānityam ?. yadi tāvat sarvadā bhavati ? dharmasya sadā bhāvād
GSP29nysvbh_u:4411: dharmiṇopi sadā bhāva iti 'nityaḥ śabdaḥ' iti, atha na sarvadā bhavati ?
GSP29nysvbh_u:4412: anityatvasyābhāvād nityaḥ śabdaḥ, evaṃ nityatvena pratyavasthrānāt
GSP29nysvbh_u:4418: śabdasyānityatvam. anityatvopapatteśca 'nānityaḥ śabdaḥ' iti pratiṣedho nopapadyate, atha nābhyupagamyate ? 'nityamanityatvasya bhāvāt' itiheturna bhavatīti hetvabhāvāt pratiṣedhānupapattiriti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:4419: utpannasya nirodhād abhāvaḥ śabdasyānityatvaṃ tatra paripraśnānupapattiḥ |
GSP29nysvbh_u:4420: soyaṃ praśnaḥ-- 'tadanityatvaṃ kiṃ śabde sarvadā bhavati ? atha na ?'
GSP29nysvbh_u:4421: ityanupapannaḥ, kasmāt ? utpannasyayo nirodhād abhāvaḥ śabdasya tad anityatvam. evaṃ ca saty adhikaraṇādheyavibhāgo vyāghātānnāstīti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:4422: nityānityatvavirodhācca nityatvamanityatvaṃ caikasya dharmiṇo dharmāviti virudhyete |
GSP29nysvbh_u:4423: na saṃbhavataḥ, tatra yaduktam-- 'nityamanityatvasya bhāvād nitya eva' tad avartamānārthamuktamiti NyS_5,1.37: prayatnakāryānekatvāt kāryasamaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4424: 'prayatnānantarīyakatavādanityaḥ śabdaḥ' iti, yasya prayatnānantaramātmalābhaḥ tatkhalu abhūtvā bhavati yathā ghaṭādi kāryam.
GSP29nysvbh_u:4429: vyavadhānāpohāccābhivyaktirvyavahitānām, tat kiṃ prayatnānantaramātmālābhaḥ śabdasya ? āho abhivyaktiḥ ? iti viśeṣo nāsti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:4434: yatra prayatnānantaramabhivyaktistatrānupalabdhikāraṇaṃ vyavadhānamupapadyate. vyavadhānāpohācca prayatnānantarabhāvino 'rthasayopalabdhilakṣaṇābhivyaktirbhavatīti. na tu śabdasyānupalabdhikāraṇaṃ kiṃ cidupapadyate yasya prayatnānantaramapohāt śabdasyopalabdhilakṣaṇābhivyaktirbhavatīti. tasmādutpadyate śabdo nābhivyajyate iti // 38 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4437: pratiṣedhopyanaikāntikaḥ-- kiñcit pratiṣedhati kiñcinneti. anaikāntikatvād asādhaka iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:4438: atha vā śabdasyānityatvapekṣe prayatnānantaramutpādo nābhivyaktiriti viśeṣahetvabhāvaḥ, nityatvapakṣepi prayatnānantaramabhivyaktirnotpāda iti
GSP29nysvbh_u:4441: sarveṣu sādharmyaprabhatiṣu pratiṣedhahetuṣu yatra yatrāviśeṣo dṛśyate tatrobhayoḥ pakṣayoḥ samaḥ prasajyate iti // 40 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4443: yo 'yaṃ pratiṣedhepi samāno doṣaḥ anaikāntikatvamāpādyate so 'yaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:4445: prayatnānantarīyakatvāt' iti sādhanavādinaḥ sthāpanā prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh_u:4447: iti dūṣaṇavādinaḥ pratiṣedhahetunā dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ sa ca pratiṣedha ityucyate, tasyāsya pratiṣedhepi samāno doṣa iti tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ ( sa ca )
GSP29nysvbh_u:4448: vipratiṣedha ucyate, tasmin pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhepi samāno doṣaḥ anaikāntikatvaṃ caturthaḥ pakṣaḥ // 4 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4449: NyS_5,1.42: pratiṣedhaṃ sadoṣamabhyupetya pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe samāno doṣaprasaṅgo matānujñā
GSP29nysvbh_u:4453: tṛtīyapakṣe samānam anaikāntikatvamiti samānaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ prasajato dūṣaṇavādino matānujñā prasajyate iti pañcamaḥ pakṣaḥ // 42 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4454: NyS_5,1.43: svapakṣalakṣaṇāpekṣopapattyupasaṃhāre hetunirdeśe parapakṣadoṣābhyupagamāt samāno doṣaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4459: ityupapadyamānaṃ doṣaṃ parapakṣe upasaṃharati,itthaṃ cānaikāntikaḥ pratiṣedha iti hetuṃ nirdiśati, tatra svapakṣalakṣaṇāpekṣayopapadyamānadoṣopasaṃhāre hetunirdeśe ca sati anena
GSP29nysvbh_u:4464: ityāha, evaṃ sthāpanāṃ sadoṣāmabhyupetya pratiṣedhepi samānaṃ doṣaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:4465: prasajataḥ parapakṣābhyupagamāt samāno doṣo bhavati. yathā parasya pratiṣedhaṃ sadoṣamabhyupetya pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhepi samāno doṣaprasaṅgo matānujñā prasajyate iti tathāsyāpi sthāpanāṃ sadoṣāmabhyupetya
GSP29nysvbh_u:4466: pratiṣedhepi samānaṃ doṣaṃ prasajato matānujñā prasajyate iti, sa khalvayaṃ ṣaṣṭhaḥ pakṣaḥ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:4482: ityevaṃ pravartate tadobhayoḥ pakṣayorasiddhiḥ, yadā tu "kāryānyatveprayatnāhetutvamanupalabdhikāraṇopapatteḥ
GSP29nysvbh_u:4483: ityanena tṛtīyapakṣo yujyate tadā viśeṣahetuvacanāt prayatnānantaramāramalābhaḥ śabdasya nābhivyaktiriti siddhaḥ prathamapakṣo na ṣaṭpakṣī pravartate iti // 43 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4484: // iti vātsyāyanaviracite nyāyabhāṣye pañcamādhyāyasya prathamamāhnikaṃ samāptam //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4487: nigrahasthānāni khalu parājayavastūny aparādhādhikaraṇāni prāyeṇa pratijñādyavayavāśrayāṇi tattvavādinam atattvavādinaṃ cābhisaṃplavante,
GSP29nysvbh_u:4489: NyS_5,2.1: pratijñāhāniḥ pratijñāntaraṃ pratijñāvirodhaḥ pratijñāsaṃnyāso hetvantaramarthāntaraṃ nirarthakam avijñātārtham apārthakam aprāptakālaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:4490: nyūnamadhikaṃ punaruktam ananubhāṣaṇam ajñānam apratibhā vikṣepo matānujñā paryanuyojyopekṣaṇaṃ niranuyojyānuyogopasiddhānto hetvābhāsāśca nigrahasthānāni //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4493: sādhyadharmapratyanīkena dharmeṇa pratyavasthite pratidṛṣṭāntadharmaṃ svadṛṣṭānte 'bhyanujānan pratijñāṃ jahātīti pratijñāhāniḥ, nidarśanam--
GSP29nysvbh_u:4495: 'dṛṣṭamaindriyakatvaṃ sāmānye nitye kasmānna tathā śabdaḥ ?' iti. ( evam )
GSP29nysvbh_u:4496: pratyavasthite. idamāha-- 'yadyaindriyakaṃ sāmānyaṃ nityam ? kāmaṃ ghaṭo nityostu' iti, sa khalvayaṃ sādhakasya dṛṣṭāntasya nityatvaṃ prasañjayan
GSP29nysvbh_u:4497: nigamanāntameva pakṣaṃ jahāti. pakṣaṃ jahat pratijñā jahātītyucyate--
GSP29nysvbh_u:4500: pratijñātārthaḥ-- 'anityaḥ śabda aindriyakatvād ghaṭavat' ityukte yo 'sya
GSP29nysvbh_u:4502: pratidṛṣṭāntena hetuvyabhicāraḥ-- 'sāmānyamaindriyakaṃ nityam' iti tasmiṃśca pratijñātārthapratiṣedhe dharmavikalpāditi |
GSP29nysvbh_u:4504: sāmānyamaindriyakaṃ sarvagatam aindriyakastv asarvagato ghaṭa iti
GSP29nysvbh_u:4506: katham ? yathā ghaṭo 'sarvagata evaṃ śabdopyasarvagato ghaṭavadevānitya
GSP29nysvbh_u:4507: iti, tatra-- 'anityaḥ śabdaḥ' iti pūrvā pratijñā. 'asarvagataḥ' iti dvitīyā pratijñā pratijñāntaram|
GSP29nysvbh_u:4508: tat kathaṃ nigrahasthānamiti ?, na pratijñāyāḥ sādhanaṃ pratijñāntaraṃ kiṃ tu hetudṛṣṭāntau sādhanaṃ pratijñāyāḥ, tadetad asādhanopādānam anarthakamiti. ānarthakyānnigrahasthānamiti NyS_5,2.4: pratijñāhetvorvirodhaḥ pratijñāvirodhaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4519: na cānityamevaṃ śabdopyaindriyako na cānityaḥ' iti. evaṃ pratiṣiddhe pakṣe
GSP29nysvbh_u:4520: yadi brūyāt-- 'kaḥ punarāha anityaḥ śabdaḥ (iti) ?' iti. soyaṃ pratijñātārthanihnavaḥ pratijñāsaṃnyāsa iti // 5 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4521: NyS_5,2.6: aviśeṣokte hetau pratiṣiddhe viśeṣamicchato hetvantaram //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4522: nidarśanam-- 'ekaprakṛtīdaṃ vyaktam' iti pratijñā. kasmād hetoḥ ?
GSP29nysvbh_u:4523: 'ekaprakṛtīnāṃ vikārāṇāṃ parimāṇāt' 'mṛtpūrvakāṇāṃ śarāvādīnāṃ dṛṣṭaṃ parimāṇaṃ yāvān prakṛtervyūho bhavati tāvān vikāraḥ' iti. dṛṣṭaṃ ca prativikāraṃ parimāṇam. asti cedaṃ parimāṇaṃ prativyaktam,
GSP29nysvbh_u:4525: asya vyabhicāreṇa pratyavasthānam-- nānāprakṛtīnāmekaprakṛtīnāṃ ca vikārāṇāṃ dṛṣṭaṃ parimāṇamiti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:4526: evaṃ pratayavasthite āha-- ekaprakṛtisamanvaye sati śarāvādivikārāṇāṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:4529: tadidamaviśeṣokte hetau pratiṣiddhe viśeṣaṃ bruvato hetvantaraṃ bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh_u:4531: hetvantara vacane sati yadi hetvarthanidarśano dṛṣṭānta upādīyate ? nedaṃ vyaktamekaprakṛti bhavati-- prakṛtyantaropādānāt, atha nopādīyate ?.
GSP29nysvbh_u:4532: dṛṣṭānte hetvarthasyānidarśitasya sādhakabhāvānupapatteḥ ānarthakyād hetoranivṛttaṃ nigrahasthānamiti NyS_5,2.7: prakṛtādarthādapratisaṃbaddhārtham arthāntaram //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4533: yathoktalakṣaṇe pakṣapratipakṣaparigrahe hetutaḥ sādhyasiddhau prakṛtāyāṃ brūyāt-- 'nityaḥ śabdaḥ asparśatvāditi hetuḥ' heturnāma hinoterdhātostuni pratyaye kṛdantapadam. padaṃ ca-- nāmākhyātopasarganipātāḥ, abhidheyasya kriyāntarayogād viśiṣyamāṇarūpaḥ śabdo nāma, kriyākārakasamudāyaḥ.
GSP29nysvbh_u:4534: kārakasaṃkhyāviśiṣṭakriyākālayogābhidhāyi ākhyātam. dhātvarthamātraṃ ca kālābhidhānaviśiṣṭam, prayogeṣvarthādabhidyamānarūpā nipātāḥ,
GSP29nysvbh_u:4535: upasṛjyamānāḥ kriyāvadyotakā upasargāḥ, ityevamādi. tadarthāntaraṃ veditavyam // 7 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4538: iti, evaṃprakāraṃ nirarthakam-- abhidhānābhidheyabhāvānupapattau arthagaterabhāvād varṇāḥ krameṇa nirdiśyante iti // 8 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4540: yad vākyaṃ pariṣadā prativādinā ca trirabhihitamapi na vijñāyate śliṣṭaśabdam apratītaprayogam atidrutoccāritamityevamādinā kāraṇena
GSP29nysvbh_u:4544: yatrānekasya padasya vākyasya vā paurvāpayeṇānvayayogo nāsti ity asaṃbaddhārthatvaṃ gṛhyate tatsamudāyārthasyāpāyādapārthakaṃ yathā-- 'daśa
GSP29nysvbh_u:4546: kumāryāḥ prāyyaṃ tasyāḥ pitā apratiśīnaḥ' iti // 10 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4548: pratijñādīnāmakyavānāṃ yathālakṣaṇamarthavaśāt kramaḥ tatrāvayavaviparyāsena vacanam aprāptakālam asaṃbaddhārthaṃ nigrahasthānamiti // 11 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4555: anyatrānuvādāt śabdapunaruktam arthapunaruktaṃ vā-- 'nityaḥ śabdaḥ nityaḥ śabdaḥ' iti śabdapunaruktam. arthapunaruktam-- 'anityaḥ śabdaḥ.
GSP29nysvbh_u:4562: ityaktvā arthādāpannasya yo 'bhidhāyakaḥ śabdastena svaśabdena brūyāt-- 'anutpattidharmakaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:4563: iti tacca punaruktaṃ veditavyam-- arthasaṃpratyayārthe śabdaprayoge pratītaḥ so 'rtho 'rthāpattyeti
GSP29nysvbh_u:4564: NyS_5,2.16: vijñātasya pariṣadā trirabhihitasyāpy apratyuccāraṇam ananubhāṣaṇam //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4565: vijñātasya vākyārthasya pariṣadā prativādinā trirabhihitasya yad apratyuccāraṇaṃ tad ananubhāṣaṇaṃ nāma nigrahasthānāmiti, apratyuccārayan kimāśrayaṃ parapakṣapratiṣedhaṃ brūyāt ? // 6 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4568: tad ajñānaṃ nigrahasthānamiti, ayaṃ khalvavijñāya kasya pratiṣedhaṃ brūyāditi ? // 7 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4570: parapakṣapratiṣedhaḥ uttaraṃ tad yadā na pratipadyate ? tadā nigṛhīto bhavati // 18 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4573: 'idaṃ me karaṇīyaṃ vidyate tasminn avasite paścāt kathayiṣyāmīti (tat)
GSP29nysvbh_u:4575: ekanigrahāvasānāyāṃ kathāyāṃ svayameva kathāntaraṃ pratipadyate iti
GSP29nysvbh_u:4576: NyS_5,2.20: svapakṣe doṣābhyupagamāt parapakṣe doṣaprasaṅgo matānujñā //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4579: iti. sa svapakṣe doṣābhyupagamāt parapakṣe doṣaṃ prasañjayan paramatam anujānātīti matānujñānāma nigrahasthānamāpadyate iti // 20 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4583: etacca 'kasya parājayaḥ ?' ityanuktayā pariṣadā vacanīyam-- na khalu nigrahaṃ prāptaḥ svakaupīnaṃ vivṛṇuyāditi // 21 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4592: na sato vināśaḥ, nāsad ātmānaṃ labhate = nāsadutpadyate' iti siddhāntamabhyupetya svapakṣaṃ vyavasthāpayati--ekaprakṛtīdaṃ vyaktam--
GSP29nysvbh_u:4593: vikārāṇāmanvayadarśanāt. mṛdanvitānāṃ śarāvādīnāṃ dṛṣṭamekaprakṛtitvaṃ tathā cāyaṃ vyaktabhedaḥ sukhaduḥkhamohasamanvito dṛśyate
GSP29nysvbh_u:4595: evamuktavān anuyujyate-- atha prakṛtirvikāra iti kathaṃ lakṣitavyam ? iti, yasyāvasthitasya dharmāntaranivṛttau dharmāntaraṃ pravartate sā prakṛtiḥ. yacca dharmāntaraṃ pravartate sa vikāra iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:4598: pratijñātaṃ khalvanena-- nāsadāvirbhavati na sattiro bhavatīti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:4599: sadasatośca tirobhāvāvirbhāvam antareṇa na kasyacit pravṛttiḥ pravṛttyuparamaśca bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh_u:4600: mṛdi khalvasthitāyāṃ bhaviṣyati śarāvādilakṣaṇaṃ dharmāntaramiti pravṛttirbhavati. abhūditi ca pravṛttyuparamaḥ. tadetad mṛddharmāṇāmapi na syāt, evaṃ pratyavasthito yadi sataścātmahānam asataścātmalābhamabhyupaiti ? tadasyāpasiddhānto nigrahasthānaṃ bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh_u:4604: kiṃ punarlakṣaṇāntarayogād hetvābhāsā nigrahasthānatvamāpannāḥ yathā pramāṇāni prameyatvam ? ityata āha--
GSP29nysvbh_u:4607: te ime pramāṇādayaḥ padārthā uddiṣṭā lakṣitāḥ parīkṣitāśceti // 24 //
